title: 12 'Rat Miners' Who Rescued Workers In Silkyara Tunnel Among 49 Honoured With Jeevan Raksha Padaks
summary: Sarvottam Jeevan Raksha Padak has been awarded to 17 individuals including the team of 12 rat miners and five others posthumously
full_content: 12 'Rat Miners' Who Rescued Workers In Silkyara Tunnel Among 49 Honoured With Jeevan Raksha Padaks Agency: PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 20:39 IST Sarvottam Jeevan Raksha Padak has been awarded to 17 individuals including the team of 12 rat miners and five others posthumously reset Follow us on Google News Rat-hole miners who successfully rescued the 41 trapped workers from the Silkyara Bend-Barkot Tunnel, in Uttarkashi district on 2023. (PTI file photo) Rat miners who had who had rescued the construction workers trapped in Silkyara Bend-Barkot tunnel in Uttarakhand in 2023 are among 49 people approved by President Droupadi Murmu for Jeevan Raksha Padaks. The awards are given for meritorious act in saving the life of a person, on the occasion of 76th Republic Day, a government statement said. related stories Sarvottam Jeevan Raksha Padak has been awarded to 17 individuals including the team of 12 rat miners and five others posthumously. President Droupadi Murmu has approved the conferment of Jeevan Raksha Padak Series of Awards – 2024 on 49 persons which includes Sarvottam Jeevan Raksha Padak to 17, Uttam Jeevan Raksha Padak to 09 and Jeevan Raksha Padak to 23 persons. Six awardees are posthumousRead here:… — PIB India (@PIB_India) January 25, 2025 Pintu Kumar Sahni from Bihar, Manesh K M from Kerala, Dawa Tshering Lepcha and Pema Tenzing Lachungpa from Sikkim, and Gunner Anis Kumar Gupta of defence ministry have been named for the award posthumously, the government statement said. The 12-member team of rat miners — Vaqeel Hassan, Munna Qureshi, Ankur Kumar, Monu Kumar, Devendra, Mohmmed Rashid, Firoz Qureshi, Jatin Kashyap, Saurabh Kashyap, Mohmmed Irshad, Nasruddin, and Naseem — which worked for 26 hours without break to rescue the workers for 17 days has been given Sarvottam Jeevan Raksha Padak. The award is given in three categories — Sarvottam Jeevan Raksha Padak, Uttam Jeevan Raksha Padak, and Jeevan Raksha Padak. “The decoration of the award consists of a Medal, Certificate signed by the Union Home Minister and lump sum Monetary Allowance. It is presented to the awardees by the respective Union Ministries/Organizations/State Government to which the awardee belongs," the statement said. Uttam Jeevan Raksha Padak has been awarded to nine people, including one posthumously and Jeevan Raksha Padak to 23 others. The awardees of Uttam Jeevan Raksha Padak include Ritik Chauhan, Shashikant Ramkrushna Gajbe, NK Shankar Singh Kharayat, Havildar Leki Passang, Rakesh Singh Rana, Manmohan Singh, Pradeep Kumar and Sachin Kumar. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all Rajesh Ranjan Kujur of defence ministry will get medal posthumously. Jeevan Raksha Padak has been given to Nelli Srinivasa Rao, Vikas Yadav, Sushri Manishaben Amarshibhai Malakiya, Kumari Diya Fathima, Muhammad Hashir N K, Kishor Kumar Arney, Dadarao Govindrao Pawar, and Dnyaneshwar Mukundrao Bhedodkar. K Shimreingam Shimray, Elambok Dkhar, Kisen Wanniang, Laltlanzova, Y Pongba, Ranjana Bhandari, C Anbarasan, Bandakindi Shravan Kumar, Aakash Pradhan, Kali Kinkar Manna, Naik Ajith R Nair, Dhanbeer Singh Negi, Dhanesh Chand Yadav, Sgt Ram Kumar Jaiswal, and Pallabi Biswas would be the rest to get the same award. title: President Murmu Approves 14 Shaurya Chakras On Republic Day Eve | Check List
summary: President Murmu announced two Kirti Chakras and 14 Shaurya Chakras, including three posthumous. The Shaurya Chakra is India’s third-highest peacetime gallantry award.
full_content: President Murmu Approves 14 Shaurya Chakras On Republic Day Eve | Check List Curated By : Aveek Banerjee News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 20:27 IST President Murmu announced two Kirti Chakras and 14 Shaurya Chakras, including three posthumous. The Shaurya Chakra is India’s third-highest peacetime gallantry award. reset Follow us on Google News President Murmu announced 14 Shaurya Chakra awardees, including three posthumously. (PIB) President Droupadi Murmu on Saturday approved Gallantry awards to 93 Armed Forces and Central Armed Police Forces personnel, including 11 posthumous, on the eve of the 76th Republic Day. These include two Kirti Chakras and 14 Shaurya Chakras, including three posthumous. The Awards also included one Bar to Sena Medal (Gallantry); 66 Sena Medals, including seven posthumous; two Nao Sena Medal (Gallantry) and eight Vayu Sena Medals (Gallantry). related stories The Shaurya Chakra is India’s third-highest peacetime gallantry award after the Ashok Chakra and Kirti Chakra. Full List Of Shaurya Chakra Awardees Major Ashish Dahiya Major Kunal Major Satender Dhankhar Captain Deepak Singh (Posthumous) Assistant Commandant Eshenthung Kikon Subedar Vikas Tomar Subedar Mohan Ram Havildar Rohit Kumar (Posthumous) Havildar Prakash Tamang Flight Lieutenant Aman Singh Hans Corporal Dabhi Sanjay Giffabai Essa Vijayan Kutty G (Posthumous) Vikrant Kumar, Deputy Commandant, CRPF Jeffrey Hmingchullo, Inspector (GD), CRPF The President also approved 305 defence decorations to Armed Forces and other personnel. These include 30 Param Vishisht Seva Medals, five Uttam Yudh Seva Medals, 57 Ati Vishisht Seva Medals, 10 Yudh Seva Medals, one Bar to Sena Medals (Devotion to Duty), 43 Sena Medals (Devotion to Duty), eight Nao Sena Medals (Devotion to Duty), 15 Vayu Sena Medals (Devotion to Duty), four Bar to Vishisht Seva Medal and 132 Vishisht Seva Medals. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all The CRPF commended Deputy Commandant Vikrant Kumar and Inspector Jeffrey Hmingchullo of the 203 CoBRA unit for their extraordinary valor in a fierce Naxal encounter on April 3, 2023, in Chatra, Jharkhand. “Despite being heavily outgunned and sustaining injuries, they led their teams with exemplary courage, neutralizing 5 Maoists and recovering a significant cache of sophisticated weapons and ammunition. CRPF salutes its brave personnel for their unwavering dedication and supreme sacrifice, which continue to inspire the nation," the force said in a press release. tags : Gallantry Awards Shaurya Chakra Location : New Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 20:27 IST News india President Murmu Approves 14 Shaurya Chakras On Republic Day Eve | Check List Read More

title: 'Can Prevent Policy Paralysis': President Murmu Bats For 'One Nation One Election'
summary: President Droupadi Murmu on Saturday advocated for the "One Nation One Election" initiative
full_content: 'Can Prevent Policy Paralysis': President Murmu Bats For 'One Nation One Election' Published By : Ronit Singh PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 20:10 IST President Droupadi Murmu on Saturday advocated for the "One Nation One Election" initiative reset Follow us on Google News President Droupadi Murmu | File Image/PTI President Droupadi Murmu on Saturday advocated for the “One Nation One Election" initiative, asserting it has the potential to redefine “good governance" in the country by promoting consistency in governance, preventing policy paralysis, mitigating resource diversion, and alleviating financial burdens on the state. In her address to the nation ahead of the 76th Republic Day, she emphasised the government’s ongoing efforts to “eliminate remnants of a colonial mindset that have lingered in the country for decades" and cited the replacement of the British-era criminal laws with three new modern laws. related stories “We have been witnessing concerted efforts to change that mindset… Reforms of such magnitude require an audacity of vision," she said. Highlighting the significance of the proposed bill aimed at synchronising election schedules across the country, Murmu noted, “The ‘One Nation One Election’ plan can offer numerous benefits, including enhanced governance and reduced financial strain." In discussing legal reforms, she pointed out the need to replace the Indian Penal Code, the Code of Criminal Procedure, and the Indian Evidence Act with new laws reflective of Indian traditions. She mentioned the introduction of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita, the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, and the Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam, which prioritise the delivery of justice over mere punishment and place a strong emphasis on addressing crimes against women and children. Reflecting on the significance of the Constitution, the President highlighted the progress achieved over the past 75 years. “At the time of Independence, many parts of the country faced extreme poverty and hunger. However, we maintained a belief in ourselves and created conditions for growth," she said. Noting the contributions of farmers and labourers, she said India’s economy now plays a pivotal role in global economic trends, asserting that this transformation is rooted in the framework established by the Constitution. The President also pointed to the persistently high economic growth rate in recent years, which has generated job opportunities, increased income for farmers and labourers, and lifted many out of poverty. She underscored the importance of inclusive growth and the government’s commitment to welfare, making basic necessities such as housing and access to clean drinking water entitlements for citizens. Efforts to support marginalised communities, particularly those belonging to Scheduled Castes (SC), Scheduled Tribes (ST), and Other Backward Classes (OBC), were also highlighted. Murmu mentioned various initiatives, including pre-matric and post-matric scholarships, national fellowships, and dedicated schemes aimed at the socio-economic development of these communities, such as the Pradhan Mantri Anusuchit Jaati Abhyuday Yojana and the Pradhan Mantri Janjati Adivasi Nyaya Maha Abhiyan. The President’s address underscored the government’s commitment to fostering inclusive growth and redefining governance standards in the country, creating a vision for a more equitable and prosperous future for all citizens. She emphasised that this occasion is a collective celebration of joy and pride for all citizens and remarked that while 75 years may seem like a brief moment in the life of a nation, it has been a significant period for India, marked by the revival of its long-dormant spirit and its journey to reclaim its rightful status among the world’s civilisations. Reflecting on India’s historical journey, she urged citizens to remember the brave souls who sacrificed their lives for the nation’s freedom, highlighting the 150th birth anniversary of Bhagwan Birsa Munda, whose contributions to the freedom movement are now receiving due recognition. The President praised the early 20th-century freedom fighters for uniting the nation in a well-organised independence movement and credited iconic figures like Mahatma Gandhi, Rabindranath Tagore, and Babasaheb Ambedkar for helping India rediscover its democratic values. “Justice, liberty, equality, and fraternity are not just modern concepts; they have always been integral to our civilisational heritage," she asserted, noting that skeptics of the Constitution’s future were proven wrong. Murmu highlighted the inclusive nature of the Constituent Assembly, which represented diverse communities across the nation, including 15 women members who played pivotal roles in shaping the country’s democratic framework. “When women’s equality was a distant goal in many parts of the world, Indian women were actively engaged in the nation’s destiny," she said. The Constitution, according to the President, has...

title: President Murmu Addresses Nation On Republic Day Eve: 'Constitution Is A Living Document...'
summary: President Murmu highlighted the all-round progress made by India after 75 years of independence. She said India is now taking leadership positions in international forums.
full_content: President Murmu Addresses Nation On Republic Day Eve: 'Constitution Is A Living Document...' Curated By : Aveek Banerjee News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 19:55 IST President Murmu highlighted the all-round progress made by India after 75 years of independence. She said India is now taking leadership positions in international forums. reset Follow us on Google News President Droupadi Murmu addressing the nation on Saturday. (Droupadi Murmu/X) President Droupadi Murmu addressed the nation on Republic Day eve, where she paid homage to the brave souls who made great sacrifices to free India from the shackles of foreign rule. She also highlighted tribal activist Birsa Munda’s 150th anniversary, saying his role in national history is now being recognised in true proportions. “I am very pleased to address you on this occasion. On the eve of Republic Day, I extend my heartfelt congratulations to all of you. 75 years ago, on the 26th of January, the foundation document of India, i.e., the Constitution of India, was implemented," she said. related stories “Justice, liberty, equality and fraternity are not just theoretical concepts that we have been introduced to in the modern age. These life values have always been essential elements of our civilisation and culture," she added, while paying tribute to Mahatma Gandhi, Rabindranath Tagore and Babasaheb Ambedkar. LIVE: President Droupadi Murmu’s Address to the Nation on the eve of the 76th Republic Day https://t.co/kFBgdbIW5a — President of India (@rashtrapatibhvn) January 25, 2025 “The 75 years of the Constitution are marked by an all-round progress of a young republic. At the time of Independence and even later, large parts of the country had faced extreme poverty and also hunger. But one thing we were not deprived of was our belief in ourselves. We set down to create the right conditions in which everyone would have the opportunity to flourish," she said. “Our farmers toiled hard and made our country self-sufficient in food production. Our labourers worked relentlessly to transform our infrastructure and manufacturing sector. Thanks to their sterling efforts, India’s economy today influences global economic trends. Today, India is taking leadership positions in international forums. This transformation would not have been possible without the blueprint laid down by our Constitution." ‘Constitution Is A Living Document’ The President stressed that the Indian Constitution provided the ultimate foundation of the collective identity of Indians like a family, adding that it has become a living document as “civic virtues have been part of our moral compass for millennia". She also highlighted and praised bold and far-sighted economic reforms by the government that have redefined the notion of welfare and contributed to India’s progress. “In recent years, the economic growth rare has remained persistently high, creating job opportunities for our youth, putting more money in the hands of farmers and labourers, and also lifting more people out of poverty." “Reforms of such magnitude require an audacity of vision. Another measure that promises to redefine the terms of good governance is the Bill introduced in Parliament to synchronise election schedules in the country. The ‘One Nation One Election’ plan can promote consistency in governance, prevent policy paralysis, mitigate resource diversion, and reduce the financial burden, apart from offering many other benefits," she added. She also lauded achievements in other areas – such as the space docking experiment by ISRO and India’s performances in the Olympic Games, Paralympic Games and the Chess World Championship, where D Gukesh became the youngest world champion. President Murmu On Maha Kumbh “We got freedom in 1947, but many relics of a colonial mindset persisted among us for long. Of late, we have been witnessing concerted efforts to change that mindset. Among the most noteworthy of such efforts was the decision to replace the Indian Penal Code, the Code of Criminal Procedure and the Indian Evidence Act with the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita, the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita and the Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam," Murmu further said, asserting that the laws focused on justice instead of punishment. During his address to the nation, President Murmu referred to the ongoing Maha Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj and called it an expression of richness in Indian heritage. “India is a hub of great linguistic diversity. In order to conserve as well as celebrate this richness, the Government has recognised Assamese, Bengali, Marathi, Pali and Prakrit as classical languages. This category already includes Tamil, Sanskrit, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, and Odia," she said. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all The President also mentioned various initiatives, including pre-matric and post-matric scholarships, national fellowships, and dedicated schemes aimed at the socio-economic development of these communities, such ...

title: PM Modi Saw, Showed The Power Of Spiritual Tourism: UP CM Yogi Adityanath On Maha Kumbh| Exclusive
summary: “This power of India was unfortunately not harnessed by the previous governments. The potential in the heritage of India and spiritual tourism was seen by Prime Minister Narendra Modi,” UP CM Yogi Adityanath tells Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi
full_content: PM Modi Saw, Showed The Power Of Spiritual Tourism: UP CM Yogi Adityanath On Maha Kumbh| Exclusive Published By : News Desk News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 19:44 IST “This power of India was unfortunately not harnessed by the previous governments. The potential in the heritage of India and spiritual tourism was seen by Prime Minister Narendra Modi,” UP CM Yogi Adityanath tells Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi reset Follow us on Google News PM Modi (left) with UP CM Yogi Adityanath at the Ram temple inauguration. (PTI File) Uttar Pradesh chief minister Yogi Adityanath, in an exclusive interview with Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi amid the Maha Kumbh , elaborated how PM Narendra Modi’s push has helped boost spiritual tourism in the country. “Where we are standing, this is the Sangam area and there is a fort in the front. It has Akshay Vat. In a first, we have made the Akshay Vat corridor, where lakhs of devotees are visiting every day. There is also a temple of Maa Saraswati, this form is visible unlike the river. The Patalpuri corridor is also built in it. The three corridors are in the fort. The fort has the sleeping Hanuman, the temple is very popular among devotees," said Adityanath. related stories #CMYogiOnNews18 | From Somnath till Sambhal, it is a journey to find the truth. Everything should not be turned into an issue unnecessarily. The truth of Sambhal, Mathura and Kashi should come ou: UP CM @myogiadityanath speaks with @18RahulJoshi #UttarPradesh #INDIAAlliance pic.twitter.com/JynQRF632J — News18 (@CNNnews18) January 25, 2025 When asked if Prayagraj will become a centre of spiritual tourism owing to the Maha Kumbh, the UP CM said, “This power of India was unfortunately not harnessed by the previous governments. The potential in the heritage of India and spiritual tourism was seen by Prime Minister Narendra Modi." Giving examples, he said, “Under the leadership of Modi ji, Kashi got Kashi Vishwanath corridor, 2019 saw Prayagraj Ardha Kumbha, Ayodhya saw the inauguration of the grand Maryada Purushottam Ram Temple. You can see a new Ayodhya now. Vindhya Vasini Dham has a new corridor and dham. Uttarakhand has got Kedarnath Dham in Kedar Puri, Mahakaal got Mahalok dhaam. These spots are attracting crores of devotees and showing the power of India’s spiritual tourism to the world." “Until five-10 years ago, Uttar Pradesh was at the third place in spiritual tourism , today it is on number one. It has not only given new opportunities to the people here, but has also played a major role in economic development. It has also given a new strength to the economy here," said Adityanath. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all He also said that the grand Maha Kumbh Mela is an embodiment of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s vision. “Whatever you are seeing in Prayagraj and Maha Kumbha Nagar is the embodiment of the vision of the respected PM Narendra Modi. India’s heritage should get its due respect. It is an example of how it is the responsibility of the government to respect the faith. The divine and grand Kumbh is a testament to this belief," said Adityanath. tags : Kumbh kumbh mela mahakumbh news18 specials Yogi Adityanath Location : New Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 19:19 IST News india PM Modi Saw, Showed The Power Of Spiritual Tourism: UP CM Yogi Adityanath On Maha Kumbh| Exclusive Read More

title: 'When Aurangzeb...': Yogi Adityanath Explains His 'Batoge Toh Katoge' Slogan | Exclusive Interview
summary: CM Yogi Adityanath said that he believes the message of Maha Kumbh is also that the country will remain one only through unity. If the country remains united, the country will remain safe, he added.
full_content: 'When Aurangzeb...': Yogi Adityanath Explains His 'Batoge Toh Katoge' Slogan | Exclusive Interview Curated By : News Desk News18.com Edited By: Sumedha Kirti Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 19:22 IST CM Yogi Adityanath said that he believes the message of Maha Kumbh is also that the country will remain one only through unity. If the country remains united, the country will remain safe, he added. reset Follow us on Google News CM Yogi Adityanath said if there is security of unity, prosperity will come automatically. Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath’s “ batoge toh katoge " (If you divide, you will be destroyed) slogan during Maharashtra and Haryana assembly elections last year had raised some eyebrows. Months later, in an exclusive interview to Network18 Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi at the Maha Kumbh Mela, the CM explained the meaning of the slogan and how he coined it. The slogan, a call apparently to Hindus to stay united, had sparked a controversy, with Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav claiming that the BJP had distanced itself from the slogan. Ajit Pawar — an ally of the Bharatiya Janata Party in Maharashtra — openly disagreed with the chief minister, and said that development cannot happen by creating such differences among each other. related stories Speaking to Network18 on the controversy, Yogi Adityanath recalled his trip to Agra where he unveiled the statue of Durgadas Rathore, the Rathore Rajput general of the kingdom of Marwar. “During Haryana elections, I got the opportunity to go to Mathura. I stayed there for a night, and next day went to Agra to unveil the statue of Durgadas Rathore. In the medieval period, Durgadas Rathore was a very valiant general of the Jodhpur king," CM Yogi said. The Story Behind CM Yogi’s ‘Batoge Toh Katoge’ Slogan “According to the tale, when Aurangzeb could not defeat Maharaja Jaswant Singh, the king of Jodhpur, he made a pact with him. Aurangzeb asked them to attack the Afghanis and assured support from behind. When Jaswant Singh ji went to attack the Afghans, Aurangzeb — instead of helping the king as promised — attacked the Raja by deceit. And Raja Jaswant Singh was martyred in that war," Yogi Adityanath narrated. “His son Ajit Singh was with him. The queen was also with him. When General Durgadas Rathore saw that after killing the Raja, Aurangzeb’s army was planning to kill the prince, he took Ajit and the queen, and kept them in an ashram. When Prince Ajit Singh grew up, Durgadas put in all the efforts to make Ajit the king of Jodhpur. Till the age of 91, Durgadas Rathore lived in Jodhpur. After that he took sanyaas and went to Ujjain, where he breathed his last," the chief minister said. Yogi Adityanath further said, “All those who associate with the story, and who belong to the ‘Rathore-Teli’ caste wanted to install a statue of Durgadas in Agra, but some communities were opposing it. We called both the communities and talked to them. In the end, a compromise was reached. Then when the statue was installed, I said: If you’ll be divided, you will be destroyed. If you remain united, you will be worthier." New Slogan: ‘Ek Rahoge Toh Safe Rahoge’ CM Yogi said, “I am thankful that the honourable Prime Minister took this message forward, and gave the slogan of ‘ Ek Rahoge, Safe Rahoge ‘ to connect the entire country. I believe that the message of Maha Kumbh is also that the country will remain united only through unity. If the country remains united, the country will remain safe." “Sanatan Dharma will remain safe. Every caste, every opinion, every sect, every creed will also remain safe. And if there is this security, prosperity will come automatically," Yogi Adityanath added. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all Amit Shah Too Had Spoken On CM Yogi’s Slogan When News18 Hindi had asked Union Home Minister Amit Shah to respond to the controversy over “batoge toh katoge", he said, “As far as division is concerned, it is the work of Congress. It divides people. It divides them into castes in different ways. It divides the society. The entire nation knows that most riots have happened during the rule of Congress. Most terrorist attacks happened during their time. This is why PM Modi is warning the people of Maharashtra ." tags : kumbh mela Yogi Adityanath Location : Prayagraj, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 19:02 IST News india 'When Aurangzeb...': Yogi Adityanath Explains His 'Batoge Toh Katoge' Slogan | Exclusive Interview Read More

title: Padma Awards 2025: Brazilian Vedanta Philosopher, 'OG Travel Bloggers' Among Recipients This Year
summary: Padma Awards 2025 Winners: A total of 139 names were announced- seven for Padma Vibhushan, 19 for Padma Bhushan, and 113 for Padma Shri.
full_content: Padma Awards 2025: Brazilian Vedanta Philosopher, 'OG Travel Bloggers' Among Recipients This Year Curated By : Ronit Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 21:52 IST Padma Awards 2025 Winners: A total of 139 names were announced- seven for Padma Vibhushan, 19 for Padma Bhushan, and 113 for Padma Shri. reset Follow us on Google News Padma Award 2025 Padma Awards 2025 Announcement: On the eve of Republic Day, the central government unveiled the names of unsung heroes and achievers who will receive the prestigious Padma Awards , the country’s highest civilian honours. A total of 139 names were announced- seven for Padma Vibhushan, 19 for Padma Bhushan, and 113 for Padma Shri. The awardees were recognised for their excellence in diverse fields like art, social work, science, medicine, and more, highlighting their contributions across various sectors. related stories Medicine expert Duvvur Nageshwar Reddy from Telangana, retired Justice Jagdish Singh Khehar from Chandigarh, and late singer Sharda Sinha from Bihar were honoured with the Padma Vibhushan. Jonas Masetti, a Hindu spiritual leader from Brazil, and Hugh and Colleen Gantzer, a couple renowned for writing about India’s heritage, were among those conferred with the Padma Shri. Devotional singer Bheru Singh Chouhan, journalist Bhim Singh Bhavesh, novelist Jagdish Joshila, cervical cancer advocate Neerja Bhatla, and Shaikha A J Al Sabah, a yoga practitioner from Kuwait, are also among the recipients of the Padma Shri award. The Padma awards, among the country’s highest civilian honours, are conferred in three categories – Padma Vibhushan, Padma Bhushan, and Padma Shri. In 2024, former Vice-President M Venkaiah Naidu, actors Chiranjeevi and Vyjayanthimala Bali, Bharatanatyam dancer Padma Subrahmanyam and the first woman judge of the Supreme Court late M Fathima Beevi were some of the eminent personalities to receive the Padma awards. Padma Awards 2025 Full List PM Modi Extends Wishes To Awardees Prime Minister Narendra Modi extended warm wishes to the Padma awardees of 2025, saying that the country is proud to honour and celebrate their extraordinary achievements. “Congratulations to all the Padma awardees! India is proud to honour and celebrate their extraordinary achievements. Their dedication and perseverance are truly motivating. Each awardee is synonymous with hardwork, passion and innovation, which has positively impacted countless lives. They teach us the value of striving for excellence and serving society selflessly," he said in an X post. Congratulations to all the Padma awardees! India is proud to honour and celebrate their extraordinary achievements. Their dedication and perseverance are truly motivating. Each awardee is synonymous with hardwork, passion and innovation, which has positively impacted countless…— Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) January 25, 2025 Brazilian Vedanta Philosopher & ‘OG Travel Bloggers’ Hugh and Colleen Gantzer, the “OG Travel Bloggers" were awarded the Padma Shri recognising their significant contributions to Indian travel journalism for over five decades. Together, the couple authored over 30 books and wrote more than 3,000 articles, columns and magazine features, highlighting popular tourist spots and unorthodox locations and offering in-depth insights into India’s culture, history and landscapes. Jonas Masetti, a mechanical engineer turned Hindu Spiritual Leader from Brazil, also found mention in the list of Padma Shri awardees for promoting Indian spirituality, philosophy and culture worldwide. For many years, he worked to enable accessible education on Vedantic wisdom to people and has reached 1.5 lakh students worldwide in his mission of cultural education and spiritual development. He is also one of the key figures in the spiritual community, particularly for his teachings of Vedanta and the Bhagavad Gita, which have reached a broad audience across the globe. Padma Awards 2025: Fruit Farmer, Paralympian & More Among those awarded Padma Shri on Saturday also include Hariman Sharma, an Apple Farmer from Bilaspur who developed a low-chilling apple variety ‘HRMN 99′ – which grows in low altitudes at 1,800 feet above sea level, making it a first-of-its-kind innovation. Harvinder Singh, who became 1st Indian to win Gold in the Paralympic Games, was also honoured with the Padma Shri award. He won a Gold in the 2024 Paris Paralympic and a Bronze in the 2020 Tokyo Paralympic. Another name that caught everyone’s attention was Bhim Singh Bhavesh, a social worker from Bhojpur who worked tirelessly for the upliftment of the Musahar community, one of society’s most marginalised groups, for the past 22 years through his foundation Nayee Asha’. President’s Address On R-Day Eve President Droupadi Murmu addressed the nation on Republic Day eve and paid homage to the brave souls who made great sacrifices for India’s freedom from foreign powers. “Justice, liberty, equality and fraternity are not just theoretical concepts that...

title: UN Suspends Travel In Parts Of Yemen After Houthis Detain 7 Staffers Post-Trump’s “Terrorist” Label
summary: On January 25, 2025, UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres confirmed that Yemen's Houthi rebels had detained seven UN staff members. In response, the UN suspended staff movement in Houthi-controlled areas due to rising humanitarian concerns. Guterres demanded the immediate release of the workers, emphasizing that detaining aid staff impedes efforts to assist millions in need. The detentions follow the US designation of the Houthis as a foreign terrorist organization, which has sparked retaliation. The situation highlights worsening tensions and the humanitarian crisis in Yemen. n18oc_crux

title: 5 Karnataka 'Water Warriors,' Invited As R-Day Guests, Slam State Govt For Poor Arrangements In Delhi
summary: The five people from Karnataka are among 178 water warriors invited to be guests at the Republic Day parade in Delhi
full_content: 5 Karnataka 'Water Warriors,' Invited As R-Day Guests, Slam State Govt For Poor Arrangements In Delhi Curated By : Ronit Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:54 IST The five people from Karnataka are among 178 water warriors invited to be guests at the Republic Day parade in Delhi reset Follow us on Google News Five water warriors from Karnataka stranded at Delhi airport | Image/X Five ‘water warriors’ from Karnataka, invited as special guests for the 76th Republic Day celebrations, were reportedly stranded at the Delhi airport for several hours after their accommodation in Karnataka Bhavan was not approved on Friday. Braving the chilly weather, the team of five achievers, including women, booked private hotel rooms around 11 pm in the national capital, according to reports. related stories The five water warriors – Shivamma from Koppal, Keshava Kotian from Udupi, Sridhar Patil from Kalaburgi, Ananthamma from Chitradurga and Virappa Ramappa from Bagalkote – were selected under the Jal Jeevan Mission for their contributions in enhancing water accessibility and improving the lives of rural communities. They complained that proper accommodations were not arranged for them, despite the state government confirming bookings at Karnataka Bhavan. However, Karnataka Bhavan clarified that they had not been informed of any such arrangements. “The government confirmed our stay at Karnataka Bhavan 15 days ago following which we agreed to fly to Delhi and participate in the Republic Day celebrations. However, upon landing on Friday night, we learnt that no rooms are available at Karnataka Bhavan and we are left stranded on the footpath at the airport under severe weather conditions," G H Puajar, husband of Shivamma, was quoted as saying by The Indian Express . Water Warrior Slams Karnataka Govt Puajar went all out against the Karnataka government, slamming it for incompetence in arranging basic accommodation for the team, including women. “We are left stranded under severe cold on the footpath at the airport. It is difficult especially for women to cope with such harsh climatic conditions." An official from the Karnataka Bhavan said they were not informed of any bookings from the state government in regard to the guests arriving in Delhi for the Republic Day celebrations. “No state representative has written or communicated to us in this regard," he said. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all The five people from Karnataka are among 178 water warriors invited to be guests at the Republic Day parade in Delhi in recognition of their efforts in providing a safe and sustainable water supply in rural areas. They will also meet President Droupadi Murmu for a special interaction. tags : delhi karnataka republic day Location : Delhi, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:53 IST News india 5 Karnataka 'Water Warriors,' Invited As R-Day Guests, Slam State Govt For Poor Arrangements In Delhi Read More

title: Maha Kumbh: Diplomats From Russia, Ukraine, 73 Other Nations To Take Holy Dip At Sangam
summary: Officials of the MEA and the Ministry of Home Affairs are busy making preparations to ensure a smooth experience for the diplomats
full_content: Maha Kumbh: Diplomats From Russia, Ukraine, 73 Other Nations To Take Holy Dip At Sangam Agency: PTI Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 18:50 IST Officials of the MEA and the Ministry of Home Affairs are busy making preparations to ensure a smooth experience for the diplomats reset Follow us on Google News Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath with his Cabinet colleagues takes a holy dip at the Sangam during the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025. (PTI file photo) Diplomats from 73 countries, including the ambassadors of Russia and Ukraine, are coming here for the first time to take a dip in the Sangam during the ongoing Maha Kumbh. Mela Adhikari Vijay Kiran Anand has confirmed that the diplomats are coming on February 1. related stories The Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) has also written a letter to the chief secretary of Uttar Pradesh regarding this, saying diplomats from countries including Japan, USA, Russia, Ukraine, Germany, Netherlands, Cameroon, Canada, Switzerland, Sweden, Poland and Bolivia will attend Maha Kumbh, Anand added. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all According to the letter, all these foreign diplomats will reach Sangam Nose via boat and take a dip in the holy Sangam. After this, they will visit Akshayvat and Bade Hanuman Temple, following which they will “understand" Maha Kumbh at the Digital Mahakumbh Experience Centre. Officials of the MEA and the Ministry of Home Affairs are busy making preparations to ensure a smooth experience for the diplomats. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) tags : kumbh mela Location : Uttar Pradesh, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 18:24 IST News india Maha Kumbh: Diplomats From Russia, Ukraine, 73 Other Nations To Take Holy Dip At Sangam Read More

title: Sohum Shah ‘Shot Something Crazy’ For Action Drama Crazxy; Check Photos
summary: One of the photos showcases Sohum Shah in a fierce and bold look with injury marks on his face.
full_content: Sohum Shah ‘Shot Something Crazy’ For Action Drama Crazxy; Check Photos Published By : Chirag Sehgal Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 19:15 IST One of the photos showcases Sohum Shah in a fierce and bold look with injury marks on his face. reset Follow us on Google News Crazxy will be released on March 7. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Sohum Shah is currently filming his upcoming action-drama, Craxzy. Written and directed by Girish Kohli, the mind behind Mom and HIT: The First Case, the film is set to release on March 7. On Monday, the 41-year-old actor shared intense behind-the-scenes moments from the project on social media, sparking excitement among his fans. The first image showcases Sohum Shah in a fierce, bold look, with injury marks on his face. In the next shot, he is seen suspended in mid-air with a rope tied around him. The scene appears to be a VFX shot, with blue screens in the background, typical of chroma key effects. Another picture from the sets of Crazxy showcases a monitor screen, and the last one depicts a card with a cross cut-out. Sharing the post on Instagram, he wrote in the caption, “Shot something crazy for CRAZXY." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sohum Shah (@shah_sohum) The pictures have left the fans beaming with excitement, prompting many to share their reactions. An Instagram user wrote, “It seems that you shoot something unique." Another one wrote, “Eagerly awaiting the release." One of them wrote, “Can’t wait, Sir." Crazxy has been backed by Sohum himself, along with Mukesh Shah, Amita Shah and Adesh Prasad. The music of the film has been given by Vishal Bhardwaj and the lyrics are by Gulzar. Earlier the makers unveiled a motion poster of the film which depicted an abstract image in which many roadways intersect to form an obscure face, most likely that of Sohum. It also highlights his eyes, which firmly gazing to a point. Sharing the post on Instagram, Sohum wrote, “Doston, aaj Tumbbad ko release hue 6 saal hogaye hai… aapne itna pyaar diya ki film re-release bhi hogayi aur humaara #Tumbbad ka circle complete hua 🙂 And, after 6 years, we are presenting to you the motion poster of our new film, #CRAZXY. In cinemas 7 March, 2025. GET READY FOR A #CRAZXY RIDE!" View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sohum Shah (@shah_sohum) Meanwhile, Sohum is known for his performance in films like Tumbbad, Talvaar, and web shows like Maharani, Bard of Blood and Dahaad. He will be next seen in Tumbbad 2. tags : Sohum Shah Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 19:15 IST News movies Sohum Shah ‘Shot Something Crazy’ For Action Drama Crazxy; Check Photos Read More

title: Lakshmi Manchu Calls Out IndiGo For 'Rude' And 'Intrusive' Luggage Check
summary: She took to social media to share her recent disturbing encounter with the airline, Explaining how the employees treated her disrespectfully and performing an intrusive bag search.
full_content: Lakshmi Manchu Calls Out IndiGo For 'Rude' And 'Intrusive' Luggage Check Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 19:08 IST She took to social media to share her recent disturbing encounter with the airline, Explaining how the employees treated her disrespectfully and performing an intrusive bag search. reset Follow us on Google News She said the security guards refused to let her open the bag. (Photo Credit: X) Actress Lakshmi Manchu has accused IndiGo Airlines of pestering her while she was checking her bags at the airport. Manchu shared her experience on social media, detailing how the officials were disrespectful and performed an intrusive luggage search. Lakshmi criticised the staff for not being humble and throwing unnecessary tantrums in several tweets. She called the employees “rude" while checking her bags. She even said one of her fellow travellers had to leave her suitcase behind since the check was delayed. related stories According to reports, Manchu was stopped for a standard security check while travelling on a domestic flight. She claims that the airline’s ground crew was extremely forceful in their demands to check her luggage. She said despite their assurances that they would, the security guards refused to allow her to open the bag to reveal its luggage. “My bag pulled aside and @IndiGo6E and they won’t let me open my bag," Lakshmi Manchu wrote on X. My bag will be left in Goa if they don’t, so please assist! Flt 6e585. This is absurd, and the employees are being impolite." My bag pulled aside and @IndiGo6E and they won’t let me open my bag. They insist to do it or else my bag will be left in Goa, someone help!!! title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam OTT Release Delayed? Here's What We Know
summary: In India, the film grossed more than Rs 150 crore and continues to perform well at the box office.
full_content: Sankranthiki Vasthunam OTT Release Delayed? Here's What We Know Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 19:09 IST In India, the film grossed more than Rs 150 crore and continues to perform well at the box office. reset Follow us on Google News Sankranthiki Vasthunam was released on January 14. (Photo Credits: X) Sankranthiki Vasthunam, featuring Venkatesh Daggubati, has been a major hit at the box office since its January 14 release, grossing over Rs 150 crore in India. With its continued success in theatres, reports indicate that producer Dil Raju is considering delaying the film’s OTT release to capitalise on its ongoing theatrical momentum. According to OTTPlay, ZEE5 secured the digital rights to Sankranthiki Vasthunam for Rs 30 crore, with the initial agreement setting the OTT release for the second week of February 2025. However, given the film’s continued success at the box office, grossing Rs 157 crore within 13 days and over Rs 200 crore globally, producer Dil Raju is reportedly reconsidering the release timeline. Fearing that an early OTT debut might impact its ongoing theatrical performance, discussions are underway with the streaming platform to postpone the digital release. related stories Owing to the success of the Telugu film, the producers threw a success party for the cast and crew a few days back. The official X handle of Sri Venkateswara Creations provided several glimpses of the party, attended by Mahesh Babu and his wife, Namrata Shirodkar. The caption read, “A blockbuster reunion of CHINNODU –PEDDODU. From appreciating to celebrating #BlockbusterSankranthikiVasthunam together." A blockbuster reunion of CHINNODU – PEDDODU??From appreciating to celebrating #BlockbusterSankranthikiVasthunam together ❤️‍? Candids of Superstar @UrstrulyMahesh with team #SankranthikiVasthunam from the success party❤️ Victory @venkymama @anilravipudi @aishu_dil … pic.twitter.com/VGGwqK0iEq — Sri Venkateswara Creations (@SVC_official) January 17, 2025 Sankranthiki Vasthunam is an action-comedy that revolves around a former IPS officer who leads a quiet life with his wife. However, his peaceful existence is disrupted when a high-profile kidnapping case emerges, and his ex-girlfriend seeks his help. As they collaborate to solve the case, the officer’s wife, uncertain of her husband’s loyalty, decides to join them in the investigation. Venkatesh Daggubati stars as the lead, with Aishwarya Rajesh portraying his wife and Meenakshi Chaudhary playing his ex-girlfriend. The cast also includes Upendra Limaye, Srinivasa Reddy, Naresh, and others. Directed by Anil Ravipudi, with music composed by Bheems Ceciroleo, the film is produced by Dil Raju and Shirish under the banner of Sri Venkateswara Creations. tags : Dil Raju entertainment OTT Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 19:08 IST News movies Sankranthiki Vasthunam OTT Release Delayed? Here's What We Know Read More

title: Junaid Khan Says People Don't Think Aamir Khan 'Can Have Such A Grown-Up Son': 'I Look So...'
summary: Junaid Khan is 31 years old and Aamir Khan is 59 years old.
full_content: Junaid Khan Says People Don't Think Aamir Khan 'Can Have Such A Grown-Up Son': 'I Look So...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 19:07 IST Junaid Khan is 31 years old and Aamir Khan is 59 years old. reset Follow us on Google News Junaid Khan and Aamir Khan. Aamir Khan has two kids from his first marriage with ex-wife Reena Dutta – daughter Ira Khan and son Junaid Khan. When Junaid Khan made his first proper public appearance in front of paps, fans praised him for his looks and humble nature. However, some were in disbelief that Aamir Khan had kids who were in their late 20s and early 30s. Junaid Khan, 31, also believes that since Aamir Khan looks young, many fans didn’t think that he would have grown-up kids. Speaking to SCREEN, he said, “I look so different from my dad (Aamir Khan). Also, he looks so young that people don’t think he can have such a grown-up son." related stories As such, he added, that he doesn’t get compared much to his father, despite also being an actor. Junaid made his acting debut with Maharaj, which was released on Netflix. He will soon be making his big-screen debut with Loveyapa. When asked if he felt the pressure to prove himself, he said, “Not really. Everyone has their own journey." Being a star kid, does Junaid feel better equipped to handle the pressures of being an actor? He said, “After a point, you learn only from your failure, not others. Yet, there are many advantages — you get to see firsthand how the industry works; you have a family who knows what this world is like and have that support system." Junaid said that his parents have encouraged him to make his own choices but will be there to guide him if needed. “Papa and Ma have always encouraged us to do our own thing, make our own mistakes and explore life. If I have any specific questions, then I go to them. They always give excellent advice but also encourage us to follow our heart," he said. Meanwhile, as for Loveyapa, Junaid will star alongside Khushi Kapoor in the film. In addition to Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film features a stellar cast including Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Kiku Sharda, and Kunj Anand. Directed by Advait Chandan and backed by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, Loveyapa is set for a worldwide release by Zee Studios on February 7, 2025. tags : aamir khan bollywood Junaid Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 19:07 IST News movies Junaid Khan Says People Don't Think Aamir Khan 'Can Have Such A Grown-Up Son': 'I Look So...' title: Priyanka Chopra Celebrates Her Bollywood Hits With Amul’s Throwback Ads: ‘It Took Me Back’

Amul, which has frequently celebrated her remarkable career, released a series of adorable advertisements highlighting her roles in films like Barfi, Dostana, Don 2, Dil Dhadakne Do, Mary Kom, and her international series Quantico. Each one of these moments is etched in my memory." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Priyanka (@priyankachopra) While Priyanka Chopra stirred up nostalgia with a heartfelt social media post, her visit to India is catching even more attention. The actress, who arrived recently, has sparked rumours about a potential collaboration with Mahesh Babu in a film directed by SS Rajamouli. This has fueled speculation that she could be gearing up for a major project with Rajamouli. PeeCee wrote, “With the blessings of Shri Balaji a new chapter begins. May we all find peace in our hearts and prosperity and abundance all around us. Gods grace is infinite." The actress also thanked Ram Charan’s wife, Upasana Kamineni Konidela in the post. title: Alien: Earth Teaser Sets Stage For Xenomorph's Chilling Entry
summary: The series is a prequel to the popular Alien franchise, set to premiere this year.
full_content: Alien: Earth Teaser Sets Stage For Xenomorph's Chilling Entry Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 19:05 IST The series is a prequel to the popular Alien franchise, set to premiere this year. reset Follow us on Google News Alien: Earth will premiere on Hulu and Disney+ Hotstar. (Photo Credits: Instagram) A tantalising teaser has finally dropped for FX’s upcoming TV series Alien: Earth which brings the iconic Alien franchise to the small screen for the first time. Directed by Noah Hawley, the show promises to reimagine the longest-running sci-fi horror, this time taking viewers to the Earth in 2120. The series is said to be a prequel to Ridley Scott’s 1979 Alien, the first film in the franchise. The 30-second teaser is intense, giving a glimpse of what went down inside a crash-landing spaceship from the view of a Xenomorph. As the teaser unfolded, it showed the alien trying to escape the containment aboard a spacecraft bound for Eart. As the creature prowls through the ship’s dark corridors amid flickering red lights, an automated voice can be heard in the background that repeats, “Containment breach." related stories Navigating past the wreckage, exposed wires, and other extraterrestrial creatures, the Xenomorph eventually slams into a window, setting the stage for the horror to descend on the Earth. Apart from the teaser, the network also released a poster of Alien: Earth, giving a closer look at the monster and its massive head. “We were safer in space," the caption reads. Leading the cast in the Alien series is Sydney Chandler as the project lead followed by Alex Lawther, Timothy Olyphant, Essie Davis, and Samuel Blenkin among others. New poster for ‘ALIEN: EARTH’Releasing this Summer on Hulu. pic.twitter.com/afh9PfUnXI — DiscussingFilm (@DiscussingFilm) January 26, 2025 As per the show synopsis, it tracks the series of events after a “mysterious space vessel crash-lands on Earth, a young woman (Sydney Chandler) and a ragtag group of tactical soldiers make a fateful discovery that puts them face-to-face with the planet’s greatest threat." The members of the crash continue searching for survivors, only to encounter the mysterious creature, which is even more terrifying than they could have ever imagined. “With this new threat, the crew members must fight for survival and choose how the discovery could change the planet as they know it." Speaking about the same, director Hawley told Deadline, “There’s something about seeing a Xenomorph in the wilds of Earth with your own eyes. That is truly chilling to think of it moving here among us, and so I can’t tell you under what circumstances you’ll see that, but you’ll see it — and you’re going to lock your door that night." While Alien: Earth is believed to have a standalone story with a new cast, it is unlikely to connect to the franchise’s most recent release Alien: Romulus. The show will premiere on Hulu and Disney+ Hotstar this year. tags : alien hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:59 IST News movies Alien: Earth Teaser Sets Stage For Xenomorph's Chilling Entry Read More

title: Chris Martin, Dakota Johnson Walk On Their Way Back After Coldplay's Superhit Ahmedabad Concert
summary: Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson were seen walking hand-in-hand on Ahmedabad streets after the concert.
full_content: Chris Martin, Dakota Johnson Walk On Their Way Back After Coldplay's Superhit Ahmedabad Concert Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:58 IST Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson were seen walking hand-in-hand on Ahmedabad streets after the concert. reset Follow us on Google News A huge crowd followed Chris Martin and Dakota Johnson. (Photo Credits: Instagram) British rock band Coldplay set the stage ablaze with their energetic performance at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, on January 26. As the videos of the concert have taken the Internet by storm, a clip of Coldplay lead singer Chris Martin walking hand-in-hand with his girlfriend Dakota Johnson on Ahmedabad streets after the show has gone viral. In the video, Chris and Dakota, who ditched their luxury rides to avoid the traffic, were seen walking on the footpath while holding hands. Surrounded by fans and security guards, the duo also shared some conversations and laughter with Indian fans who quickly thronged the duo. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Trending In Ahmedabad (@trendinginahmedabad) Another clip depicted the crowd following the couple, while the traffic police ensured that the traffic moved smoothly. A fan could be heard greeting Chris with a hello, to which he responded with a smile. The singer opted for a casual blue t-shirt paired with black trousers, shoes and a blue cap, while Dakota wore a white top and black trousers. As soon as the clip was shared online, it captured the audience’s attention. An Instagram user wrote, “Omg! He is super cool." Another one wrote, “His security should be more tight, like anything can happen." View this post on Instagram A post shared by RE Hunter (@throttledhunter) During the concert, Chris surprised fans with his soulful rendition of the patriotic songs Maa Tujhe Salaam and Vande Mataram on the occasion of the 76th Republic Day. He ended the concert with, “Salute to Mother India" and extended heartfelt wishes to everyone. Another key highlight of the show was Chris dedicating a special song for the Indian star cricketer Jasprit Bumrah. He said, “O Jasprit, my beautiful brother. The best bowler in the whole of cricket. We did not enjoy watching you destroy England, wicket after wicket." Chris then addressed the audience in Hindi and thanked them for coming in large numbers from different corners of the country. “Dhanyawaad dosto. Aap sabhi ka bohot swagat hai hamare show me. Aap sabhi  ka bohat dhanyawaad ki aapne hume yaha perform karne ka mauka diya. Hume Ahmedabad me aake bohat hum bohat khushi ho rahi hai. Aur namaste aap sabko jo hume live stream par dekh rahe hai," he said amidst a cheering audience. (Thank you, friends, we welcome you to this concert. Thanks for inviting us to your country and greetings to all those watching us on the livestream.) With the Ahmedabad concert, Coldplay has concluded their Music of the Spheres tour in India. Before this, they performed in Mumbai on January 18, 19 and 21. tags : Chris Martin dakota johnson hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:58 IST News movies Chris Martin, Dakota Johnson Walk On Their Way Back After Coldplay's Superhit Ahmedabad Concert Read More

title: 'Protect Creative Artists': Paul McCartney Sounds Alarm On AI's Impact On Music Industry
summary: McCartney has urged the government to protect creative artists as the as the ministers consult on changing copyright laws.
full_content: 'Protect Creative Artists': Paul McCartney Sounds Alarm On AI's Impact On Music Industry Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:38 IST McCartney has urged the government to protect creative artists as the as the ministers consult on changing copyright laws. reset Follow us on Google News The Beatles legend feared the negative impact of AI. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Beatles legend Paul McCartney has voiced his concerns about the AI takeover in the world of music, urging the British government to protect the creative industries in the future. McCartney’s views come at a time when there has been a heated debate about the potential threat that artificial intelligence poses to the music industry by not only replacing musicians and composers but also increasing the threat of deepfakes and voice cloning. The 82-year-old in a recent interview warned that the proposed changes to copyright laws could “rip off" artists. “You get young guys, girls, coming up, and they write a beautiful song, and they don’t own it, and they don’t have anything to do with it. And anyone who wants can just rip it off. The truth is, the money’s going somewhere… Somebody’s getting paid, so why shouldn’t it be the guy who sat down and wrote ‘Yesterday’?" he told BBC. related stories Further in the discussion, McCartney urged the government to protect the people, adding, “We’re the people, you’re the government. You’re supposed to protect us. That’s your job. So you know, if you’re putting through a bill, make sure you protect the creative thinkers, the creative artists, or you’re not going to have them." It is worth mentioning that the UK Labour Party government has time and again expressed its ambition to make Britain a global leader in the field of artificial intelligence. In December 2024, the government launched a consultation to explore how copyright can enable creators’ and right holders’ control over and seek remuneration to use their works for AI training. With the government’s futuristic plans involving AI, the debate around its impact continues to grow. In April, many leading musicians and artists, including Billie Eilish and Nikki Minaj, wrote an open letter to tech companies, digital service providers, and AI developers, criticising their responsible use of AI practices. tags : hollywood Paul McCartney Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:38 IST News movies 'Protect Creative Artists': Paul McCartney Sounds Alarm On AI's Impact On Music Industry Read More

title: Here’s What Josh Gad Can Tell Fans About Frozen 3
summary: Josh Gad said, “There’s a reason the movie is coming out in 2027. And that is because no one wants to rush this.”
full_content: Here’s What Josh Gad Can Tell Fans About Frozen 3 Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:37 IST Josh Gad said, “There’s a reason the movie is coming out in 2027. And that is because no one wants to rush this.” reset Follow us on Google News Frozen series has a fan base of its own. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Frozen created a large impact on the audience upon its release in 2013 and is cherished as one of the best Disney movies ever. The franchise was later continued with a sequel in 2019. After this, fans of the movie have been eagerly waiting for the third part. Actor Josh Gad who voices Olaf recently opened up on why Frozen 3 would be coming out in 2027 and why is it worth waiting for. Gad recently appeared on The Spotlight with Jessica Shaw’s podcast on Sirius XM, where he made it clear that he cannot say much about Frozen 3 but that the third part would be coming out in 2027. He said, “There’s a reason the movie is coming out in 2027. And that is because no one wants to rush this." The actor mentioned that nobody wants Frozen 3 not to be “a sequel or a money grab." The makers and actors associated with the film desire it to be “worthy" of the story they set out to make the first installment, released in 2013. related stories He further noted that they want to provide the audience with something worthy of the years of wait and “anticipation." Talking about the story, he said, “And I know that they are actively working on that. They have a story that they are very, very, very excited about." Disney announced Frozen 3 last year and slated its release for Thanksgiving 2027. Jennifer Lee, who serves as chief creative officer of Disney Animation and co-directed the first two films, talked about her excitement during one of her speeches at a BFI London Film Festival event held in October 2023. Speaking to Variety, Lee said, “I am blown away and I am so excited." Furthermore, Gad also hinted at two sequels being in development during his appearance on The View program in November last year. He said, “Apparently there are two Frozen sequels in development right now — surprise!" Frozen 1 and 2 are among the highest-grossing animated films of all time. While Frozen collected $1.28 billion at the box office, its 2019 sequel Frozen II grossed $1.45 billion. tags : Disney entertainment hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:36 IST News movies Here’s What Josh Gad Can Tell Fans About Frozen 3 Read More

title: Lizzo Says She's Reached Her Weight Loss Goal: 'Haven’t Seen This Number Since 2014'
summary: Lizzo's transformation journey, which began in January 2024, has been nothing short of inspiring.
full_content: Lizzo Says She's Reached Her Weight Loss Goal: 'Haven’t Seen This Number Since 2014' Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:45 IST Lizzo's transformation journey, which began in January 2024, has been nothing short of inspiring. reset Follow us on Google News Lizzo left her followers a motivational message. (Photo Credit: Instagram) Lizzo is spreading positivity and inspiration once again. The multi-talented Truth Hurts singer took to Instagram on Saturday to share an exciting milestone in her health journey. Lizzo revealed she had reached her weight loss goal, a moment she described as a significant and empowering achievement. “I did it," Lizzo announced proudly in her caption, radiating excitement and joy. “Today when I stepped on my scale, I reached my weight release goal. I haven’t seen this number since 2014!" she added. Accompanying her words was a striking photo of the 36-year-old in a bold dark red two-piece workout set, confidently showing off her slimmed-down figure. Her transformation journey, which began in January 2024, has been nothing short of inspiring. She also shared some hard-earned statistics: a 10.5-point drop in her body mass index (BMI) and a 16% reduction in her body fat—proof of her commitment and dedication. related stories In her Instagram post, Lizzo left her followers with a motivational message: “Let this be a reminder you can do anything you put your mind to. Time for new goals!" Her words resonated with thousands, sparking an outpouring of support and admiration from fans and fellow celebrities alike. Watch it here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Lizzo (@lizzobeeating) But Lizzo’s story isn’t just about numbers. Over the weekend, she reportedly took to TikTok to delve deeper into her experience. She shared a throwback video filmed at the start of her journey, where she spoke candidly about her goals and challenges. “I’d never be considered ‘thin’ by any means," Lizzo said in the video, acknowledging the societal pressures and labels that often come with being in the public eye. She humorously added, “I’d still be labelled ‘morbidly obese’ on the BMI scale and men on the internet will still call me ‘big-backed.’" Despite these comments, Lizzo remained focused on achieving what would make her feel good and healthy, reports Page Six. Fast-forward to today and Lizzo is not just reaching her goals – she’s smashing them. In a follow-up TikTok video, the singer exclaimed, “I am happy. I did it." Her joy and sense of accomplishment were palpable, inspiring fans around the world to embrace their own journeys, whatever they may look like. The comments section of her post was flooded with praise, with many applauding her transparency and courage to share such a personal milestone. Fans celebrated her for being an inspiration and a reminder that health and happiness look different for everyone. “You look so amazing," wrote a fan. “Congratulations. You look amazing as you always have. Keep doing you, Queen," commented another one. tags : entertainment hollywood Lizzo Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:32 IST News movies Lizzo Says She's Reached Her Weight Loss Goal: 'Haven’t Seen This Number Since 2014' Read More

title: Triptii Dimri 'Has Miles To Go... National Crushes Temporary,' Says Bulbbul Co-Star Parambrata Chatterjee
summary: Parambrata Chatterjee said that in comparison, Vidya Balan is class apart.
full_content: Triptii Dimri 'Has Miles To Go... National Crushes Temporary,' Says Bulbbul Co-Star Parambrata Chatterjee Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:13 IST Parambrata Chatterjee said that in comparison, Vidya Balan is class apart. reset Follow us on Google News Triptii Dimri received immense praise for Bulbbul. Triptii Dimri became a sensation after starring in Ranbir Kapoor’s Animal. Her fame grew manifolds after the film’s release and she soon starred in films like Bad Newz, Vicky Aur Vidya Ka Voh Wala Video and Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3. However, Parambrata Chatterjee, her Bulbbul costar, believes that she still has to prove herself and has miles to go. During an event organised by SCREEN, Parambrata ranked Vidya Balan as the most talented actress and took Triptii’s name last. He said, “It is what it is, national crushes are temporary, but class is permanent. I mean no offence. Sorry. What is she called? Bhabhi 2!" related stories The actor explained, “She is lovely, a very nice girl, and I really get along with her. But she still has miles to go. She entered the industry very young and will learn a lot. But Vidya, I mean, sorry to say, is a class apart in whatever she does." He worked with Vidya on Kahaani. Triptii Dimri’s career soared with her role in Animal, marking her entry into Bollywood’s mainstream. However, the role also attracted scrutiny, which the actress has taken in stride. In an interview with Forbes India, Triptii revealed that she remains unfazed by the scrutiny surrounding her roles in Animal and Bad Newz. “I am someone who wants to give 100 per cent. If I find the character or the story interesting, I want to give my all. That’s what I’ve learned—if it works, it works, and if it doesn’t, it doesn’t. We won’t always be liked by everybody. There will be some people who like you, and some who don’t. You can’t keep all that noise in mind. You have to follow your heart and do things that you feel are right," she said. When asked whether she would try to move away from her “overtly sexualised" image, Triptii dismissed the notion. “I am going with the flow. The aim is to play different characters because I don’t want to go to a set and feel bored. I want to feel challenged and wonder, ‘How will this happen?’—and then make it happen," she explained. Triptii Dimri will soon be seen in Arjun Ustara with Shahid Kapoor, Vikrant Massey and Randeep Hooda among others. tags : bollywood Triptii Dimri Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:13 IST News movies Triptii Dimri 'Has Miles To Go... National Crushes Temporary,' Says Bulbbul Co-Star Parambrata Chatterjee Read More

title: From Tihar To Netflix, The Story Of Sunil Kumar Gupta And Black Warrant
summary: Sunil Kumar Gupta’s tenure at Tihar exposed him to the harsh realities of prison life.
full_content: From Tihar To Netflix, The Story Of Sunil Kumar Gupta And Black Warrant Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:10 IST Sunil Kumar Gupta’s tenure at Tihar exposed him to the harsh realities of prison life. reset Follow us on Google News Sunil Kumar Gupta’s tenure at Tihar exposed him to the harsh realities of prison life. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Sunil Kumar Gupta, the former superintendent of Delhi’s Tihar Jail, is back in the spotlight with the release of the Netflix series Black Warrant . The show, inspired by Gupta’s real-life experiences and the book Black Warrant: Confessions of a Tihar Jailer, co-authored with journalist Sunetra Chowdhary, dives deep into the challenges and secrets of India’s most infamous prison. Directed by Vikramaditya Motwane and starring Zahan Kapoor as Gupta, the series sheds light on issues like corruption, gang violence, and security lapses in Indian prisons. Gupta’s life story, as portrayed in the series, has sparked conversations about prison reforms and justice. related stories In 1981, Sunil Kumar Gupta left a secure job with Indian Railways to pursue his dream of joining the police force. Despite his modest background and lack of the typical physical build for prison officers, he secured the role of assistant superintendent. Upon joining Tihar, he faced an unexpected challenge—there were no vacancies for his position. This initial setback almost ended his career before it began, but Gupta persevered. Gupta’s tenure at Tihar exposed him to the harsh realities of prison life, from death sentence executions to the struggles of inmates deprived of their basic legal rights. One particularly emotional moment was his interaction with Afzal Guru, convicted for the 2001 Parliament attack. On the day of Guru’s execution, the terrorist noted the compassion in Gupta’s eyes, leaving a lasting impact on the jailer. Gupta introduced significant reforms during his time at Tihar. He established the prison’s first legal aid cell, offering free legal assistance to disadvantaged inmates. He also initiated special court sessions within the jail to expedite minor cases, helping many prisoners avoid prolonged incarceration due to lack of resources. In 1988, Gupta played a key role in drafting the Delhi Prison Act and Manual, which governed prison operations for nearly 30 years. Since retiring in 2016, Sunil Kumar Gupta has continued his advocacy for the underprivileged. He now practices law at the Delhi High Court and Supreme Court, championing the rights of those in need. His legacy of compassion and reform is a testament to his dedication to justice. Netflix’s Black Warrant brings Gupta’s incredible journey to life, inspiring audiences worldwide. tags : bollywood entertainment Netflix Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:10 IST News movies From Tihar To Netflix, The Story Of Sunil Kumar Gupta And Black Warrant Read More

title: Kriti Sanon Stars Opposite Dhanush In Aanand L Rai's Tere Ishk Mein? BIG Announcement On Tuesday
summary: Aanand L. Rai is set to enthrall audiences with his upcoming film Tere Ishk Mein, a tale of love and obsession that reunites him with acclaimed actor Dhanush.
full_content: Kriti Sanon Stars Opposite Dhanush In Aanand L Rai's Tere Ishk Mein? BIG Announcement On Tuesday Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:15 IST Aanand L. Rai is set to enthrall audiences with his upcoming film Tere Ishk Mein, a tale of love and obsession that reunites him with acclaimed actor Dhanush. reset Follow us on Google News Speculation surrounds Kriti Sanon as the potential female lead in Dhanush's highly anticipated film Tere Ishk Mein. Known for his heartfelt storytelling in Raanjhanaa and Tanu Weds Manu, acclaimed filmmaker Aanand L. Rai is gearing up to mesmerize audiences once again with his upcoming project, Tere Ishk Mein. This much-anticipated film marks a reunion with celebrated actor Dhanush and promises a gripping tale of love and obsession. While details remain under wraps, excitement has surged over the potential female lead, with recent buzz hinting that Kriti Sanon might take on the role. On their official social media handles, Colour Yellow Productions shared a tantalizing new teaser for the film. The teaser, featuring a poignant voiceover by an unidentified actress, has further fueled speculation. In the clip, she poignantly questions, “Shankar, Ishq mein sirf ladke hi marte hai kya? Kuch ladkiya bhi kaleja rakhti hai jaan dene ka." The post accompanying the teaser read: related stories “The flames of desire will ignite the truth—unveiling the answer tomorrow! ❤️‍🔥 #TereIshkMein #WorldOfRaanjhanaa." The flames of desire will ignite the truth—unveiling the answer tomorrow! ❤️‍🔥 #TereIshkMein #WorldOfRaanjhanaa Gulshan Kumar, T-Series and Colour Yellow PresentA Colour Yellow ProductionTere Ishk MeinAn A.R. Rahman MusicalA Film By: Aanand L RaiProduced By: Aanand L Rai,… pic.twitter.com/0QtpmWyPVy — Colour Yellow Productions (@cypplOfficial) January 27, 2025 For months, the industry has been abuzz with rumors about the female lead. Among the names making rounds, Kriti Sanon and Triptii Dimri have emerged as frontrunners. While nothing has been officially confirmed, Kriti Sanon’s name has garnered significant attention. Reports from last year hinted at Kriti being in advanced talks for the role , and recent sightings of her at Aanand L. Rai’s office with a script in hand have only added fuel to the fire. If Kriti is indeed announced as the female lead, it will mark her first collaboration with Dhanush and Rai, a pairing that has already sparked excitement among fans and critics alike. Rai has revealed that Tere Ishk Mein shares thematic roots with his 2013 masterpiece, Raanjhanaa. “It is from the world of Raanjhanaa, but… it’s an expansion rather than an extension. It enhances the emotional depth with a new narrative," he explained. The film, written by Himanshu Sharma and Neeraj Yadav, promises to retain the passionate love and intensity that defined Raanjhanaa while exploring a fresh storyline. Rai has described the project as a deeply personal exploration of love and tragedy, reflecting his own evolution as a filmmaker. The core team of Tere Ishk Mein brings together Dhanush, AR Rahman, lyricist Irshad Kamil, and writer Himanshu Sharma, all of whom were integral to the success of Raanjhanaa. However, Rai has assured fans that the similarities end there. “While you may get the fragrance of Raanjhanaa in terms of its feel and energy, this is a different story altogether," he said. The film, which faced delays due to Dhanush’s prior commitments, is set to begin production in October 2024, with a theatrical release targeted for 2025. The announcement of the female lead has only heightened anticipation, as audiences eagerly await details about this next chapter in Rai’s cinematic universe. As speculation swirls and excitement mounts, one thing is certain: Tere Ishk Mein promises to be a visually and emotionally stunning addition to Aanand L. Rai’s legacy. Whether it’s Kriti Sanon, Triptii Dimri, or a surprise contender who takes the stage opposite Dhanush, the film is poised to redefine the boundaries of romance and obsession on the big screen. tags : Aanand L.Rai bollywood dhanush regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:10 IST News movies Kriti Sanon Stars Opposite Dhanush In Aanand L Rai's Tere Ishk Mein? title: Watch: Taylor Swift And Travis Kelce Kiss After Kansas Chiefs Book Place In Super Bowl
summary: The Kansas City Chiefs punched their ticket to the Super Bowl once again on Sunday, January 26.
full_content: Watch: Taylor Swift And Travis Kelce Kiss After Kansas Chiefs Book Place In Super Bowl Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:05 IST The Kansas City Chiefs punched their ticket to the Super Bowl once again on Sunday, January 26. reset Follow us on Google News The real showstopper came when Taylor Swift pulled Kelce gently to kiss him.  (Photo Credits: Instagram) Love filled the air at Arrowhead Stadium as Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce celebrated an unforgettable night together. On Sunday, January 26, the Kansas City Chiefs secured their spot in the Super Bowl with a thrilling 32-29 victory over the Buffalo Bills in the AFC Championship game. This sets the stage for an exciting rematch with the Philadelphia Eagles, reminiscent of the electrifying 2023 championship showdown. Taylor Swift, 35, looked radiant in a stylish Louis Vuitton ensemble as she joined Kelce’s mom, Donna, on the field for the postgame celebrations. The two women were all smiles as they embraced the moment, making their way to find Kelce amidst the sea of red and gold jubilation. During the festivities, Kelce, 35, kept the energy alive, breaking into a spirited rendition of KC and the Sunshine Band’s classic hit, Get Down Tonight. His impromptu performance, a response to being asked about the team’s chance at a three-peat, had fans buzzing with excitement, reports People. related stories But the real showstopper came when Swift pulled Kelce gently to kiss him amid a cascade of celebratory confetti. The two laughed and chatted on the field, with Taylor Swift playfully brushing back his hair as they revelled in the joy of the moment. Watch it here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by NFL (@nfl) The game itself was a heart-stopper. The Chiefs and Bills were locked in a tie late in the fourth quarter, but Harrison Butker’s clutch field goal gave Kansas City the lead they needed to seal the win. Swift’s presence at Kelce’s games seems to bring a sprinkle of magic; since the couple started dating, the Chiefs have triumphed in several crucial matchups, including last year’s AFC Championship and Super Bowl, reports People. Swift’s dedication to supporting Kelce extends far beyond Kansas City. After last year’s Super Bowl win, she famously flew from Japan mid-tour to join the team’s celebrations. Now, the Chiefs stand on the brink of history, aiming to become the first team to win three consecutive Super Bowl titles—unless the Eagles can clip their wings. The stage is set for an epic showdown in New Orleans on Sunday, February 9, at 6:30 p.m. ET, airing live on Fox. Football fans and Swifties alike will be eagerly watching as this power couple continues to make headlines both on and off the field. tags : entertainment hollywood Taylor Swift Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:05 IST News movies Watch: Taylor Swift And Travis Kelce Kiss After Kansas Chiefs Book Place In Super Bowl Read More
