title: James Gunn’s Superman New Teaser Out: David Corenswet Soars Into Action
summary: Accompanying these thrilling visuals is a beautifully reimagined rendition of John Williams' iconic Superman theme.
full_content: James Gunn’s Superman New Teaser Out: David Corenswet Soars Into Action Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:01 IST Accompanying these thrilling visuals is a beautifully reimagined rendition of John Williams' iconic Superman theme. reset Follow us on Google News Superman is set to release worldwide on July 11, 2025.  (Photo Credits: X) James Gunn’s highly anticipated Superman just released a fresh teaser and it’s already making waves. Clocking in at 30 seconds, this electrifying spot delivers a sneak peek at David Corenswet as Superman, showing breathtaking flight sequences that are bound to leave fans in awe. One of the most impressive moments in the teaser features Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor, donning sleek sunglasses as he ventures into the Arctic, seemingly on a quest to uncover Superman’s hidden lair. Accompanying these thrilling visuals is a beautifully reimagined rendition of John Williams’ iconic Superman theme, blending nostalgic melodies with stunning new footage. related stories The teaser begins with a dramatic shot of a battered and weary Clark Kent, Superman, summoning his loyal companion, Krypto the Superdog. It swiftly transitions to a heartfelt scene where the Man of Steel saves a young girl, reminding us of his enduring heroism. View this post on Instagram A post shared by James Gunn (@jamesgunn) Fans are treated to more snippets of jaw-dropping action, revisiting highlights from the earlier trailer. We see a fire-breathing monster wreaking havoc in Metropolis, Superman shattering what appears to be a glass cage, a boy proudly waving a Superman flag and our hero holding a wrecked robot. There’s even a tension-filled moment on a baseball field, a thrilling rescue by Krypto, and a dreamy romantic scene of Superman and Lois Lane, floating gracefully in a tender embrace. But what truly steals the show is a stunning sequence of Superman in flight. Set against the icy backdrop of the Arctic, the Man of Steel manoeuvres effortlessly through massive glaciers. Captured from both behind and head-on, these exhilarating shots evoke the heart-pounding aerial thrills of Top Gun: Maverick, but with a superhuman twist. James Gunn’s Superman represents the third reimagining of the iconic character and serves as the starting point for a fresh DC Universe, completely distinct from the DCEU, where Henry Cavill previously donned the red cape. This reboot brings an impressive ensemble cast, featuring Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Skyler Gisondo, Sara Sampaio, María Gabriela de Faría, Wendell Pierce, Alan Tudyk, Pruitt Taylor Vince, and Neva Howell. With its perfect mix of drama, action, and nostalgia, this teaser offers a glimpse into what promises to be a cinematic spectacle. Mark your calendars as Superman is set to soar onto screens worldwide on July 11, 2025. tags : entertainment hollywood james gunn movie Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:01 IST News movies James Gunn’s Superman New Teaser Out: David Corenswet Soars Into Action Read More

title: Gracie Abrams Slams Fan's Petition To Drop Dora Jar's Opening Act At The Secret Of Us Tour
summary: Dora Jar recently announced that she will be performing as the opening act of Gracie Abrams' upcoming tour, The Secret Of Us.
full_content: Gracie Abrams Slams Fan's Petition To Drop Dora Jar's Opening Act At The Secret Of Us Tour Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:29 IST Dora Jar recently announced that she will be performing as the opening act of Gracie Abrams' upcoming tour, The Secret Of Us. reset Follow us on Google News Abrams has come out in support of Dora Jar after the petition. (Photo Credits: Instagram) While it has been long since Gracie Abrams announced her upcoming The Secret Of Us Tour, it has now been revealed that Dora Jar is the opener for her concerts in Europe. While the decision came as a big surprise for all of her fans, a section appeared unhappy with one even launching a petition to replace Jar. On Friday, January 24, alt-pop artist Dora Jar confirmed that she would be opening for Abrams on the tour, set to take place in February and March across London, Manchester, Dublin, Glasgow, Nottingham, and more. Soon after the announcement, a screenshot of the petition created on Change.org went viral on social media with the pseudonym Dexter Morgan. The user claimed that many Abrams fans have been baffled by Jar’s opening act, further adding that did not recognise her and won’t be able to familiarise themselves with her songs. The petition even suggested Abrams choose a “more well-known and energetic artist or band" for her opening act. related stories Gracie Abrams defends Dora Jar after a petition circulating calling for Jar’s removal as the opening act of her ‘The Secret of Us Tour’: “Just hearing about this absolute ridiculousness . . . so wildly uncool and bizarre and also just does not remotely add up. I’ve only seen… pic.twitter.com/WPUX9aLwN8 — Buzzing Pop (@BuzzingPop) January 26, 2025 “Many fans, including myself, are baffled by the recent announcement … We are perplexed as we do not recognize her, and with less than two weeks till the tour, it’s virtually impossible to familiarize ourselves with her slow-paced songs. For a memorable concert experience, an opening act should set the mood and get the crowd excited, but Dora’s slow tempo songs may not achieve this goal," the post read. While the petition has faced the wrath of many Jar and Abrams fans, the That’s So True singer herself clapped back at the news, calling it out as “wildly uncool and bizarre." Reacting to the news in a post by stereogram Abrams Road, “Just hearing about this absolute ridiculousness . . . so wildly uncool and bizarre and also just does not remotely add up. I’ve only seen everyone’s total excitement and I couldn’t be luckier or prouder to share a stage with this talented wonder. Stream everything she’s ever made whether or not you’re coming to the show. Dora forever and ever." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Stereogum (@stereogum) On the other hand, Jar has also shared the most polite response to the petition against her. In response to a fan’s tweet on the microblogging platform, the singer stated that she is ready to perform for all her openhearted fans. Don’t worry this doesn’t bum me out! I’m hear to perform for all the music loving open hearted fans. those who aren’t interested can go buy merch while I’m playing (but they might as well let me entertain them tho..;)) an overwhelming amount of fans have been so kind & excited ❤️— Dora Jar (@dorajar_) January 25, 2025 Speaking about Gracie Abrams’ upcoming tour, she will kickstart at the Palacio Vistalegre in Madrid in February, before making her stop across Europe. Abrams will make her way to the UK in March 2025. tags : entertainment hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:00 IST News movies Gracie Abrams Slams Fan's Petition To Drop Dora Jar's Opening Act At The Secret Of Us Tour Read More

title: Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case: Mumbai Police Arrest Woman In West Bengal
summary: Mumbai Police on Monday conducted a search operation in West Bengal’s Nadia district and arrested a woman in connection with the attack on Saif Ali Khan.
full_content: Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case: Mumbai Police Arrest Woman In West Bengal Published By : Ronit Singh PTI Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:44 IST Mumbai Police on Monday conducted a search operation in West Bengal’s Nadia district and arrested a woman in connection with the attack on Saif Ali Khan. reset Follow us on Google News Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case | File Image Mumbai Police on Monday conducted a search operation in West Bengal’s Nadia district and arrested a woman in connection with the attack on Bollywood superstar Saif Ali Khan, a source said. Investigation revealed that the SIM used by the Bangladeshi national, who was arrested earlier in Mumbai for the attack, was registered in the name of the woman, he said. related stories A two-member team of Mumbai Police arrived in West Bengal on Sunday. “A woman was arrested by Mumbai Police from Chapra in Nadia district in the Saif Ali attack case. They may apply for transit remand to take her to Mumbai," the source in West Bengal Police told PTI. The woman, Khukhumoni Jahangir Sheikh, was known to the arrested Bangladeshi, Shariful Fakir. “Fakir had entered India illegally through the India-Bangladesh border near Siliguri in north Bengal and got in touch with this woman. She is actually a resident of Andulia in Murshidabad district of West Bengal," he said. In the early hours of January 16, Khan was stabbed six times at his Bandra residence in Mumbai. The actor was rushed to the Lilavati Hospital where he underwent spinal and plastic surgery for his wounds. He was released from the hospital on January 21. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - PTI ) Location : Kolkata, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:44 IST News movies Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case: Mumbai Police Arrest Woman In West Bengal Read More

title: Anuv Jain and Zaeden Light Up Hyderabad With Friendship And Music At Yaari Jam
summary: Hyderabad kicked off 2025 with an unforgettable evening of music and friendship at The House of McDowell’s Soda Yaari Jam.
full_content: Anuv Jain and Zaeden Light Up Hyderabad With Friendship And Music At Yaari Jam Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:44 IST Hyderabad kicked off 2025 with an unforgettable evening of music and friendship at The House of McDowell’s Soda Yaari Jam. reset Follow us on Google News Anuv Jain and Zaeden lit up Hyderabad at The House of McDowell’s Soda Yaari Jam, blending music and friendship in a magical evening. Hyderabad experienced an unforgettable evening of music, friendship, and pure magic as The House of McDowell’s Soda Yaari Jam kicked off its 2025 edition in the city on January 27. Organized by TribeVibe Entertainment, a BookMyShow enterprise, the multi-city musical tour featured India’s beloved independent artists Anuv Jain and Zaeden, who captivated the audience with their soulful melodies and electrifying beats. Following the success of Yaari Jam’s debut in August 2024, this latest edition brought the celebration of friendship and music to Hyderabad in its first leg for the new year. The event was more than just a concert—it was a heartfelt tribute to yaari (friendship). From touching dedications by the artists to heartwarming stories shared by friends in the audience, the night was filled with positive vibes that celebrated the bonds of companionship. related stories The headlining acts delivered a spectacular experience, with Anuv Jain’s soulful performances and Zaeden’s high-energy beats creating a perfect harmony that left the crowd mesmerized. Speaking about the event, Anuv Jain shared, “The crowd’s energy and the shared connection at the Yaari Jam event was infectious. The night was a celebration of music and friendship, and I can’t wait to bring this incredible vibe to Kolkata and Guwahati next!" Zaeden echoed his excitement, saying, “The vibe at Yaari Jam was electric! The audience’s love and energy made the night unforgettable. I’m excited to continue this journey and create more memories in the upcoming shows." The event wasn’t just about the music—it was also about celebrating the transformative power of friendship. Varun Koorichh, Vice President and Portfolio Head, Marketing, Diageo India, emphasized this in his remarks: “We are elated to bring Yaari Jam to more cities across India following its phenomenal success in Mumbai. At its heart, Yaari Jam celebrates the transformative power of friendship—a bond that uplifts, empowers, and inspires. This year, we’ve curated an electrifying lineup of artists to ensure an unforgettable experience for all our friends. We invite you to join us in celebrating the spirit of friendship as we create cherished memories and bring friends together nationwide." With its debut in Hyderabad, The House of McDowell’s Soda Yaari Jam has set the stage for an exciting 2025 tour, with Kolkata and Guwahati next in line. As the tour continues, audiences across the country can look forward to unforgettable evenings of music, friendship, and memories, featuring some of India’s most talented artists. tags : Anuv Jain Indie Music music Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:44 IST News movies Anuv Jain and Zaeden Light Up Hyderabad With Friendship And Music At Yaari Jam Read More

title: Karan Tacker Can’t Get Over The Coldplay Fever, We Don't Blame Him
summary: Karan Tacker shared a stunning video of Coldplay's performance along with one where he is seen enjoying it.
full_content: Karan Tacker Can’t Get Over The Coldplay Fever, We Don't Blame Him Published By : Chirag Sehgal Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:39 IST Karan Tacker shared a stunning video of Coldplay's performance along with one where he is seen enjoying it. reset Follow us on Google News Karan Tacker was seen in Kakee: The Bihar Chapter. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The Coldplay fever had taken over the fans this January, as the band performed at multiple locations in India. They had back-to-back shows in Mumbai and one in Ahmedabad. While most fans cheered loud for the band, many popular celebrities were also spotted at the shows. Among others, Karan Tacker also graced one of Coldplay’s shows in Mumbai and shared a series of pictures on social media recently. He expressed how it has become difficult for him to get over the magnificent show. Karan shared a stunning video of the band’s performance along with one where he is seen enjoying it. There was a still of him making a heart sign with his fingers while another one captured the mesmerising lighting. In the caption, he wrote, “Still reeling from the Coldplay concert…Swipe to feel the vibe!" related stories Coldplay performed in a number of concerts in India as part of their Music Of The Spheres World Tour. On Sunday, they finished their India tour at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. Coldplay began their India tour in Mumbai on January 18. The band played at the DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai on January 18, 19 and 21, followed by a concert in Ahmedabad. Aside from lead singer Chris Martin, the band includes guitarist Jonny Buckland, bassist Guy Berryman, drummer percussionist Will Champion and manager Phil Harvey. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Karan Tacker (@karantacker) For Karan Tacker, he started his career in television and gradually shifted to OTT. He established himself on the platforms with shows like Special Ops and Khakee – The Bihar Chapter. Speaking about getting opportunities in web space and how being a TV actor impacted his OTT career, Karan told Hindustan Times, “It’s an open platform, everyone can work here, and everyone should work here. I feel that doesn’t bother me at all. If you have an actor or an actress from films who does not have a great box office record or might not be the best artist or the best fit also for the job, but just because the tag of a film actor gives them that opportunity, that is not right. That obsession needs to be dialed down a little bit." Karan played the role of IPS Amit Lodha in Khakee: The Bihar Chapter and Farooq Ali in both installments of Special OPS. tags : Coldplay entertainment karan tacker Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:39 IST News movies Karan Tacker Can’t Get Over The Coldplay Fever, We Don't Blame Him Read More

title: Mrs Trailer: Bride Sanya Malhotra Strives To Keep Her Dreams Alive In A Patriarchal Household | Watch
summary: The film premieres on ZEE5 on February 7.
full_content: Mrs Trailer: Bride Sanya Malhotra Strives To Keep Her Dreams Alive In A Patriarchal Household | Watch Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:29 IST The film premieres on ZEE5 on February 7. reset Follow us on Google News Sanya Malhotra as Richa. The trailer of Sanya Malhotra’s upcoming film, Mrs., is finally out now. The film is a powerful and thought-provoking narrative that delves into the everyday struggles of women while tackling critical issues such as gender inequality, societal expectations, and personal growth. Starring Sanya Malhotra in the lead role, Mrs. follows the journey of a young bride who finds herself drowning in household chores, all while her aspirations of becoming a dancer slowly fade into the background. Produced by Jio Studios in association with Baweja Studios, this film sheds light on the patriarchal mindset and a woman’s silent struggle to preserve her sense of self. related stories Watch the trailer here: Sanya Malhotra said, “When I read the script for Mrs., I was excited to bring this powerful story to life—it’s a reflection of the everyday struggles many women face, and it’s about time we start talking about it. My character’s journey is one of quiet resilience, as she goes from doing the dishes to dreaming big again. It’s been a rewarding challenge to play someone who dares to break free from the routine and find her voice, and I hope the audience feels inspired by her transformation!" Arati Kadav, director of Mrs., said, “Directing Mrs. has been an incredibly rewarding experience. It’s a story that speaks to the everyday challenges faced by women, but it’s also about breaking free from the confines of tradition and finding one’s true voice. The opportunity to present this narrative allowed me to explore universal themes of identity, ambition, and the struggle to hold onto one’s dreams. I am grateful to Harman Baweja, our producer for choosing me to tell this story. Partnering with ZEE5 for this film has been amazing, as it allows us to showcase this powerful story to a global audience. Moreover, Sanya in the role of a young hopeful bride truly embodies the joy, vulnerability and strength of the character, and I couldn’t have asked for a better lead to tell this story" Nishant Dahiya shared, “Playing Richa’s husband in Mrs. was both challenging and eye-opening. The story delves into the subtle dynamics of everyday life and relationships, reflecting upon unspoken struggles that often go unnoticed. At the same time, it beautifully captures the nuances of relationships, making it a relatable and heartfelt tale. Working with Sanya Malhotra and Arati Kadav was an absolute joy, and I truly believe audiences will connect with the film’s honest and engaging narrative. I’m excited for everyone to watch Mrs. on ZEE5 and be part of this unique journey." The film premieres on ZEE5 on February 7. tags : bollywood Sanya Malhotra Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:29 IST News movies Mrs Trailer: Bride Sanya Malhotra Strives To Keep Her Dreams Alive In A Patriarchal Household | Watch Read More

title: Anoushka Shankar’s Latest Track ‘Hiraeth’ Strikes A Chord With Listeners, Blending Hope And Belonging
summary: Anoushka Shankar’s latest track, Hiraeth, has mesmerized listeners with its themes of hope, longing, and belonging. Co-written with Alam Khan and Sarathy Korwar, the song is part of her trilogy Chapter III: We Return to Light.
full_content: Anoushka Shankar’s Latest Track ‘Hiraeth’ Strikes A Chord With Listeners, Blending Hope And Belonging Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:28 IST Anoushka Shankar’s latest track, Hiraeth, has mesmerized listeners with its themes of hope, longing, and belonging. Co-written with Alam Khan and Sarathy Korwar, the song is part of her trilogy Chapter III: We Return to Light. reset Follow us on Google News Anoushka Shankar’s Hiraeth blends hope and longing in a soul-stirring melody, marking the finale of her trilogy, Chapter III: We Return to Light. Sitar virtuoso Anoushka Shankar has once again captivated audiences with her latest track, Hiraeth. Released over a week ago, the song—co-written with Alam Khan and Sarathy Korwar—beautifully explores themes of hope, longing, and belonging. The response from listeners has been overwhelmingly positive, with fans praising its emotional depth and evocative soundscapes. Taking to social media to reflect on the release, the 11-time Grammy nominee shared a heartfelt note explaining the song’s meaning and its place within her musical journey. “Hiraeth is a beautiful Welsh word describing a longing for a place or a person; it marks the third and final installment of my trilogy of mini-albums, Chapter III: We Return to Light," she wrote. She added, “It feels ironic that this chapter, meant to be the optimistic ending to a dark journey, was released during such a strange, worrying week. But maybe that’s not ironic at all—maybe this is when we most need to cling to hope." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Anoushka Shankar (@anoushkashankarofficial) The emotional resonance of Hiraeth has clearly struck a chord with listeners. Fans flooded the song’s comment section with praise, describing it as “soul-stirring" and “exceptionally beautiful." One user wrote, “Dragged me to another dimension and brought me back to earth," while another commented, “It is divine… I’m dancing in my mind while listening to it." A Celebration of Musical Legacy The release of Hiraeth also coincides with a milestone in Anoushka Shankar’s career as she celebrates 30 years of redefining Indian classical music on the global stage. To mark the occasion, the sitarist hosted a listening party in India, offering fans and media a sneak peek into her upcoming album Chapter III: We Return to Light. The event was met with enthusiastic applause, with attendees lauding both the album’s artistry and Shankar’s unparalleled sitar prowess. Looking ahead, Anoushka Shankar is preparing for a busy schedule in 2025. She will embark on a U.S. tour in March, followed by an India tour in December, as she continues to expand her global footprint and bring her unique blend of Indian classical and contemporary music to audiences worldwide. tags : Anoushka Shankar Hindustani classical music music Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:28 IST News movies Anoushka Shankar’s Latest Track ‘Hiraeth’ Strikes A Chord With Listeners, Blending Hope And Belonging Read More

title: Walk It Out Rapper Unk's Cause Of Death Revealed
summary: Days after DJ Unk's tragic passing, his wife, Sherkita Long-Platt, revealed that the Walk It Out hitmaker died from cardiac arrest while sleeping.
full_content: Walk It Out Rapper Unk's Cause Of Death Revealed Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:55 IST Days after DJ Unk's tragic passing, his wife, Sherkita Long-Platt, revealed that the Walk It Out hitmaker died from cardiac arrest while sleeping. reset Follow us on Google News DJ Unk was previously hospitalised for the same condition in 2009. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Anthony Leonard Platt, popularly known as DJ Unk, passed away on January 24, 2025, at the age of 45. His wife, Sherkita Long-Platt, initially confirmed his death on Facebook without disclosing the cause. Days later, she revealed that the Walk It Out hitmaker died of cardiac arrest while sleeping. Addressing rumours, she firmly denied any connection between his passing and substance abuse. Tragically, this wasn’t DJ Unk’s first battle with heart health issues, as he had previously been hospitalised for the same condition in 2009. In an interview with TMZ, Sherkita Long-Platt addressed rumours surrounding her husband DJ Unk’s passing, specifically dismissing false claims that his death was linked to drug use. She emphasised that the musician never used drugs. Sherkita Long-Platt previously shared an emotional message on Facebook and wrote, “Please respect me and my family. I just lost my husband and my kids just lost their father. Our life will never be the same. I LOVE YOU ANTHONY FOREVER." related stories Big Oomp Records paid tribute to DJ Unk on Instagram, extending their deepest condolences to his family, friends, and fans. They wrote, “We extend our deepest condolences to his family, friends and the countless fans who were touched by his artistry and spirit. DJ Unk was not just a legendary DJ, rapper and producer, but a true cornerstone of our label and the imprint that he left globally will be cherished forever. His legacy will continue to inspire artists, DJs and fans alike for years to come. His energy, creativity and commitment to the craft will never be forgotten. We ask that you keep his family in your thoughts and prayers during this difficult time. Rest in peace, Unk. You will forever be missed." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Big Oomp Records (@bigoomprecords) In a 2010 interview with XXL, DJ Unk revealed that he had experienced a heart attack in the past and revealed what he felt. He said, “I had some medical issues going on from not eating the right food and that just come from when I stopped taking care of myself. I got to get healthy not just for my sake, but also for my kids and for my wife. It comes from not exercising, from not eating right. Everything I do every day I try to make something happen in my household. I constantly be on the go, I constantly be on airplanes, in different weather and you know it just took a toll on me. It was stress." He recounted a terrifying experience where he woke up one morning with pain on the left side of his chest, which he initially dismissed as a pulled muscle. However, as the day progressed, the pain intensified, and he found himself unable to move his left arm. Concerned, his wife suggested he rest in bed, but the discomfort continued. A doctor later informed him that if he had ignored the warning signs and gone to sleep, the situation could have turned critical, as he might not have woken up at all. tags : entertainment rapper Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:20 IST News movies Walk It Out Rapper Unk's Cause Of Death Revealed Read More

title: Ajay Devgn And Sanjay Dutt Set For Epic Faceoff In Luv Ranjan’s Ranger? Here's What We Know
summary: Ajay Devgn teams up with Jagan Shakti for the first time in Ranger, an action-packed jungle adventure produced by Luv Ranjan.
full_content: Ajay Devgn And Sanjay Dutt Set For Epic Faceoff In Luv Ranjan’s Ranger? Here's What We Know Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:17 IST Ajay Devgn teams up with Jagan Shakti for the first time in Ranger, an action-packed jungle adventure produced by Luv Ranjan. reset Follow us on Google News Ajay Devgn and Sanjay Dutt face off in Jagan Shakti’s action-packed jungle adventure Ranger, produced by Luv Ranjan. In early 2024, reports revealed that Ajay Devgn will collaborate with director Jagan Shakti for the first time on an action-packed jungle adventure titled Ranger. Produced by Luv Ranjan and Ankur Garg, the film is set to begin production in Summer 2025, with Ajay playing the role of a forest ranger. Now, sources confirm that Sanjay Dutt has been cast as the antagonist, setting the stage for a high-octane faceoff between the two powerhouses. According to insider details close to PinkVilla, the Ajay-Sanjay clash in Ranger promises to be a spectacle like no other. “The villain’s character has an aura that perfectly matches Sanjay Dutt’s larger-than-life persona. Given the jungle setting, the team is designing distinct looks for both Ajay and Sanjay to complement their roles," revealed a source. The film is expected to be mounted on a grand scale, with Jagan Shakti exploring cutting-edge VFX to recreate dense forests and wildlife. related stories Ajay Devgn, currently wrapping up De De Pyaar De 2 and Dhamaal 4, is also gearing up for the release of Raid 2. Meanwhile, Ranger will mark a refreshing change, pitting him against Sanjay Dutt in an epic rivalry. “This is the first time Ajay and Sanju will face off in a film, and it’s set to be a highlight of Ranger. The pre-production is in full swing, and the casting of a strong ensemble is underway," the source added. Ajay Devgn’s last film, Singham Again, proved to be a box office juggernaut, raking in over ₹240 crore. With a packed schedule including Son of Sardaar 2 and De De Pyaar De 2, his lineup is a treat for fans. As for Ranger, it promises to be a visual extravaganza that fans of both stars won’t want to miss. tags : Ajay Devgn bollywood Luv Ranjan Sanjay Dutt Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:17 IST News movies Ajay Devgn And Sanjay Dutt Set For Epic Faceoff In Luv Ranjan’s Ranger? title: Machine Gun Kelly Hopes For ‘Another Chance’ With Megan Fox Before Welcoming Their First Child: Report
summary: Even though Megan Fox is upset with fiance Machine Gun Kelly, she wants him to stay involved in their baby’s life.
full_content: Machine Gun Kelly Hopes For ‘Another Chance’ With Megan Fox Before Welcoming Their First Child: Report Published By : Kashvi Raj Singh Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:33 IST Even though Megan Fox is upset with fiance Machine Gun Kelly, she wants him to stay involved in their baby’s life. reset Follow us on Google News Megan Fox is planning to demand custody payments from Machine Gun Kelly. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Megan Fox and Machine Gun Kelly are facing a challenging time as they prepare for the arrival of their first child together. After their recent split, a new report claims that Kelly is still trying for “another chance" as Megan seeks full custody of the unborn child. An insider shared that even though Megan is upset with MGK, she wants him to stay involved in their baby’s life because of his strong relationship with his older daughter. She is okay with him visiting their child but wants the visits to be supervised for now. Looking at MGK’s growing career and $25 million net worth, Megan is also planning to ask for custody payments, the insider revealed. Speaking with In Touch Weekly, the source said, “As upset as Megan is with MGK, she’s not going to try and keep him out of their baby girl’s life. She loves the relationship he has with his older daughter and would never try and deprive him of that with their daughter. But she does want full custody." related stories The insider further noted that Megan Fox is determined to have full custody of their baby, as she believes that Machine Gun Kelly isn’t ready to take care of the child. “She’s fine with plenty of visitation, although she wants it to be supervised for the time being," added the source. Currently, both Megan and MGK, who started dating in 2020, are in a difficult spot. Kelly is reportedly not ready to leave their relationship and is still hoping Megan will “give him yet another chance." The insider explained, “She’s staying firm right now that it is over, but with their history of going back and forth and the insane connection and attraction they have, no one would be shocked if she were to break down and try again. She’s extremely attached to him, right now she’s adamant that there’s no going back but the truth is that could change. It’s all so intense and dramatic right now, what she’s going through is beyond tough." This will be Megan Fox and Machine Gun Kelly’s first child together. The actress has three children, Noah, Bodhi and Journey, from her previous marriage with Brian Austin Green. On the other hand, MGK shares a daughter Casie Colson Baker with his ex-wife, Emma Cannon. tags : hollywood Machine Gun Kelly Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 17:07 IST News movies Machine Gun Kelly Hopes For ‘Another Chance’ With Megan Fox Before Welcoming Their First Child: Report Read More

title: Sharda Sinha's Son On Her Posthumous Padma Vibhushan Honour: 'This Was Long Awaited'
summary: Sharda Sinha has been posthumously awarded the Padma Vibhushan. Her songs, especially those performed during the revered Chhath Mahaparv, are etched in the hearts of fans.
full_content: Sharda Sinha's Son On Her Posthumous Padma Vibhushan Honour: 'This Was Long Awaited' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:49 IST Sharda Sinha has been posthumously awarded the Padma Vibhushan. Her songs, especially those performed during the revered Chhath Mahaparv, are etched in the hearts of fans. reset Follow us on Google News Sharda Sinha's honour brought a bittersweet moment of pride and remembrance for her family.  (Photo Credits: X) Sharda Sinha, a name synonymous with the soul of Bhojpuri and Maithili folk music, has been posthumously awarded the Padma Vibhushan, India’s second-highest civilian honour. This accolade serves as a testament to her lifelong dedication to preserving and promoting the rich cultural heritage of Bihar and beyond. The honour brought a bittersweet moment of pride and remembrance for her family. Her son, Anshuman Sinha , spoke to the media on the occasion. “It is a matter of great pride for Bihar. It is a milestone in Bihar’s history to have achieved all three highest honours in the field of folk music," he said. Expressing gratitude, he told ANI, “I thank the Central government as this will convey a message to the upcoming generation that you can gain respect all over the world through folk music… This was long awaited and I heartily accept it… I congratulate the entire nation for the honour bestowed upon folk culture." related stories Known as the Bihar Kokila, Sharda Sinha’s melodious voice was an intrinsic part of Bihar’s culture. Her songs, especially those performed during the revered Chhath Mahaparv, are etched in the hearts of millions. For decades, her music served as the soundtrack of this sacred festival, her renditions transcending regional boundaries to evoke collective reverence for tradition. Her passing on November 5, 2024, at the age of 72, marked the end of an era. After a valiant fight against multiple myeloma, her health took a turn for the worse, leading to her final days on life support. The news of her demise sent ripples of sorrow across the nation, with an outpouring of tributes from all walks of life. Prime Minister Narendra Modi paid homage on social media. Taking to his official X handle, he wrote, “Her contribution to Bhojpuri and Maithili folk music is immense and the echo of her melodious songs will last forever. Her demise is an irreparable loss to the world of music." सुप्रसिद्ध लोक गायिका शारदा सिन्हा जी के निधन से अत्यंत दुख हुआ है। उनके गाए मैथिली और भोजपुरी के लोकगीत पिछले कई दशकों से बेहद लोकप्रिय रहे हैं। आस्था के महापर्व छठ से जुड़े उनके सुमधुर गीतों की गूंज भी सदैव बनी रहेगी। उनका जाना संगीत जगत के लिए एक अपूरणीय क्षति है। शोक की इस… pic.twitter.com/sOaLvUOnrW — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) November 5, 2024 Sinha’s musical career, which began in the 1970s, was nothing short of illustrious. Over the decades, her voice became a beacon of cultural pride, bridging the gap between regional folk traditions and national recognition. Her songs, steeped in the essence of rural India, were both a celebration and a preservation of heritage. Previously honoured with the Padma Bhushan, Sharda Sinha’s journey stands as a shining example of how art rooted in tradition can achieve universal acclaim. Her music, deeply embedded in the ethos of her land, continues to inspire new generations to cherish their roots. While the Padma Vibhushan may have arrived posthumously, it is a fitting tribute to a life dedicated to art and culture. Sharda Sinha’s legacy remains alive in the hearts of her listeners, a living echo of her timeless voice that still sings of the spirit and soul of India. tags : entertainment folk Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:49 IST News movies Sharda Sinha's Son On Her Posthumous Padma Vibhushan Honour: 'This Was Long Awaited' Read More

title: Oscar-Winning Composer Hans Zimmer To Recreate Saudi National Anthem With 'Different Instruments'
summary: The chairman of Saudi Arabia's General Entertainment Authority has discussed the plans with Hans Zimmer.
full_content: Oscar-Winning Composer Hans Zimmer To Recreate Saudi National Anthem With 'Different Instruments' Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:34 IST The chairman of Saudi Arabia's General Entertainment Authority has discussed the plans with Hans Zimmer. reset Follow us on Google News Zimmer recently performed at the Riyadh Season. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Hollywood’s Oscar-winning music composer Hans Zimmer might soon create or recreate a country’s national anthem and it is none other than Saudi Arabia. As per the latest reports, the country’s chairman of the General Entertainment Authority (GEA) Turki Alalshikh met Zimmer and discussed various projects that he could potentially work on including recreating the national anthem by using different instruments. The Chant of the Saudi Nation, the country’s current anthem was written in 1947 by the Egyptian composer Abd al-Rahman al-Khatib. After decades of its adoption, it seems like the country is ready for a cultural change by bringing in an award-winning composer, best known for his soaring scores in classic films like Inception, Interstellar, Dunkirk, Gladiator, and more. related stories التقيت اليوم بشخص يعتبر من أعظم الموسيقيين في عصرنا الحاضر…الأسطورة Hans Zimmer …تناقشنا كثيرا في العديد من المشاريع المستقبلية التي أتمنى أن ترى النور قريبا… ومنها إعادة توزيع النشيد الوطني السعودي بآلات مختلفة وأيضا عمل مقطوعة موسيقية بمسمى Arabia مستوحاة من بلدي الغالي… pic.twitter.com/KoI26t4iRl — TURKI ALALSHIKH (@Turki_alalshikh) January 20, 2025 Alalshikh also shared a picture with Zimmer on his official X handle, calling him one of the “greatest musicians" of the time. He discussed several musical projects which included a Saudi-inspired musical called Arabia, a concert, and a soundtrack for the upcoming film, The Battle of Yarmouk. “We discussed a lot about many future projects that I hope will see the light of day soon… including redistributing the Saudi national anthem with different instruments, as well as making a musical piece called Arabia inspired by my dear country, and also making a very large concert with a new idea for the Riyadh season in the coming years… I also presented to him the stage we have reached in the film The Battle of Yarmouk (Khalid bin Al-Walid) and the possibility of his participation in composing the soundtrack for it," a part of the tweet read. Alalshikh also noted that they agreed on the broad outlines of the projects and are hoping for a final agreement. The discussions about a collaboration come at a time when Hans Zimmer recently delivered an enchanting musical performance at the Riyadh Season. Throughout the concert, Zimmer performed a selection of his iconic compositions. tags : entertainment hans zimmer hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:33 IST News movies Oscar-Winning Composer Hans Zimmer To Recreate Saudi National Anthem With 'Different Instruments' Read More

title: Director Mohan G Slams Anurag Kashyap For 'Bashing Brahmins': 'Try With Your Own Caste Girls'
summary: Mohan G Kshatriyan has slammed the makers of upcoming film Bad Girl for negative portrayal of Brahmins.
full_content: Director Mohan G Slams Anurag Kashyap For 'Bashing Brahmins': 'Try With Your Own Caste Girls' Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:29 IST Mohan G Kshatriyan has slammed the makers of upcoming film Bad Girl for negative portrayal of Brahmins. reset Follow us on Google News Mohan G has bashed Anurag Kashyap for negative stereotyping of Brahmins in Bad Girl. The upcoming film, Bad Girl, revolves around the life of a school-going Brahmin teenager who is struggling with societal expectations as well as her own desires. In the teaser, we see her trying her best to find a boyfriend while she faces criticism for her choices. It all turns into hell when she starts dating a boy and is shamed for it. The teaser ends with the mother and daughter talking about a dating app. The teaser of the film released today, January 27, 2024, but filmmaker Mohan G Kshatriyan is not happy with it. He claims that the film is portraying Brahmins in a bad light. The Tamil film is written and directed by Varsha Bharath and is presented by Vetri Maaran and Anurag Kashyap. It stars Anjali Sivaraman in the lead role. related stories The teaser also shows how she becomes independent and free, the way she wanted to be, once she left her home. Reacting to the teaser, Mohan G Kshatriyan wrote on his official X (formerly known as Twitter) account, “Portraying a brahmin girl personal life is always a bold and refreshing film for this clan. What more can be expected from Vetrimaran, Anurag Kasyap & Co.. Bashing Brahmin father and mother is old and not trendy.. Try with your own caste girls and showcase it to your own family first." Check it out: Portraying a brahmin girl personal life is always a bold and refreshing film for this clan. What more can be expected from vetrimaran, Anurag kasyap & Co.. Bashing Brahmin father and mother is old and not trendy.. Try with your own caste girls and showcase it to your own family… https://t.co/XP8mtnaFws — Mohan G Kshatriyan (@mohandreamer) January 27, 2025 As of now, the makers have not reacted to Mohan G Kshatriyan’s comments. While you are here, watch the teaser of Bad Girl below: However, director Pa Ranjith’s Bad Girl appreciated the film showing about women’s struggles and society’s expectations. “Happened to watch #BadGirl, and it’s truly a bold and refreshing film! Director #VetriMaaran deserves immense credit for backing such a daring story. The film powerfully portrays women’s struggles and social expectations through a unique new wave cinema style. Congratulations #varsha," his post read. Here’s the post: Happened to watch #BadGirl , and it’s truly a bold and refreshing film! Director #VetriMaaran deserves immense credit for backing such a daring story. The film powerfully portrays women’s struggles and society’s expectations through a unique new wave cinema style. Congratulations… pic.twitter.com/EanrwiDE2I — pa.ranjith (@beemji) January 26, 2025 Bad Girl also stars Shanthi Priya, Saranya Ravichandran, Hridhu Haroon, TeeJay Arunasalam, and Sashank Bommireddipalli in pivotal roles. It will have its world premiere at the International Film Festival Rotterdam and will be competing in the prestigious Tiger competition. The film will hit theatres somewhere in 2025 but the release date is yet to be announced. tags : Anurag Kashyap regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:29 IST News movies Director Mohan G Slams Anurag Kashyap For 'Bashing Brahmins': 'Try With Your Own Caste Girls' Read More

title: Kanye West Says He Is Back In The Billionaire's Club, But Is It True?
summary: On Thursday (January 23), Ye posted a screenshot on Instagram, revealing the new valuation.
full_content: Kanye West Says He Is Back In The Billionaire's Club, But Is It True? Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:28 IST On Thursday (January 23), Ye posted a screenshot on Instagram, revealing the new valuation. reset Follow us on Google News Hollywood flooded the comments section to congratulate him.  (Photo Credits: X) Kanye West, also known as Ye, is once again making waves with his claim of being back in the billionaire’s club. The polarising figure, who has faced his fair share of controversies, asserts that his net worth now exceeds an eye-popping $2.77 billion. On Thursday (January 23), Ye posted a screenshot on Instagram, revealing the new valuation, which reportedly comes from the business valuation company Eton Venture Services. The document lists his fortune as being made up of his music catalogue and the full ownership of his Yeezy brand, two major assets that have significantly contributed to his wealth. “In 2025, Ye’s net worth stands at $2.77 billion USD as confirmed by Eton Venture Services," the post read, credited to EVS. “The valuation is based on his music portfolio and his sole ownership of the Yeezy mark." While this bold claim has yet to be fully confirmed by an independent source, Ye’s confidence seems unshaken, reports Billboard. related stories As expected, Ye was energised by the reported figure and made sure to celebrate in true Ye fashion. He took to quoting his iconic anthem, “Can’t Tell Me Nothing," from his 2007 Graduation album, a track known for its triumphant tone and brash confidence. “LAA LA LA LA," Ye wrote, echoing the track’s unmistakable intro. The post quickly gained traction, with fans, fellow musicians, and even Bay Area rap legend E-40 flooding the comments to congratulate him. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Ye (@ye) Despite the buzz surrounding Ye’s latest valuation claims, not everyone is on the same page. As of Friday (January 24), Forbes reportedly values him at just $400 million—significantly lower than the $2.77 billion he asserts. This stark contrast is particularly striking given that Forbes had recognised Ye as a billionaire in 2022. However, a series of controversies that year, including antisemitic remarks, triggered a major backlash. Brands like Adidas, Balenciaga, and Gap cut ties with him, leading to a dramatic drop in his estimated net worth, according to Forbes. When Forbes had originally listed him as a billionaire in 2022, Ye himself argued that the figures were way off, insisting that his true worth was closer to $7 billion. Following his fallout with Adidas and other brands later that year, Forbes revised their estimate and slashed his net worth to just $400 million, a far cry from the $7 billion he had previously claimed. This new figure from Eton Venture Services, however, if true, could drastically shift the narrative once again. Should Ye’s estimated wealth indeed reach $2.77 billion, it would propel him past his former mentor Jay-Z, making Ye the richest rapper alive. tags : entertainment hollywood Kanye West Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:28 IST News movies Kanye West Says He Is Back In The Billionaire's Club, But Is It True? Read More

title: Urvashi Rautela Reacts To 'Beauty With No Brain' Tag, Says People Don't Spare Narendra Modi, SRK Either
summary: Urvashi Rautela recently recently flak for her comments about the attack on Saif Ali Khan.
full_content: Urvashi Rautela Reacts To 'Beauty With No Brain' Tag, Says People Don't Spare Narendra Modi, SRK Either Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:12 IST Urvashi Rautela recently recently flak for her comments about the attack on Saif Ali Khan. reset Follow us on Google News Urvashi Rautela addressed her recent trolling. Urvashi Rautela often finds herself at the centre of controversy as clips from her interviews go viral on social media platforms. The actress isn’t afraid to speak her mind and is known for her candour. However, she also lands up in trouble when her comments don’t sit right with netizens. She recently reacted to being called ‘Beauty With No Brains’. Speaking to Instant Bollywood about the tag, she said, “Isme kya hai na… humare jo desh ke Pradhan Mantri bhi hain, Shri Narendra Modi ji, mere sabse zyada favourite superstars Shah Rukh Khan aur Salman Khan – toh log jo hain voh toh unko bhi nahi bakshte. Toh aap hi bataiye ki phir isme kya kiya jaaye?" related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Instant Bollywood (@instantbollywood) Urvashi Rautela hit the headlines last week after she faced flak for her comments about Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan’s attack. While condemning the attack, the actress shifted the conversation to discussing expensive gifts that her parents had given her after the success of her film ‘Daaku Maharaaj’. She flaunted her diamond-studded Rolex and other jewellery, which many found tone-deaf and insensitive. She then apologized on Instagram, but later deleted the post. Now, in a recent interview, Urvashi explained that she was caught off guard and was unaware of the full details of the attack on Saif Ali Khan. While speaking with Filmfare, Urvashi Rautela said that the question about Saif Ali Khan caught her off guard because the attack happened at 4 am, and she had an interview the next morning while she was still processing the news. She said that she kept bringing up her film Daaku Maharaaj as the interviews were lined up to celebrate the success of her film. She also admitted that the excitement about her parents’ gifts caused her to go off-topic and that it was a moment of misplaced enthusiasm rather than an attempt to ‘show off’. tags : bollywood Narendra Modi Shah Rukh Khan Urvashi Rautela Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:12 IST News movies Urvashi Rautela Reacts To 'Beauty With No Brain' Tag, Says People Don't Spare Narendra Modi, SRK Either Read More

title: Parambrata Chatterjee Reacts To Anurag Kashyap’s Harsh Words On Bengali Cinema: ‘We Need To Make...'
summary: Director-actor duo Srijit Mukherji and Parambrata Chatterjee addressed the state of Bengali cinema in Kolkata, responding to Anurag Kashyap’s critique labeling it as “ghatia.”
full_content: Parambrata Chatterjee Reacts To Anurag Kashyap’s Harsh Words On Bengali Cinema: ‘We Need To Make...' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:11 IST Director-actor duo Srijit Mukherji and Parambrata Chatterjee addressed the state of Bengali cinema in Kolkata, responding to Anurag Kashyap’s critique labeling it as “ghatia.” reset Follow us on Google News Parambrata Chatterjee responds to Anurag Kashyap’s remark on Bengali cinema being “ghatia,” highlighting the decline of mainstream films. Director-actor duo Srijit Mukherji and Parambrata Chatterjee recently attended the inaugural edition of SCREEN LIVE in Kolkata, where an engaging discussion unfolded around the state of Bengali cinema. The conversation touched on Hindi filmmaker Anurag Kashyap’s controversial remark that labeled Bengali cinema as “ghatia" (poor) compared to other regional industries. Parambrata responded thoughtfully, shedding light on the decline of mainstream Bengali cinema and its critical connection to the survival of alternative films. Highlighting the issue, Parambrata explained, “Mainstream commercial Bengali cinema has lost its focus. Without a thriving mainstream industry, it’s challenging to sustain alternative cinema because the latter depends on surplus generated by the former. In 2011, while filmmakers like Srijit da and Kaushik Ganguly spearheaded a revival with middle-road films, the industry distanced itself from making big, massy entertainers." He pointed to a growing disconnect between filmmakers and audiences, exacerbated by poorly executed South Indian remakes that alienated Bengali viewers. “Audiences rejected these sub-par remakes because they could already watch the originals dubbed in Hindi on national channels. This failure shrank the audience for Bengali cinema, leaving large sections of West Bengal feeling neglected," he added, stressing the need to produce quality mass entertainers to reinvigorate the industry. related stories Srijit Mukherji echoed this sentiment, urging filmmakers to focus on originality and regional authenticity. He cited the success of South Indian films like Kantara and Pushpa 2 as examples of cinema rooted in local culture that resonated universally. “Bengali filmmakers need to move beyond the lazy habit of remaking South Indian hits. We need to create something uniquely ours, a Kantara or Pushpa 2 equivalent for Bengal," he asserted. The duo’s latest project, Shotyi Bole Shotyi Kichhu Nei, is currently playing in theatres. An official adaptation of the 1989 Hindi film Ek Ruka Hua Faisla, which itself reimagined the classic American courtroom drama 12 Angry Men, the film boasts a stellar ensemble cast, including Kaushik Ganguly, Kaushik Sen, Ritwick Chakraborty, and others. Through both their creative ventures and their critique of the industry, Mukherji and Chatterjee continue to advocate for a stronger and more diverse Bengali cinema. tags : Anurag Kashyap bollywood Parambrata Chatterjee Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:11 IST News movies Parambrata Chatterjee Reacts To Anurag Kashyap’s Harsh Words On Bengali Cinema: ‘We Need To Make...' title: Nag Ashwin Spills The Beans On Prabhas, Deepika Padukone's Kalki 2898 AD Part 2
summary: The shooting for the much-anticipated sequel is expected to begin in the middle of 2025 and will probably hit the theatres by the end of 2026.
full_content: Nag Ashwin Spills The Beans On Prabhas, Deepika Padukone's Kalki 2898 AD Part 2 Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 16:10 IST The shooting for the much-anticipated sequel is expected to begin in the middle of 2025 and will probably hit the theatres by the end of 2026. reset Follow us on Google News Kalki 2898 AD was released in June 2024. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Kalki 2898 AD, the Nag Ashiwn directorial sci-fi film featuring an ensemble cast of Prabhas, Deepika Padukone, Amitabh Bachchan and Kamal Haasan, broke box office records upon its release in June last year. The film minted more than Rs 1,000 crore worldwide, making it one of the biggest hits of all time. Director Nag Ashwin has now shared some interesting deets about its sequel and expected release date. As per Koimoi, Ashwin, in an uncredited interview recently, stated that the scripting of Kalki 2898 AD Part 2 is complete. The shooting for the project has still not commenced, as the cast members have yet to set bulk dates for the project. related stories The shooting for the much-anticipated sequel is expected to begin in the middle of 2025 and probably will hit the theatres by the end of 2026. He emphasised that this was also a provisional schedule as all the stars, particularly Prabhas, currently have a tight schedule this year. The Baahubali actor will be next seen in the horror comedy The Raja Saab, which will be hitting the theatres later this year. Apart from that, he also has a mythological drama, Kanappa, co-starring Akshay Kumar and Mohanlal. He is yet to begin shooting for director Prashant Neel’s Salaar 2 and director Sandeep Reddy Vanga’s highly anticipated Spirit. Apart from him, Kamal Haasan is also busy with projects like Thug Life, director Shankar’s Indian 3 and KH237. Amitabh, on the other hand, could be currently seen in the popular quiz show Kaun Banega Crorepati 16. On the film front, he will be next seen in the courtroom drama film Section 84 alongside Abhishek Banerjee and Nimrat Kaur. Lastly, Deepika has taken a break from acting after the arrival of her daughter Dua Padukone Singh. She is yet to announce her next project. Kalki 2898 AD draws inspiration from the Hindi epic Mahabharat. The film is set in a dystopian future, revolving around four characters: Bhairava (played by Prabhas), a bounty hunter trying to enter the utopian structure known as The Complex, ruled by Supreme Yaskin (Kamal Haasan); a pregnant woman SUM-80, later named Sumathi (played by Deepika), who is carrying the child who could be the final avatar of Lord Vishnu, Kalki; and lastly, Ashwatthama (played by Amitabh), tasked to protect the child by Lord Krishna. It is currently streaming in Hindi on Netflix and in other languages on Amazon Prime Video. tags : entertainment nag ashwin Prabhas Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 16:10 IST News movies Nag Ashwin Spills The Beans On Prabhas, Deepika Padukone's Kalki 2898 AD Part 2 Read More

title: Shahid Kapoor Lauds Priyanka Chopra, Calls Her A ‘Very Good Dancer’
summary: When asked which co-actor would give him tough competition in a dance-off, Shahid Kapoor named Priyanka Chopra, Deepika Padukone, Pooja Hegde, calling them good dancers.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Lauds Priyanka Chopra, Calls Her A ‘Very Good Dancer’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 15:42 IST When asked which co-actor would give him tough competition in a dance-off, Shahid Kapoor named Priyanka Chopra, Deepika Padukone, Pooja Hegde, calling them good dancers. reset Follow us on Google News Shahid Kapoor called Priyanka Chopra, Deepika Padukone 'very good dancers' Shahid Kapoor is gearing up for the release of his upcoming action thriller Deva, and has been promoting the film in full swing. In a recent interview, he was asked to name actresses who he thinks would give him tough competition in a dance-off. The actor named Priyanka Chopra, lauding her and calling her a very good dancer. He then went on to name other actresses he has worked with, including Deepika Padukone, Pooja Hegde, Kiara Advani and Amrita Rao. In a conversation with Bollywood Hungama, Shahid Kapoor was asked, “If you were to have a dance-off with a co-actress, who would give you a tough competition." In response, Shahid said that there are many. Later, he added, “There are so many girls who are fantastic dancers. A lot of them I worked with already. Priyanka was a very good dancer, Deepika was a very good dancer. I enjoyed dancing with Pooja in this film (Deva). Kiara is a good dancer, but we have not danced together. Even Amrita was a good dancer when I worked with her. They are all good. I have never done a song with Katrina but she is a fantastic dancer." related stories For the unversed, Shahid Kapoor and Priyanka Chopra have shared screen space in 2009 film ‘Kaminey’, and 2012 film ‘Teri Meri Kahaani’. Meanwhile, Shahid and Deepika have worked together in ‘Padmaavat’. Kiara Advani and Shahid co-starred in ‘Kabir Singh’, while he starred with Amrita Rao in ‘Vivaah.’ In the same interview, Shahid also recalled how during initial years in his career, his co-actors would ask him to tone down his dance moves. “Kabhi kabhi mujhe meri co-actresses bolti thi ‘itna kyu dance kar raha hai. thoda kam kar yaar. You’re looking so desperate. Just relax’. I said ‘but I like dancing’. They said ‘No no but it’s too much. A little less. Match me.’ In my head I’m like ‘I am a better dancer.’ but they would say, ‘Just match me please. We need to look like a pair.’ (Sometimes, my co-actresses would tell me, ‘Why are you dancing so much? Tone it down. You’re looking so desperate. Just relax.’ I’d say, ‘But I like dancing.’ They’d reply, ‘No, no, it’s too much. Just a little less. Match me.’ In my head, I’d think, ‘I am a better dancer.’ But they’d say, ‘Just match me, please. We need to look like a pair.’)" recalled Shahid. He said that this would happen quite frequently, and that in the first 10 years of his career, he would get bullied. However, he later decided to stop letting others’ opinion affect him. “Then I said leave it. Main dance kar rah hu, tumhein karna ho karo, nahi karo. I am going for it. (I’m going to dance, if you want to do it, go ahead, if not, that’s fine. I’m going for it)," said Shahid. Shahid plays a cop in his upcoming film ‘Deva’. It also stars Pooja Hegde, Pavail Gulati, Pravessh Rana, and Kubbra Sait. Directed by Rosshan Andrrews and produced by Siddharth Roy Kapur and Umesh KR Bansal, Deva is slated to hit theatres on January 31, 2025, promising an action-packed cinematic experience. tags : bollywood priyanka chopra Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 15:42 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Lauds Priyanka Chopra, Calls Her A ‘Very Good Dancer’ Read More

title: Rupali Ganguly Gets Emotional, Remembers Father On His Birth Anniversary: 'Proud To Be Your Child'
summary: Rupali Ganguly's father, the yesteryear Bollywood filmmaker Anil Ganguly, passed away in 2016 at the age of 82.
full_content: Rupali Ganguly Gets Emotional, Remembers Father On His Birth Anniversary: 'Proud To Be Your Child' Published By : Chirag Sehgal IANS Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 15:42 IST Rupali Ganguly's father, the yesteryear Bollywood filmmaker Anil Ganguly, passed away in 2016 at the age of 82. reset Follow us on Google News Rupali Ganguly pays tribute to her late father on his birth anniversary. On her late father Anil Ganguly’s birthday, TV actress Rupali Ganguly shared an emotional tribute, opening up about the struggles and hardships her father endured in his lifetime. In a heartfelt post on Instagram, Rupali remembered him not just as a father but as her hero and guru, whose life lessons continue to guide her. Sharing a heartfelt video, the Anupamaa actress wrote, “Hum yahan paise kamane ke liye nahi karm kamane aaye hai“ My Hero … My Guru …. My Pappa…" related stories Ganguly added, “Not a day goes by when we don’t get signs that you are watching over us …. Every good that happens is a result of your life lessons and your blessings… thank u for being that father who did not cushion his kids instead pushed them to break the norms , struggle and realize their potential… every life we want you as our father because there cannot be any love like yours ….Happy Birthday Pappa ….Proud to be your child … #happybirthday #anilganguly #rupaliganguly #vijayganguly #father #daughter #son #love #jaimatadi #jaimahakal Fan edit … had to share this one." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Rupali Ganguly (@rupaliganguly) The video montage features rare and monochrome candid photos of the actress’ father, along with a clip where Rupali is heard saying, “My father struggled a lot. He ran from Kolkata and came to Mumbai. He shared a room with singer Jagjit Singh, and they were all struggling together at that time. My father went through a lot of hardships." Rupali Ganguly’s father, the yesteryear Bollywood filmmaker Anil Ganguly, passed away in 2016 at the age of 82. He is best remembered for his iconic films “Kora Kagaz" (1974), starring Jaya Bhaduri, and Tapasya (1976), starring Rakhee. Both films won the prestigious National Film Award for Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment. Anil Ganguly’s filmography also includes the 1985 film “Saaheb," starring Anil Kapoor and Amrita Singh. In the later years of his career, he directed several action films, many of which featured Mithun Chakraborty. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - IANS ) tags : Rupali Ganguly TV Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 15:42 IST News movies Rupali Ganguly Gets Emotional, Remembers Father On His Birth Anniversary: 'Proud To Be Your Child' Read More

title: Jaideep Ahlawat ‘Melted Like Makhan’ Over Amul’s Paatal Lok Season 2 Tribute
summary: Jaideep Ahlawat reshared Amul's post and wrote, “I melted like makhan looking at this. Thank you for the love. This one’s special.”
full_content: Jaideep Ahlawat ‘Melted Like Makhan’ Over Amul’s Paatal Lok Season 2 Tribute Published By : Chirag Sehgal Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 15:27 IST Jaideep Ahlawat reshared Amul's post and wrote, “I melted like makhan looking at this. Thank you for the love. This one’s special.” reset Follow us on Google News Paatal Lok season 2 was released on Prime Video on January 17. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Jaideep Ahlawat has been receiving massive appreciation for masterfully reprising his role as Inspector Hathi Ram Chaudhary in the second season of Paatal Lok. The crime thriller was released on Prime Video on January 17 and has been lauded for its riveting storyline. Amidst this, a topical shared by Amul India praising his work has stood out for him. Amul shared an animated poster of the series with Ahlawat’s cartoon version contemplating on a burning ground (similar to the poster of the series.) The caption of the humorous post read, “Iske Ahlawa aur kya." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Jaideep Ahlawat (@jaideepahlawat) Sharing the post, Jaideep tagged Amul and wrote, “Itna bhi maska nahi lagana tha Hathi ram ko, aur bhi zyada mota ho jayega. (You didn’t need to flatter Hathi Ram so much, he may become even more fat)." He further added, “I melted like makhan looking at this. Thank you for the love. This one’s special." Soon after the post was shared, it caught the attention of celebrities and fans. Manisha Koirala wrote, “You were brilliant. Just outstanding, keep rocking!!" His co-actors from the franchise Merenla Imsong, Tillotama Shome and Gul Panag also expressed their appreciation. Moreover, Shefali Shah who shared the screen with the actor in Three Of Us said, “Omg, That’s the coolest. So happy for you." Recently, director Anurag Kashyap also took to social media to share his views on Paatal Lok season 2. Calling the first season a perfect example of “peak writing, direction and acting", he noted that Sudip Sharma and director Avinash Arun Dhaware outdid themselves with season 2. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Anurag Kashyap (@anuragkashyap10) “The opening sequence of Jonathan Thom’s body being found just took my remaining sleep away and I got sucked into the world of Hathi Ram Choudhary so fast like it was a quicksand. The depths of human darkness that he dwells into, always looking for some hope that will and won’t come by," he wrote. Paatal Lok season 2 follows Inspector Hathi Ram Chaudhary as he investigates a high-profile murder that leads him to remote corners of North-East India, where he battles powerful forces and personal tragedies in his pursuit of truth. tags : bollywood Jaideep Ahlawat Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 15:26 IST News movies Jaideep Ahlawat ‘Melted Like Makhan’ Over Amul’s Paatal Lok Season 2 Tribute Read More

title: Maharashtra CM Fadnavis Reacts To Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Controversy: 'Not Right To Distort History'
summary: Earlier today, Chhaava director Laxman Uttekar met Maharashtra Navnirman Sena leader Raj Thackeray and assured that all objectionable scenes from the Vicky Kaushal starrer will be removed.
full_content: Maharashtra CM Fadnavis Reacts To Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Controversy: 'Not Right To Distort History' Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 15:28 IST Earlier today, Chhaava director Laxman Uttekar met Maharashtra Navnirman Sena leader Raj Thackeray and assured that all objectionable scenes from the Vicky Kaushal starrer will be removed. reset Follow us on Google News Chhaava is a historical drama that revolves around the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj. Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis has urged the makers of Vicky Kaushal’s upcoming movie Chhaava to maintain a balance between sensitivity and creativity while working on projects like this. Recently, Fadnavis reacted to the controversies regarding the film when he also asked the producers not to distort history. “Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj’s history should be shown correctly, it is not right to distort history. Everyone has a lot of love and respect for Sambhaji Maharaj. This respect and honour should not be hurt. There should be creativity (in filmmaking) but we believe that there should be sensitivity along with it," the Maharashtra Chief Minister said as quoted by India TV. related stories This comes a day after Maharashtra minister Uday Samant expressed disappointment with Vicky Kaushal’s upcoming movie. He raised objections to a scene where Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj is shown dancing and said that it should be removed. “If they raise objections, we will not let it be released," Samant said while speaking to the media and then threatened the block the film’s release. “The movie shows Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj dancing. The director should cut this part. This movie should be shown to historians and scholars. If they raise objections, we will not let it be released," he added. Later, the film’s director Laxman Uttekar met Maharashtra Navnirman Sena leader Raj Thackeray and assured him that all objectionable scenes from the Vicky Kaushal starrer will be removed before its release. Chhaava is a historical drama that revolves around the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj. In the film, Vicky Kaushal is set to portray the character of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the eldest son of the Maratha empire’s founder. The film also stars Rashmika Mandanna, Akshaye Khanna, Ashutosh Rana, and Divya Dutta in key roles. Chhaava will hit theatres on February 14, 2025. tags : bollywood Vicky Kaushal Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 15:24 IST News movies Maharashtra CM Fadnavis Reacts To Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Controversy: 'Not Right To Distort History' Read More

title: Dhoom Dhaam Trailer: Yami Gautam, Pratik Gandhi's Wedding Night Takes A Chaotic Turn | Watch
summary: Dhoom Dhaam Trailer: Dhoom Dhaam premieres exclusively on Netflix on February 14.
full_content: Dhoom Dhaam Trailer: Yami Gautam, Pratik Gandhi's Wedding Night Takes A Chaotic Turn | Watch Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 15:02 IST Dhoom Dhaam Trailer: Dhoom Dhaam premieres exclusively on Netflix on February 14. reset Follow us on Google News Dhoom Dhaam trailer out now. Dhoom Dhaam Trailer Out: Yami Gautam Dhar and Pratik Gandhi are all set to impress fans as Koyal and Veer with their new film, Dhoom Dhaam. She’s feisty, he’s shy – when they get married, chaos awaits their wedding night! Netflix India unveiled the highly anticipated trailer for Dhoom Dhaam on Monday. When an arranged marriage leads to a chaotic twist, sparks fly. Packed with mischief, mayhem, and unexpected romance, this madcap love story is your perfect Valentine’s binge. Buckle up, because this wedding’s about to go off the mandap! Watch the trailer here: related stories The film is directed by Rishab Seth, and produced by Aditya Dhar and Lokesh Dhar of B62 Studios, and Jyoti Deshpande of Jio Studios. Dhoom Dhaam follows the story of newlyweds Koyal and Veer. Their first night together takes an unexpected turn when a seemingly perfect evening unravels into a night full of deceptive identities, surprise guests and some seriously awkward situations. With mysterious goons hot on their trail and challenges around every corner, one question lingers in the air: Who is Charlie? Making her come back to our screens after a year, Yami Gautam Dhar shares, “Koyal defies the usual ‘bride’ stereotypes without being brash or bullish or anything you have watched on screen before. I am sure a lot of girls today will connect with her. I thoroughly enjoyed donning this role for Dhoom Dhaam. This film is a wild, unpredictable ride and I can’t wait for audiences to join us on this journey on Netflix this Valentine’s Day." Essaying the role of Veer, actor Pratik Gandhi adds, “Playing Veer was a refreshing experience for me. I loved playing the role because it’s not your typical rom-com hero—he is relatable, vulnerable, and ends up in the most unexpected situations. Expect some serious laughs, chaos, and some moments that’ll tug at your heartstrings and I’m excited for viewers to experience it all on February 14th on Netflix." Director Rishab Seth shares, “With Dhoom Dhaam, we wanted to explore love in all its messy, chaotic glory. This isn’t just a story about two people coming together—it’s about discovering how love can survive, and even flourish, in the most unexpected and unpredictable situations. Yami and Pratik bring such an effortless charm to their roles, making Koyal and Veer’s journey all the more delightful. We had an incredible time bringing this madcap adventure to life, and I can’t wait for audiences to experience it on Netflix as the perfect celebration of love." With its hilarious blend of romance, humour, and action, Dhoom Dhaam shows that love isn’t just about candlelit dinners—it’s about surviving a life full of chaos together. Dhoom Dhaam premieres exclusively on Netflix on February 14. tags : bollywood Pratik Gandhi Yami Gautam Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 15:02 IST News movies Dhoom Dhaam Trailer: Yami Gautam, Pratik Gandhi's Wedding Night Takes A Chaotic Turn | Watch Read More

title: Suniel Shetty Appeals Fans To join Dharma Sansad At Maha Kumbh 2025: 'A Historic Moment' | Video
summary: The Dharma Sansad is organised by spiritual leader and Bhagwat Katha orator Devkinandan Thakurji Maharaj. It started today at the ongoing Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj.
full_content: Suniel Shetty Appeals Fans To join Dharma Sansad At Maha Kumbh 2025: 'A Historic Moment' | Video Curated By : Grace Cyril News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 14:50 IST The Dharma Sansad is organised by spiritual leader and Bhagwat Katha orator Devkinandan Thakurji Maharaj. It started today at the ongoing Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj. reset Follow us on Google News Suniel Shetty has urged everyone to join Dharma Sansad Suniel Shetty, in a new video message, has urged the Hindus to attend the Dharma Sansad in the ongoing Mahakumbh in Uttar Pradesh’s Prayagraj. The event is organised by spiritual leader and Bhagwat Katha orator Devkinandan Thakurji Maharaj. In the video, Shetty said that the Sansad is being held to push for a Sanatana board responsible for the protection of Hindu temples, gurukuls and gaushalas. “A historic moment awaits at Prayagraj Mahakumbh; crores will unite in devotion to the Sanatana Dharma on January 27 under the guidance of… a movement to establish the Sanatan Board. This is to protect our temples, gurukuls and gaushalas, so let’s come together in devotion and commitment; join us at ‘Shanti Seva Shivir Prayagraj," the actor said. related stories Check it out: #WATCH | Actor Suniel Shetty says, “…A historic moment awaits at Prayagraj #MahaKumbh where crores will unite in devotion to the Sanatana Dharma. On January 27, under the guidance of Swami Devkinandan Thakurji Maharaj, a movement to establish a Sanantana Board will be… pic.twitter.com/QAocT7yDF7 — ANI (@ANI) January 27, 2025 BJP MP and former actress Hema Malini also talked about Dharam Sansad and said that it will aim to discuss the formation of the Sanatana Board and protection of Sanatana Dharm. “It is a matter of good fortune for all Sanatanis that Mahakumnh is taking place after 144 years in Prayagraj. On 27th January, Dharam Sansad is being organized there under Devaki Nanadan Thakur ji to discuss the formation of the Sanatana Board and protection of Sanatana Dharm," Hema Malini said. Check it out: #WATCH | BJP MP Hema Malini says, “It is a matter of good fortune for all Sanatanis that Mahakumbh is taking place after 144 years in Prayagraj. On 27th January, Dharam Sansad is being organized there under Devaki Nanadan Thakur ji to discuss the formation of the Sanatan Board… pic.twitter.com/4zCy15uc3Z — ANI (@ANI) January 27, 2025 The Dharma Sansad, organised by spiritual leader and Bhagwat Katha orator Devkinandan Thakurji Maharaj, started on Monday (January 27) at the ongoing Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj. “We all want the Sanatana Board to be constituted. We are placing a proposal before the government. All Dharmacharyas want the welfare of Sanatana and temples to remain secure—for this Dharma Sansad is about to begin. I am going to see the preparation for the same. People are arriving here in large numbers," Devkinandan Thakurji Maharaj told ANI. The event will see many saints, Gurus, and Sanatana leaders attending it. tags : bollywood Suniel Shetty Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 14:50 IST News movies Suniel Shetty Appeals Fans To join Dharma Sansad At Maha Kumbh 2025: 'A Historic Moment' | Video Read More
