summary: As Zanai Bhosle and Mohammed Siraj’s dating rumours swirled on the Internet, the two cleared the air on their bond.
full_content: Mohammed Siraj Dating Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter Zanai Bhosle? REVEALED Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 10:38 IST As Zanai Bhosle and Mohammed Siraj’s dating rumours swirled on the Internet, the two cleared the air on their bond. reset Follow us on Google News Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter Zanai Bhosle And Mohammed Siraj BREAK Silence On Dating Rumours Asha Bhosle’s granddaughter Zanai Bhosle’s photo with cricketer Mohammed Siraj went viral on social media a few days ago. The picture led to speculations about whether they are dating. The photo was from Zanai’s 23 rd birthday celebration, and the two were caught in a happy candid moment. As dating rumours swirled on the Internet, Zanai and Mohammed Siraj have now cleared the air about their bond. While they did not directly address the dating rumours, they re-shared the viral picture, revealing that they have a brother-sister bond. A few hours ago, Zanai Bhosle took to her Instagram story to share the picture with Mohammed Siraj from her birthday celebration. Setting the record straight about her bond with the cricketer, she wrote, “Mere pyaare bhai (My lovely brother)." Siraj also re-shared her story, and reinstated that they have a sibling bond. He penned a poem that showed his brotherly affection towards her. It read, “Meri Behna Ke Jaisi Koi Behna Nahin. Bina Iske Kahin Bhi Mujhe Rehna Nahin. Jaise I lai Chaand Sitaaron Mein. Meri Behna Hai Ek Hazaaron Mein." Check out their Instagram stories below! related stories Mohammed Siraj’s Instagram story The viral picture showed Zanai Bhosle enjoying a candid moment with Mohammed Siraj. They were all smiles in the photo, and were seen looking adorably at each other. Zanai rocked a black sequinned dress, while the cricketer donned a black tee with a matching jacket. The picture went viral on social media, and netizens soon started speculating whether they were dating each other. Pictures from Zanai’s 23 rd birthday celebration also featured other cricketers including Shreyas Iyer, Siddhesh Lad, Suyash Prabhudessai. One picture showed Zanai posing with actress and former Bigg Boss contestant Ayesha Khan, while another one featured ‘Munjya’ actor Abhay Verma. Jackie Shroff and Asha Bhosle were also present. On the professional front, Zanai Bhosle will soon foray into Bollywood with the film ‘The Pride Of Bharat- Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.’ She will be seen essaying the role of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj’s wife Rani Sai Bhonsale in Sandeep Ssingh’s film. Shah Rukh Khan has a massive fan following not just in India, but all over the world. On Sunday, he took over the stage at Global Village in Dubai during which he mesmerized fans with performances to his songs, and also interacted with them. Several videos from the event have surfaced on social media, and of them shows King Khan talking about his youthful look. title: Coldplay's Chris Martin STOPS Ahmedabad Concert Midway To Protect A Fan | Here's What Happened
summary: During Coldplay concert in Ahmedabad last night, lead vocalist Chris Martin stopped his performance on ‘My Universe’ mid-way to ensure the safety of a fan. Check out the video!
full_content: Coldplay's Chris Martin STOPS Ahmedabad Concert Midway To Protect A Fan | Here's What Happened Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 07:41 IST During Coldplay concert in Ahmedabad last night, lead vocalist Chris Martin stopped his performance on ‘My Universe’ mid-way to ensure the safety of a fan. Check out the video! reset Follow us on Google News Coldplay's Chris Martin stopped his performance on ‘My Universe’ mid-way to ensure the safety of a fan British alternative rock band Coldplay kicked off their final concert in India on Sunday at Ahmedabad’s Narendra Modi Stadium, and left the crowd mesmerized with their energetic performance. While videos from the concert last night have taken over social media, one moment particularly stood out, and has won over fans’ hearts. In a display of compassion and concern for his audience, Coldplay frontman Chris Martin was seen halting the concert mid-way to ensure the safety of a fan who seemed to be getting squished amidst the crowd. During his performance at the Narendra Modi Stadium on Sunday, Chris Martin performed to the song ‘My Universe’. However, he stopped mid-way as soon as noticed a fan in distress. As the crowd surged forward, Chris noticed that a fan was getting squished. He swiftly intervened and made sure the situation was in control before resuming his performance once again. A video that has gone viral on social media shows Chris initially singing My Universe. There was immediate silence as he stopped the performance mid-way, even as the crowd continued singing. On noticing the fan in distress, he said, “Hold on, hold on. Hey, are you okay? Can you put her there so she is safe, please? You sit here, because it’s getting squished. Or just sit down there. That’s safer. My Universe again, please. I’m sorry. You stay there, you’re safe now. Okay, let’s go from the beginning. Please make sure you’re looking after each other. It’s very important." He then sang ‘My Universe’ once again from the beginning, and left fans cheering for him. related stories Check out the video below! My Universe was cut mid-way because a woman was being squished by the crowd at #ColdplayAhmedabad pic.twitter.com/NJCbsBqMA1 — Neil (@neilenore) January 26, 2025 Fans React To Chris Martin Halting Performance Mid-Way To Ensure Fan’s Safety His fans were moved by his attentiveness and genuine concern. While one fan commented, “big big big respect for any artist that does this," another one wrote, “This alone puts him in such an above level than most artists." “He takes care of his fans," read a third comment. Apart from this, another highlight from Coldplay’s concert in Ahmedabad on Sunday was Chris Martin’s heartfelt rendition of Vande Mataram as a tribute to India on the occasion of Republic Day. During the concert, he also invited a couple to sing ‘Everglow’ with him. About Coldplay’s Music Of The Spheres India tour Coldplay kicked off their Music Of The Spheres India tour in Mumbai on January 18. They performed at the DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai on January 18, 19 and 21, followed by concerts in Ahmedabad’s Narendra Modi Stadium on January 25 and 26. Apart from Chris Martin the band also consists of guitarist Jonny Buckland, bassist Guy Berryman, drummer percussionist Will Champion, and manager Phil Harvey. tags : Chris Martin Coldplay Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 07:40 IST News movies Coldplay's Chris Martin STOPS Ahmedabad Concert Midway To Protect A Fan | Here's What Happened Read More

title: Shreyas Talpade Birthday: Did You Know The Actor Is The Voice Of Allu Arjun In Pushpa’s Hindi Version?
summary: Shreyas Talpade lent his voice to Allu Arjun’s iconic character Pushpa Raj in the Hindi versions of Pushpa: The Rise and the recently released sequel, Pushpa 2: The Rule.
full_content: Shreyas Talpade Birthday: Did You Know The Actor Is The Voice Of Allu Arjun In Pushpa’s Hindi Version? Published By : Nibandh Vinod Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 06:20 IST Shreyas Talpade lent his voice to Allu Arjun’s iconic character Pushpa Raj in the Hindi versions of Pushpa: The Rise and the recently released sequel, Pushpa 2: The Rule. reset Follow us on Google News Shreyas Talpade has carved a niche for himself by portraying some remarkable characters during his nearly 2-decade long career. (Image: shreyastalpade27/Instagram) Shreyas Talpade is undeniably one of the most versatile actors in Indian cinema. He has carved a niche for himself by portraying some remarkable characters on the big screen during his nearly 2-decade long career. Shreyas’s prowess is not just limited to onscreen performances. He also made his directorial debut in 2017 with the film Poster Boys. But did you know that the actor-turned-director was also the voice of Allu Arjun in the Hindi-dubbed version of the Pushpa film series? related stories On the occasion of Shreyas Talpade’s 49th birthday, today, January 27, let’s dive into his journey of becoming the voice of Allu Arjun in Pushpa, his most memorable works, and his latest projects. Shreyas Talpade: The voice of Allu Arjun in Pushpa’s Hindi version Shreyas lent his voice to Allu Arjun’s iconic character Pushpa Raj in the Hindi versions of Pushpa: The Rise and the recently released sequel, Pushpa 2: The Rule. The actor’s energetic dubbing and modulation perfectly captured Arjun’s rugged and cunning character, and the dialogue “Pushpa naam sunken flower samjha kya? Fire hai main" became a nationwide sensation. Shreyas received widespread acclaim for his flawless dubbing skills. Directed by Sukumar, the second instalment of the Pushpa series was released on December 5, 2024, and it has grossed over Rs 1700 crores worldwide. Shreyas Talpade was most recently seen in Kangana Ranaut’s Emergency. Shreyas Talpade’s Top Movies Iqbal: Shreyas got his big break in Bollywood with Iqbal, a critically acclaimed film directed by Nagesh Kukunoor. The 2005 sports drama was also his Bollywood debut film. It follows the story of a deaf and mute cricket-obsessed boy from a remote village. Shreyas’ character defies various odds to pursue a cricket career. Apna Sapna Money Money: Known for his unmatched comic timing, Shreyas was seen in the film Apna Sapna Money Money, which was released in 2006. He starred alongside an ensemble cast in the comedy-drama, which revolved around several characters who were in a race to become rich. Om Shanti Om: Although a supporting role, Shreyas’ character, Pappu Master, who is the best friend of Shah Rukh Khan’s character in Om Shanti Om, was one of his remarkable performances. Directed by Farah Khan, the reincarnation film became one of the highest-grossing films in 2007. Golmaal Returns: Shreyas joined the ensemble cast of the Golmaal franchise in its second instalment, Golmaal Returns. His character, Laxman, immediately became one of the most beloved. His impeccable comedic timing and quirky mannerisms left audiences in stitches. Housefull 2: Shreyas Talpade played the character of Jai in the second instalment of the Akshay Kumar-starrer Housefull film franchise. Chandu Champion: Shreyas appeared in the biographical sports drama Chandu Champion, directed by Kabir Khan. He portrayed the role of Inspector Sachin Kamble in the film based on the life of Murlikant Petkar, India’s first Paralympic gold medalist, portrayed by Kartik Aaryan. Emergency: Shreyas was most recently seen in Kangana Ranaut’s Emergency. He portrayed Atal Bihari Vajpayee in the historical biographical drama film. As of now, the 49-year-old actor has Welcome To The Jungle, The India Story, Kapkapiii and The Game of Girgit in the pipeline. tags : bollywood Shreyas Talpade Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 06:20 IST News movies Shreyas Talpade Birthday: Did You Know The Actor Is The Voice Of Allu Arjun In Pushpa’s Hindi Version? title: Bobby Deol Turns 56: 'Animal' Actor’s Journey From Stardom To Reinvention
summary: Happy Birthday Bobby Deol: From his grand debut in Barsaat to his remarkable comeback with roles in major films like Animal, Love Hostel and Kanguva, Bobby Deol's career is a testament to his resilience, dedication and acting talent.
full_content: Bobby Deol Turns 56: 'Animal' Actor’s Journey From Stardom To Reinvention Published By : Nibandh Vinod Trending Desk Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 08:50 IST Happy Birthday Bobby Deol: From his grand debut in Barsaat to his remarkable comeback with roles in major films like Animal, Love Hostel and Kanguva, Bobby Deol's career is a testament to his resilience, dedication and acting talent. reset Follow us on Google News Bobby Deol Birthday: Bobby Deol turns 56 today on 27 January, 2025. (Image: iambobbydeol/Instagram) Bobby Deol Celebrates 56th Birthday: Bobby Deol’s versatile acting skills need no introduction. His youthful charm and blockbuster films in the late 90s took him to the heights of success but he has seen the highs and lows of Bollywood in the past few years. From his grand debut in Barsaat to his remarkable comeback with roles in major films like Animal, Love Hostel and Kanguva, Bobby Deol’s career is a testament to his resilience, dedication and acting talent. As the actor is set to celebrate his 56th birthday today January 27, it is only fitting to commemorate him by taking a look at his journey from stardom to reinvention, top films and upcoming projects. related stories Bobby Deol’s Journey From Stardom To Reinvention Born into the Deol family, Bobby Deol made his debut as an actor in Rajkumar Santoshi’s Barsaat in 1995 which introduced him as a promising talent in the industry. The late 90s saw the actor rising to stardom with his back-to-back commercial hits like Gupt, Soldier and Humraaz. Bobby, in these films, showcased his range as an actor, solidifying his position in the entertainment industry. Despite the talent, his career faced a decline as the 2000s progressed. The arrival of new faces in the rapidly changing landscape of Hindi cinema led him to be sidelined with only a few releases like Apne, Dostana and Ajnabee credited to his name. Sunny Deol and Bobby Deol pose with their kids on Diwali. Between 2013 to 2017, his career hit rock bottom as he had no releases during the period. Although he kept working, Bobby Deol could not regain the stature that he had earned during the 90s. Just when his star appeal seemed to be fading, the actor made a comeback in 2020. His role in Netflix’s original Class of ’83 introduced a new side to him, proving that he has evolved over the years. Bobby Deol opened up about how his father Dharmendra’s resilience inspired him to navigate challenges, and why family, passion, and fan love remain his greatest achievements. Then came a milestone in his career as he portrayed Baba Nirala in the web series Aashram. His exceptional role as a godman with sinister plans was convincing enough to revive his career. Bobby Deol’s comeback received a major boost with his role in Sandeep Reddy Vanga’s Animal. Starring alongside Ranbir Kapoor, Bobby took the Internet by storm with his transformation into a formidable villain who had a lasting impact on the film. Bobby Deol played the role of Abrar in Animal. (Photo: X) Now, the actor is back in the limelight with films like Alpha and Thalapathy 69 in his kitty. This transformation from a romantic hero to an antagonist has resonated with audiences and filmmakers alike, making him one of the most sought-after actors of the current times. Bobby Deol’s Best Projects Gupt: Bobby Deol plays Sahil Sinha who is falsely accused of murder in this thriller. Directed by Rajiv Rai, the film was a commercial success and also starred Kajol along with Manisha Koirala in the lead roles. Both Kajol and Bobby surprised viewers with their performances. Barsaat: This romantic drama is directed by Rajkumar Santoshi. As Badal, Bobby beautifully portrays a man who falls in love with a woman from a wealthy family. The commercial success established Deol’s position as a leading actor in Bollywood as he made his debut alongside Twinkle Khanna who played his love interest. Yamla Pagla Deewana: This comedy-drama directed by Samir Karnik is one of the iconic films to date, primarily for Bobby’s collaboration with his father Dharmendra and brother Sunny Deol. Proving his versatility, Bobby won hearts for his comic timing. In the film, Dharmendra and Bobby portray a crooked father-son pair based in Varanasi. On the other hand, Sunny plays a Canada-based man who discovers that he has a father and brother in India. Animal: Sandeep Reddy Vanga’s film emerged as one of the most successful films of 2023, marking Bobby’s solid comeback in Bollywood. His role of a mute antagonist left many impressed with some of them even recreating his viral step from the song Jamal Kudu. Ranbir Kapoor and Rashmika Mandanna also joined the star cast as the lead characters. Class Of 83: A hero policeman, played by Bobby Deol, is shunted to a punishment posting as the Dean of the police academy. During his time at the academy, he decides to punish the corrupt bureaucracy and its criminal allies in return by training five lethal assassin policemen. The film earned a positive...

title: Coldplay's Chris Martin Wishes Fans On Republic Day In Ahmedabad: 'Thank You For Welcoming Us'
summary: Chris Martin sent wishes to Indians on the occasion of 76th Republic Day during their mega show in Ahmedabad.
full_content: Coldplay's Chris Martin Wishes Fans On Republic Day In Ahmedabad: 'Thank You For Welcoming Us' Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 21:58 IST Chris Martin sent wishes to Indians on the occasion of 76th Republic Day during their mega show in Ahmedabad. reset Follow us on Google News Coldplay performed in the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. (Photo Credits: X) Coldplay’s lead singer Chris Martin greeted his Indian fans in Hindi on Sunday, January 26, during the British band’s mega show in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. He also sent wishes to Indians on the occasion of India’s 76th Republic Day and thanked everyone for the warm welcome in the “beautiful country". “Namaste aap sabhi ko jo humko live stream pe dekh rahe hain (Namaste to everyone watching us on the live stream)", he said, as quoted by India Today. related stories “Hello everybody, I see you all and you look so beautiful. I see you all the way up there in the top stand. Thank you for being here. We welcome you all. Waving the Indian flag on Republic Day, that’s beautiful. Thank you all so much for making the effort to come to this show. I know it’s difficult to come here with the traffic, hotels and the ticket queues and all the bulls**t you had to go through. Thank you for making the efforts to give us this amazing day. Thank you for welcoming us to your beautiful country and thank you for letting us play for India," the singer added. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Disney+ Hotstar (@disneyplushotstar) “We’re having the best time here. We’re so grateful to you all. Many of you have made signs. So, forgive me if I don’t read all your signs. But, I’ll try and read some of them," he stated. During the performance, Coldplay also touched many hearts by singing the patriotic anthem “Vande Mataram". Coldplay is in India as a part of their globally acclaimed Music of the Spheres World Tour. The British band held two shows in Ahmedabad, whereas two more were held in Mumbai. In Ahmedabad, they performed at the Narendra Modi Stadium whereas in Mumbai they set the stage on fire at Navi Mumbai’s DY Patil Stadium. Fans who did not get a chance to watch Coldplay’s concert in Ahmedabad on January 26 were also able to watch it live on Disney+ Hotstar. tags : Chris Martin Coldplay hollywood Location : Ahmedabad, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 21:58 IST News movies Coldplay's Chris Martin Wishes Fans On Republic Day In Ahmedabad: 'Thank You For Welcoming Us' Read More

title: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone's Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Becomes 3rd Highest-Grossing Re-Release In India Since 2000
summary: The re-release of Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, reaffirmed its cult status by becoming the third-highest-grossing re-release in India since 2000.
full_content: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone's Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Becomes 3rd Highest-Grossing Re-Release In India Since 2000 Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 20:59 IST The re-release of Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, reaffirmed its cult status by becoming the third-highest-grossing re-release in India since 2000. reset Follow us on Google News Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, shines in its re-release, grossing ₹25 crore and becoming the third-highest-grossing re-release in India. Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, featuring Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Aditya Roy Kapur, and Kalki Koechlin, has proven its timeless charm with an incredibly successful re-release. Directed by Ayan Mukerji, the film hit Indian theatres once again on January 3, 2025, and its performance reaffirmed its status as a modern classic. Upon re-release, the film garnered ₹1.90 crore on its opening day, making it the second-best opening for a re-released movie in India. As demand for the film skyrocketed, additional screenings were added over the weekend, pushing its opening weekend collections to ₹6 crore. By the end of its first week, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani amassed ₹13 crore, a feat driven entirely by the nostalgia factor and the movie’s cult fan base. related stories The film’s stellar run culminated with ₹21 crore net (₹25 crore gross) at the Indian box office, making it the third-highest-grossing re-release in India since 2000. With minimal promotions, the re-release’s box office success was a testament to its enduring popularity and Dharma Productions’ strategic decision to reintroduce the beloved story to a new generation of moviegoers. Joining iconic films like Tumbbad and Ghilli on the leaderboard of re-release hits, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani secured its place among the top three. While Tumbbad claimed the top spot with ₹38 crore gross, followed by Thalapathy Vijay’s action-packed Ghilli at ₹26.5 crore, YJHD’s ₹25 crore gross proved its cultural relevance even a decade after its initial release. Highest-Grossing Re-Releases in India (Gross Figures): 1. Tumbbad – ₹38 crore 2. Ghilli – ₹26.5 crore 3. Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani – ₹25 crore 4. Titanic – ₹18 crore 5. Sholay 3D – ₹13 crore 6. Laila Majnu – ₹11.5 crore 7. Rockstar – ₹11.5 crore 8. Avatar – ₹10 crore Released originally in 2013, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani became a defining film of its era, cementing its place as one of Bollywood’s most celebrated romantic dramas. Directed by Ayan Mukerji, the film followed the intertwined journeys of four friends—Bunny (Ranbir Kapoor), Naina (Deepika Padukone), Avi (Aditya Roy Kapur), and Aditi (Kalki Koechlin)—as they navigated love, friendship, and personal ambitions. The narrative beautifully oscillated between vibrant youthful escapades and mature emotional resolutions. Bunny, a free-spirited traveler with dreams of exploring the world, and Naina, an introverted medical student yearning to break out of her shell, shared a poignant love story that resonated deeply with audiences. Aditi’s unrequited love for Avi and her eventual transformation into a confident woman added further emotional depth to the film. Set against stunning backdrops, from the snow-capped peaks of Manali to the bustling streets of Udaipur, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani was a visual treat. The film’s music, composed by Pritam, became an instant hit, with tracks like “Badtameez Dil," “Kabira," and “Ilahi" remaining evergreen favorites. YJHD celebrated the themes of self-discovery, chasing dreams, and cherishing relationships. Its blend of humor, drama, and heartwarming moments created a universal appeal that continues to attract audiences years later. tags : Ayan Mukerji bollywood Deepika Padukone Ranbir Kapoor Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 20:59 IST News movies Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone's Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Becomes 3rd Highest-Grossing Re-Release In India Since 2000 Read More

title: Maharashtra Minister's Demand Before Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Release: 'Film Should Not Be Released...'
summary: Chhaava is a historical drama that revolves around the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.
full_content: Maharashtra Minister's Demand Before Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Release: 'Film Should Not Be Released...' Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 20:18 IST Chhaava is a historical drama that revolves around the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj. reset Follow us on Google News Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava will hit theatres on February 14, 2025. (Photo: Instagram) Maharashtra Minister Uday Samant has demanded that Vicky Kaushal’s upcoming movie, Chhaava, should be shown to experts before its release. Recently, the minister took to his X (formerly Twitter) handle and praised the makers for showcasing the life of Sambhaji Maharaj via their film. However, he also mentioned that a film like this might face backlash if there are any “objectionable" scenes. He also warned the makers saying ho harm to the honour of Maharaj will be tolerated. “It is a matter of joy that a Hindi film based on the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the protector of religion and protector of freedom, is being made. Such efforts are necessary to make the world understand the history of Chhatrapati. However, many have expressed their opinions that there are some objectionable scenes in this film. Our position is that this film should not be released without first showing it to experts and knowledgeable people. Anything that will harm the honor of the Maharaj will not be tolerated," Samant wrote. related stories धर्मरक्षक,स्वराज्यरक्षक छत्रपती संभाजी महाराज यांच्या जीवनावर आधारित हिंदी चित्रपट बनणे ही आनंदाची गोष्ट आहे, छत्रपतींचा इतिहास जगाला समजावा यासाठी असे प्रयत्न आवश्यक आहे. मात्र या चित्रपटात काही आक्षेपार्ह दृश्ये असल्याबाबत अनेकांनी मते व्यक्त केली आहेत. हा चित्रपट तज्ज्ञ आणि…— Uday Samant (@samant_uday) January 25, 2025 “Our position is that the producers and directors of the film should take immediate action in this regard and remove anything objectionable. A further decision will be taken after watching the film; otherwise, this film will not be allowed to be released!" he added. Earlier today, in an interaction with PTI, Sambhajiraje Chhatrapati, a descendant of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj and former Rajya Sabha MP, also expressed his desire to watch the full film before its release. “I also offered to connect them with historians to address inaccuracies to ensure this significant story is presented authentically to audiences worldwide," he said. Chhaava is a historical drama that revolves around the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the son of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj. In the film, Vicky Kaushal is set to portray the character of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the eldest son of the Maratha empire’s founder. The film also stars Rashmika Mandanna, Akshaye Khanna, Ashutosh Rana, and Divya Dutta in key roles. Chhaava will hit theatres on February 14, 2025. tags : bollywood Vicky Kaushal Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 20:18 IST News movies Maharashtra Minister's Demand Before Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Release: 'Film Should Not Be Released...' title: Remo D'Souza Attends Maha Kumbh Mela In Disguise Amid Threats, Takes Holy Dip In Ganga; Watch
summary: Amid life threat reports, choreographer Remo D'Souza attended the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj, sharing glimpses of his spiritual journey.
full_content: Remo D'Souza Attends Maha Kumbh Mela In Disguise Amid Threats, Takes Holy Dip In Ganga; Watch Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 19:58 IST Amid life threat reports, choreographer Remo D'Souza attended the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj, sharing glimpses of his spiritual journey. reset Follow us on Google News Choreographer Remo D'Souza attended the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj in incognito mode, performing a sacred dip and seeking blessings. Amid reports of threats to his life, choreographer and filmmaker Remo D’Souza recently attended the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 in Prayagraj, opting for an incognito visit to seek spiritual blessings. The celebrated artist was accompanied by his wife, Lizelle D’Souza, and shared glimpses of his low-profile spiritual journey on social media. Remo D’Souza shared a video of his visit, where he is seen taking a sacred dip in the holy waters of Prayagraj, a tradition that holds immense significance during the Kumbh Mela. Clad in simple all-black traditional attire with his face partially covered, Remo managed to blend in with the crowd, maintaining anonymity while immersing himself in the spiritual atmosphere. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Remo Dsouza (@remodsouza) The video also showcased a serene moment where Remo sought blessings from the revered Swami Kailashanand Giri Maharaj. In another post, both Remo and Lizelle were seen meeting the spiritual leader, emphasizing the importance of their spiritual quest. Remo posted the video without a caption but added hashtags like #harhargange, #mahakumbh2025, #mahakumbhmela2025, #uttarpradeshtourism, and #prayagraj, subtly highlighting the significance of the Maha Kumbh Mela and his connection to the holy event. Reports have recently surfaced about alleged death threats received by Remo D’Souza, Kapil Sharma, Rajpal Yadav, and Sugandha Mishra. An FIR has been registered in Mumbai, and the police are actively investigating the matter. According to the email, which was sent under the alias “BISHNU," the sender claimed to be monitoring the activities of the individuals and emphasized the seriousness of the threat. A specific email was sent to actor Rajpal Yadav, reportedly linking the threats to Kapil Sharma’s show, which is said to be sponsored by Salman Khan. However, Lizelle D’Souza dismissed these claims in an interview with Hindustan Times, clarifying that the reports were false. She explained, “Even we read it in the media. We got spam emails on the company email ID regarding something else, for which we informed the cops. The cyber department is looking into it, and they also feel it’s spam." Lizelle further added that there is no cause for concern and speculated that the media may have misinterpreted the situation. tags : bollywood mahakumbh Remo D'Souza television Location : Prayagraj, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 19:56 IST News movies Remo D'Souza Attends Maha Kumbh Mela In Disguise Amid Threats, Takes Holy Dip In Ganga; Watch Read More

title: Ibrahim Ali Khan Spotted At Saif Ali Khan's Bandra Home Amid The Knife Attack Controversy | Watch
summary: Earlier today, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were also seen stepping out together for the first time since the horrific stabbing incident.
full_content: Ibrahim Ali Khan Spotted At Saif Ali Khan's Bandra Home Amid The Knife Attack Controversy | Watch Published By : Chirag Sehgal IANS Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 19:29 IST Earlier today, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were also seen stepping out together for the first time since the horrific stabbing incident. reset Follow us on Google News Ibrahim Ali Khan is Saif Ali Khan's son from his first marriage. Ibrahim Ali Khan was recently papped outside his father Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor’s Bandra home. He looked his usual cool self in a blue shirt, white trousers, and matching sneakers. Going by the video doing rounds on social media, Ibrahim did not talk to the paparazzi, but politely acknowledged them before going inside the building. Earlier today, Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor were also seen stepping out together for the first time since the horrific stabbing incident. The ‘Aarakshan’ actor opted for a blue T-shirt and matching denim. Accompanying him, Kareena Kapoor looked breezy in a gray sweatshirt, black baggy trousers, and a sports cap. The Bollywood couple was surrounded by high security. Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor have reportedly been provided temporary police protection following the attack. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Bollywood Chronicle (@bollywoodchronicle) Meanwhile, Saif Ali Khan was stabbed several times in the wee hours of 16th January 2025 at his Bandra residence during an attempted robbery. He also underwent two surgeries at the Lilavati hospital. Association of Medical Consultants Mumbai wrote to The Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI) raising concerns over the quick approval of the insurance claims. Health insurance expert, Nikhil Jha shared the letter sent by the Medical Consultants Mumbai on X (formerly known as Twitter). He wrote, “The normal process is to ask for an FIR copy in medicolegal cases. The insurance company waived off this requirement and immediately approved the cashless request for Rs 25 lacs. The final bill apparently Rs 36 lacs which was also approved. The surgery and stay for 4 days does not justify the huge bill and the prompt approval". He further revealed, “If this was any normal person The company would have applied reasonable and customary charges and not paid the claim IRDAI should answer why Niva Bupa gave preferential treatment to a celebrity and made it hard for normal people to get a claim?". In the meantime, Mumbai police have taken into custody the suspect identified as Shariful Islam Shehzad Mohammad Rohilla Amin Fakir. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - IANS ) tags : bollywood ibrahim ali khan Saif ali khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 19:25 IST News movies Ibrahim Ali Khan Spotted At Saif Ali Khan's Bandra Home Amid The Knife Attack Controversy | Watch Read More

title: Alia Bhatt Stuns In Sabyasachi Saree, Pays Heartfelt Tribute To His 25-Year Legacy: 'A Visionary And Storyteller'
summary: Alia Bhatt recently took to Instagram to celebrate Sabyasachi Mukherjee's 25 years in fashion. Draped in a stunning black saree by the iconic designer, Alia praised his legacy as a visionary who seamlessly blends Indian heritage with modern elegance.
full_content: Alia Bhatt Stuns In Sabyasachi Saree, Pays Heartfelt Tribute To His 25-Year Legacy: 'A Visionary And Storyteller' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 18:42 IST Alia Bhatt recently took to Instagram to celebrate Sabyasachi Mukherjee's 25 years in fashion. Draped in a stunning black saree by the iconic designer, Alia praised his legacy as a visionary who seamlessly blends Indian heritage with modern elegance. reset Follow us on Google News Alia Bhatt celebrates 25 years of Sabyasachi Mukherjee with a heartfelt tribute. Alia Bhatt, one of Bollywood’s most cherished stars, recently turned to Instagram to celebrate a momentous milestone in the illustrious career of renowned designer Sabyasachi Mukherjee. In a heartfelt post, Alia paid tribute to the designer’s 25-year journey, applauding him not just as a creator of fashion but as a visionary and storyteller who has elevated Indian couture on the global stage. In a photo and video carousel, Alia showcased herself draped in a mesmerizing black saree by Sabyasachi that seamlessly merges traditional elegance with modern sophistication. The saree features a flowing, luxurious fabric, paired with an intricately embellished blouse adorned with dazzling sequins and beadwork. The blouse’s bold design, with a deep neckline and sleeveless silhouette, added a contemporary edge to her look. Minimal yet striking accessories, including statement earrings and a bold ring, complemented the outfit, while her sleek updo and the mirrored backdrop enhanced the regal aesthetic. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Alia Bhatt 💛 (@aliaabhatt) Alia began her post by acknowledging Sabyasachi’s profound influence on fashion, writing, “To me, Sabya, you are more than a designer—you’re a visionary and a storyteller." Her words encapsulated the essence of Sabyasachi’s artistry, which has consistently fused India’s cultural richness with modern-day sensibilities, creating designs that resonate globally. Reflecting on her personal connection with the designer, Alia shared her gratitude for wearing his creations during monumental moments in her life. From gracing international red carpets to donning his iconic bridal ensemble for her wedding to Ranbir Kapoor, Alia has been a long-standing muse of Sabyasachi. “I’ve been privileged to wear your creations over the years, from global red carpets to personal milestones (wedding memories I’ll cherish forever)," she wrote, highlighting the emotional significance of her association with the designer. Sabyasachi’s philosophy, rooted in preserving India’s heritage through fashion, has been a cornerstone of his success. Alia celebrated this ethos by recalling one of his iconic statements: “I believe that the best fashion comes from a deep understanding of culture and heritage." She praised his dedication to Indian craftsmanship, noting how his work has not only preserved traditional artistry but also redefined it for a contemporary audience. Sabyasachi’s ability to revive age-old textiles and embroidery techniques while infusing them with modern aesthetics has cemented his legacy in the fashion industry. In closing her post, Alia raised a toast to Sabyasachi’s enduring brilliance, writing, “Here’s to many more years of brilliance and magic!!!!! Happy 25 years of Sabyasachi 🌟." She also expressed her admiration for his latest show, adding a playful note: “P.S.: Still can’t get over the show you created last night… okay bye 👋." Sabyasachi Mukherjee’s remarkable journey over the past 25 years has redefined Indian couture. Known for his opulent bridal wear, regal sarees, and intricate craftsmanship, he has become a global ambassador for Indian fashion. His collaborations with luxury brands and his ability to merge India’s cultural essence with international trends have solidified his reputation as a maestro of design. tags : Alia Bhatt bollywood fashion Sabyasachi Sabyasachi Mukherjee Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 18:42 IST News movies Alia Bhatt Stuns In Sabyasachi Saree, Pays Heartfelt Tribute To His 25-Year Legacy: 'A Visionary And Storyteller' Read More

title: Urvashi Rautela Hugs Her Hospitalised Mother, Urges All To Pray For Her | Photo
summary: Urvashi Rautela also mentioned that she kept bringing up her film Daaku Maharaaj as the interviews were lined up to celebrate the success of her film.
full_content: Urvashi Rautela Hugs Her Hospitalised Mother, Urges All To Pray For Her | Photo Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 18:42 IST Urvashi Rautela also mentioned that she kept bringing up her film Daaku Maharaaj as the interviews were lined up to celebrate the success of her film. reset Follow us on Google News Urvashi Rautela shares a picture of her mother from hospital. (Photos: Instagram) Urvashi Rautela took to her Instagram handle on Sunday, January 26, to reveal that her mother has been hospitalised. She shared a picture in which she was seen hugging her mother, as the latter lay on the hospital bed. Even though the actress did not share the reason for her mother’s hospitalisation, she urged everyone to pray for her. “PL PRAY FOR MY MOTHER #MeeraRautela 🙏🏻," Urvashi wrote. Urvashi Rautela was recently also in the news as she faced backlash for her comments about the attack on actor Saif Ali Khan. While condemning the attack, the actress shifted the conversation to discussing expensive gifts that her parents had given her after the success of her film ‘Daaku Maharaaj’. She flaunted her diamond-studded Rolex and other jewellery. This left netizens disappointed, who then called her insensitive. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by URVASHI RAUTELA (@urvashirautela) However, in a recent interview, Urvashi talked about the incident. She claimed that she was caught off guard and was unaware of the full details of the attack on Saif Ali Khan. “I think I should have been way more careful with the way I answered. I have to admit that I should have answered it more carefully. Also, the incident happened at 4 am (Saif’s attack), and very next day my interviews happened at 8 am. So, I was completely kind of clueless. All I remember is that when I was waking up someone told me, he got hurt. I don’t know the intensity of how he got hurt. I wasn’t aware of the intensity of what all has happened with him," she said. Urvashi further mentioned that she kept bringing up her film Daaku Maharaaj as the interviews were lined up to celebrate the success of her film. She also admitted that the excitement about her parents’ gifts caused her to go off-topic, and that it was a moment of misplaced enthusiasm rather than an attempt to ‘show-off’. tags : bollywood Urvashi Rautela Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 18:42 IST News movies Urvashi Rautela Hugs Her Hospitalised Mother, Urges All To Pray For Her | Photo Read More

title: Kajol Reacts To Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Tribute By Indonesian Delegation: 'Bollywood’s Power To Unite Shines Again'
summary: A heartwarming moment unfolded during a banquet hosted by President Droupadi Murmu at Rashtrapati Bhavan, where an Indonesian delegation sang the Bollywood classic Kuch Kuch Hota Hai to honor their ties with India.
full_content: Kajol Reacts To Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Tribute By Indonesian Delegation: 'Bollywood’s Power To Unite Shines Again' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 18:27 IST A heartwarming moment unfolded during a banquet hosted by President Droupadi Murmu at Rashtrapati Bhavan, where an Indonesian delegation sang the Bollywood classic Kuch Kuch Hota Hai to honor their ties with India. reset Follow us on Google News Kajol reacts to an Indonesian delegation singing Kuch Kuch Hota Hai during a Republic Day banquet hosted by President Droupadi Murmu. A delegation from Indonesia made headlines when they sang the Bollywood classic Kuch Kuch Hota Hai during a banquet hosted by President Droupadi Murmu at Rashtrapati Bhavan in honor of Prabowo Subianto, the President of Indonesia. The event, which celebrated India’s 76th Republic Day, saw the Indonesian President and senior ministers in attendance. The heartfelt gesture, symbolizing Bollywood’s global influence, marked President Subianto’s first State Visit to India. Reacting to the delightful tribute, actress Kajol took to social media to share her excitement. She wrote on X, “Bollywood’s power to unite shines again! The Indonesian delegation singing Kuch Kuch Hota Hai is such a heartwarming tribute. Truly honored! ❤️🌏 #KuchKuchHotaHai #IndiaIndonesia." related stories #WATCH | Delhi: A delegation from Indonesia sang Bollywood song 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' at the banquet hosted by President Droupadi Murmu in honour of Prabowo Subianto, President of Indonesia at Rashtrapati Bhavan. The delegation included senior Indonesian ministers. The… pic.twitter.com/CNttOIlSze — ANI (@ANI) January 26, 2025 First released on October 16, 1998, Kuch Kuch Hota Hai became a cultural phenomenon that redefined Bollywood romance. Written and directed by Karan Johar in his debut project, the film featured Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, and Rani Mukerji in lead roles, with Salman Khan making a special appearance. The story intertwined themes of love, friendship, and self-discovery, presented in two contrasting narratives. The first half captured the vibrant college life of Rahul (Shah Rukh Khan), his tomboyish best friend Anjali (Kajol), and the charming Tina (Rani Mukerji). Rahul’s belief that “love is friendship" shaped the dynamics of their relationship, leaving Anjali heartbroken when Rahul fell for Tina. The second half transitioned into a poignant story of loss and reconciliation, as Tina’s letters to her daughter, Anjali Khanna, set the stage for reuniting the elder Anjali and Rahul. The film struck an emotional chord with audiences worldwide, seamlessly blending humor, drama, and sentiment. Its universal themes of unrequited love and second chances resonated deeply, making it a timeless classic. The soundtrack, composed by Jatin-Lalit, became an instant sensation with hits like “Kuch Kuch Hota Hai," “Tujhe Yaad Na Meri Aayi," and “Koi Mil Gaya," further elevating its appeal. Kajol’s portrayal of Anjali showcased her versatility, transforming from a carefree tomboy to a mature woman. Shah Rukh Khan’s charisma and Rani Mukerji’s elegance added depth to the narrative, while Salman Khan’s cameo as Aman brought another layer of complexity to the story. The film’s success was reflected in its numerous accolades, including eight Filmfare Awards, such as Best Film, Best Director, and acting honors for its stellar cast. Decades later, Kuch Kuch Hota Hai continues to inspire global audiences, as seen in the Indonesian delegation’s heartfelt tribute. Its evergreen music, memorable dialogues, and iconic characters cement its place as one of Bollywood’s most cherished films, showcasing the universal power of cinema to bridge cultures and create connections. tags : bollywood Kajol Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 18:27 IST News movies Kajol Reacts To Kuch Kuch Hota Hai Tribute By Indonesian Delegation: 'Bollywood’s Power To Unite Shines Again' Read More

title: Ed Sheeran Creates History, Becomes First International Music Artist To Perform In Bhutan
summary: Ed Sheeran also revealed that he had a chance to share a meal with the country's royal couple, King Jigme Khesar and Queen Jetsun Pema.
full_content: Ed Sheeran Creates History, Becomes First International Music Artist To Perform In Bhutan Published By : Chirag Sehgal IANS Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 17:57 IST Ed Sheeran also revealed that he had a chance to share a meal with the country's royal couple, King Jigme Khesar and Queen Jetsun Pema. reset Follow us on Google News Singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran just created history as he became the first international music artist to perform a concert in Bhutan. Recently, the ‘Shape of You’ hitmaker took to his social media, and shared a video on Instagram featuring highlights of his time in the South Asian country as he reflected on the milestone, reports ‘People’ magazine. “Had the honour to be the first ever international artist to play Bhutan last night", he wrote in the caption, referring to his January 24 show at Changlimithang Stadium in the capital of Thimphu. “What a gig, what a country, what a beautiful place with incredible people." It seems his Bhutan visit had quite an impact on him, as he continued, “Lemme know if I can move there, please and thank you". related stories As per ‘People’, the singer concluded his caption by thanking the country for welcoming him and his touring crew for the “historic show" and sharing his hope that he would “see you again soon". View this post on Instagram A post shared by Ed Sheeran (@teddysphotos) In the video, the four-time Grammy winner shared more thoughts about his musical first. “It’s mad that this is the first international concert here", he said as he stood by the stage setup at the Bhutan venue. “I hope that there’s many more to come". He also revealed that he had a chance to share a meal with the country’s royal couple, King Jigme Khesar and Queen Jetsun Pema. “I went for dinner with the king and queen yesterday and they said, ‘We just want people coming to the country that want to love and respect the country and understand the ideals’". He added, “Yeah, I feel super honored that I was chosen and I can’t wait to play. This is like such my jam (sic)". The video then cuts to footage of the singer rocking out onstage during the concert, as the crowd roared and jumped up and down in excitement. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - IANS ) tags : ed sheeran hollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 17:57 IST News movies Ed Sheeran Creates History, Becomes First International Music Artist To Perform In Bhutan Read More

title: Shah Rukh Khan Pens Strong Note On Republic Day: 'Let's Uphold Values Of Our Constitution'
summary: Shah Rukh Khan also shared a picture in which he was seen saluting India's tricolour.
full_content: Shah Rukh Khan Pens Strong Note On Republic Day: 'Let's Uphold Values Of Our Constitution' Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 17:06 IST Shah Rukh Khan also shared a picture in which he was seen saluting India's tricolour. reset Follow us on Google News Shah Rukh Khan will soon be seen in King. Shah Rukh Khan took to his X (formerly Twitter) handle on Sunday to pen down a strong note on the occasion of Republic Day. He urged everyone to uphold the values of the Indian constitution. SRK also shared a picture in which he was seen saluting India’s tricolour. “This Republic Day, let’s promise ourselves to contribute to an India that we can proudly pass on to the generations to come. Let’s uphold the values of the Constitution and hold our heads high with pride. Happy Republic Day and Jai Hind," he wrote. Check it out here: related stories This Republic Day, let’s promise ourselves to contribute to an India that we can proudly pass on to the generations to come. Let’s uphold the values of the Constitution and hold our heads high with pride. Happy Republic Day and Jai Hind. pic.twitter.com/2xN3Z24w9N — Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) January 26, 2025 Earlier today, Akshay Kumar also extended Republic Day wishes to fans and wrote, “We’re free today because of the sacrifices of yesterday. Let’s honor this freedom by our actions and take India to greater heights. Happy Republic Day!" Actor turned politician Kamal Haasan also posted on X, “India was built on a dream, where peace was the answer, not violence; India was built on a dream, where faith could be practiced without fear; India was built on a dream, where voices could speak freely, and every idea had its place; India was built on a dream, where sovereignty belonged to the people, not the powerful; India was built on a dream, where unity was woven from the threads of diversity; India was built on a dream, where the Constitution wasn’t just a document, but the conscience of the nation. In our collective hands rests the destiny of a nation that shines brighter with each passing day. Happy Republic Day to you all." Among others, Amitabh Bachchan, Anushka Sharma, Shilpa Shetty, Sonu Sood and Ram Charan also extended Republic Day wishes to all. tags : bollywood Shah Rukh Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 17:06 IST News movies Shah Rukh Khan Pens Strong Note On Republic Day: 'Let's Uphold Values Of Our Constitution' Read More

title: Mamta Kulkarni Declares ‘I Can’t Even Imagine Doing Films Again’ After Taking Sanyaas At Maha Kumbh Mela
summary: Mamta Kulkarni, the bold Bollywood star of the '90s, has embraced a profound spiritual journey, declaring a return to films as "absolutely impossible."
full_content: Mamta Kulkarni Declares ‘I Can’t Even Imagine Doing Films Again’ After Taking Sanyaas At Maha Kumbh Mela Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 16:51 IST Mamta Kulkarni, the bold Bollywood star of the '90s, has embraced a profound spiritual journey, declaring a return to films as "absolutely impossible." reset Follow us on Google News Mamta Kulkarni, '90s Bollywood star, embraces spirituality at Maha Kumbh Mela 2025, taking sanyaas with Kinnar Akhara. Mamta Kulkarni, the bold and glamorous Bollywood star of the ’90s, has once again captured attention—this time for her spiritual journey. The actress, who recently took sanyaas during the Maha Kumbh Mela 2025 with the Kinnar Akhara, has declared that returning to the film industry is unimaginable for her. Reflecting on her transformation, she shared that her focus is now entirely on spirituality, marking a significant departure from her Bollywood days. In a candid conversation with India Today, Mamta stated, “I can’t even imagine doing films again. It is absolutely impossible for me now." She described her spiritual journey as deeply fulfilling, likening her honor as a Mahamandaleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara to winning an Olympic medal after 23 years of devotion. related stories The Kinnar Akhara, which represents the divine Ardhnareshwar form of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvati, resonated with her desire for freedom and spiritual awakening. Mamta expressed her gratitude for the blessings of Goddess Adishakti, saying that her journey has been guided by divine will. During the Maha Kumbh Mela, Mamta performed the sacred pind daan at the Sangam and was crowned as the Mahamandaleshwar of the Kinnar Akhara. She has since taken the name Shri Yamai Mamta Nand Giri, embracing her new role as a spiritual leader. This prestigious title within the Dashanami order is granted to respected Hindu monks entrusted with promoting Sanatan Dharma. In an earlier interview with ANI, Mamta revealed that her decision was guided by Mahadev, Maha Kaali, and her Guru. She shared that the timing was beyond her control, emphasizing that it was all part of a divine plan. Mamta Kulkarni, once a celebrated actress known for films like Karan Arjun, has remained out of the spotlight for years. Her choice to renounce worldly pursuits and embrace a spiritual life with the Kinnar Akhara signifies a profound shift, ushering in a transformative chapter in her journey. tags : bollywood mahakumbh mamta kulkarni Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 16:51 IST News movies Mamta Kulkarni Declares ‘I Can’t Even Imagine Doing Films Again’ After Taking Sanyaas At Maha Kumbh Mela Read More

title: Saif Ali Khan Attack Case: Detained By Mistake, Chhattisgarh Native Loses Job & Marriage Proposal
summary: Kanojia said that things were going smooth for his family after a long time but his detention has changed everything.
full_content: Saif Ali Khan Attack Case: Detained By Mistake, Chhattisgarh Native Loses Job & Marriage Proposal Curated By : Manisha Roy News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 17:07 IST Kanojia said that things were going smooth for his family after a long time but his detention has changed everything. reset Follow us on Google News Kanojia was detained from Durg railway station while he was on his back to his native place in Chhattisgarh. (ANI photo) The earlier detention of a Colaba resident in connection with the attack on Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has resulted in him losing his job and cancellation of his marriage, according to a report in Hindustan Times. The 31-year-old Mumbai resident, identified as Akash Kailash Kanojia, was detained on January 18, two days after a horrifying attack on the actor at his Bandra residence. Kanojia was detained from Durg railway station while he was on his way back to his native place, Nehla, in Chhattisgarh from Mumbai. related stories The Colaba resident told Hindustan Times that he was travelling to Bilaspur via Jnaneswar Express on January 17 to meet his ailing grandmother and prospective bride when he was detained by railway protection force (RPF) officers at the station. This happened after an erroneous alert by Mumbai police to RPF, claiming that Kanojia was the person behind the foiled robbery attempt at actor’s Mumbai residence. Sharing the ordeal, the 31-year-old said that soon after he was nabbed, his photographs were circulated widely on TV channels and media outlets which led him to losing his job as well as suffering a setback in personal life as the bride’s family refused to meet him. “The RPF personnel not only apprehended me, they also issued a press release with my photograph, which was shown widely by television channels and media outlets. As a result, the bride’s family cancelled the meeting with me and my employer terminated my services," Hindustan Times quoted Kanojia as saying. Kanojia worked as a driver for a tour company which works with Western Railway in Mumbai. On January 17, he received a call from Mumbai police, which asked him about his whereabouts. When he told the officer that he was at home, the latter disconnected the call, he told Hindustan Times. “The next day, I boarded Jnaneswari Express from Mumbai hoping to visit my ailing grandmother in our native place Nehla in Chhattisgarh. I was supposed to change trains in Bilaspur to go to Nehla and was slated to meet the family of my prospective bride later," he told HT. On January 18, when the train reached Durg junction at around 10am, RPF personnel detained him, suspecting him to be Saif’s attacker and took him to Raipur. The Mumbai police team reached there almost 12 hours later and told him that he would be brought back to the city the following day for further probe. He told police that he had nothing to do with the attack but they didn’t listen to him. “I told the police that I had nothing to do with the attack on Saif Ali Khan and offered to make them speak with my relatives. I also told them that they could check footage from CCTVs installed near my house to clarify their doubts. But they did not pay any heed – instead, they took my photos and circulated them in the media, claiming I was the attacker," said Kanojia. However, the same day, police arrested Shariful Islam Shehzad, an alleged Bangladeshi national, from Thane, claiming him to be the real attacker. The next morning on Jan 19, Kanojia was released but he requested them to take him back to Mumbai as he feared that they might follow his trail and question him in front of his family members and relatives. But his plea was turned down. “When I spoke to my mother (in Mumbai) after being released, she seemed very worried as my photo had been shown on all news channels and asked me to return home immediately. The next day, when I called my employer, he asked me to stop reporting for work, saying, ‘You are in legal trouble and I don’t want to get into trouble because of you’. I tried explaining the matter to him but he wasn’t willing to hear me out," said Kanojia. In the meantime, he got a call from his grandmother, who told him that the family of his prospective bride had refused to go ahead with the marriage proposal after the entire episode. “After what has happened, I am not sure if I will be able to get married in future," he said. He rued that things were going smooth for his family after a long time, but his detention has changed everything. “My brother died some time back after prolonged medical treatment, for which we had to sell whatever we had, including our house in Virar. My father’s garage in Colaba was also shut down after somebody cheated him of ₹9 lakh and fled the country," said Kanojia, who is an accused in a drug-related case and a theft case. “I hope the courts will eventually clear me of all the charges," he said. After all the chaos, Kanojia wants all his photos, identifying him as the attacker, be taken down fr...

title: Dilip Kumar Believed True Essence Of India Lies In Equality, Saira Banu Remembers Him On Republic Day
summary: Saira Banu shares throwback pictures of Dilip Kumar on the occasion of Republic Day.
full_content: Dilip Kumar Believed True Essence Of India Lies In Equality, Saira Banu Remembers Him On Republic Day Published By : Chirag Sehgal IANS Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 16:40 IST Saira Banu shares throwback pictures of Dilip Kumar on the occasion of Republic Day. reset Follow us on Google News Saira Banu recalls late Dilip Kumar’s unforgettable scene in ‘Leader’. (Photo: Instagram) On Republic Day, veteran actress Saira Banu fondly reminisced about her late husband and the legendary actor Dilip Kumar, recalling one of his most unforgettable scenes in the iconic film “Leader." On Sunday, Banu took to her Instagram handle and shared a series of black-and-white photos and throwback clips of Dilip Kumar from his popular movies. She penned a heartfelt note revealing that the late actor was a firm believer in fulfilling one’s rights and duties, and he always placed the right to equality above all else. related stories Saira Banu wrote, “I have always believed that a nation’s strength lies in its diversity, but it is balanced by only one thing: equality. This isn’t merely my belief, but one that my Sahib held close to his heart. He often said that in India, despite our vast differences in language, culture, and beliefs, the true essence of our nation lies in treating everyone as equals. This was the cornerstone of his life and work, and it is a principle I cherish deeply." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Saira Banu Khan (@sairabanu) The actress added, “Sahib was a firm believer in fulfilling one’s rights and duties, always placing the right to equality above all else. He believed that equality wasn’t just a constitutional promise, it was a moral duty we owe to one another as human beings." The post further read, “I am reminded of one of his unforgettable scenes in Leader opposite Vijayanthimala Akka, where he delivers a stirring dialogue about the strength of unity. With that quintessential conviction in his voice, Sahib said that equality forms the foundation of progress and that our collective power as a nation lies in standing together, uplifting one another, and treating each other with compassion and dignity." “He also believed these small acts of kindness could bridge even the greatest divides and create a world of togetherness. As we celebrate this Republic Day, I extend my heartfelt gratitude to every individual who dedicates their efforts to nurturing the spirit of humanity in our great nation. Let us remember that each of us plays a vital role in letting humanity prevail." Saira Banu concluded the post by asking everyone to honour the ideals that make India unique and incredible. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - IANS ) tags : bollywood dilip kumar Saira Banu Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 16:40 IST News movies Dilip Kumar Believed True Essence Of India Lies In Equality, Saira Banu Remembers Him On Republic Day Read More

title: Saif Ali Khan's Rs 25 Lakh Insurance Claim Approval In Few Hours Sparks Row: 'Not For Common Man'
summary: Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case: The Bollywood actor was rushed to the Lilavati hospital on January 16 after being stabbed by an intruder at his Bandra residence.
full_content: Saif Ali Khan's Rs 25 Lakh Insurance Claim Approval In Few Hours Sparks Row: 'Not For Common Man' Curated By : Ronit Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 16:52 IST Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case: The Bollywood actor was rushed to the Lilavati hospital on January 16 after being stabbed by an intruder at his Bandra residence. reset Follow us on Google News Actor Saif Ali Khan discharged from Lilavati Hospital | File Image/X Saif Ali Khan Stabbing Case: The Association of Medical Consultants (AMC), a group of 14,000 professionals, called out the Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI) over the “quick" sanction of Rs 25 lakh for cashless treatment of actor Saif Ali Khan at Lilavati Hospital in Bandra last week. Terming it as “preferential treatment" for celebrities, AMC noted that the claim was sanctioned within hours, which is not the normal scenario in most of the cases for common policyholders. related stories Health insurance expert Nikhil Jha shared AMC’s concerns, highlighting systemic inequality in claim approvals. He added that the insurance company would have not paid the claim in case of any common person. He further argued that preferential treatment being given to high-profile people raises critical questions about fairness and equality in the health system. “The Insurance company sanctioned 25 lakhs within a few hours to Lilavati Hospital for the treatment of Saif Ali Khan. The normal process is to ask for an FIR copy in medicolegal cases. The insurance company waived this requirement and immediately approved the cashless request for 25 lakhs," Jha said in an X post. 🚨Association of Medical Consultants Mumbai writes to IRDAIWhy was preferential treatment given to Saif Ali Khan? “Apparently the Insurance company sanctioned 25 lakhs within a few hours to Lilavati hospital for the treatment of Saif Ali Khan. The normal process is to ask… pic.twitter.com/1QyPrTD8gM — Nikhil Jha (@NIKHILLJHA) January 25, 2025 During Saif Ali Khan’s treatment, the sensitive details of his health insurance claim were leaked online, showing that the actor applied for a claim of Rs 35.95 lakh. The insurer confirmed that documents submitted for the Bollywood actor’s treatment indicated a claim of Rs 35.95 lakh, of which Rs 25 lakh had already been approved. AMC’s Letter To IRDAI According to the AMC letter, Khan’s insurance claim “highlights a troubling trend where celebrities and high-profile individuals and patients with corporate policies receive favourable terms and higher cashless treatment limits, while ordinary citizens struggle with insufficient coverage and low reimbursement rates." Such practices create an unfair disparity and undermine the principle of equitable healthcare access, the letter added. Dr Sudhir Naik, who heads AMC’s medico-legal cell, said, “We are not against corporate hospitals or celebrities, we want the same treatment for the ordinary patients patronising nursing homes." Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan was rushed to the Lilavati hospital on January 16 after being stabbed by an intruder at his Bandra residence. The attacker, identified as Mohammad Shariful Islam Shehzad, was arrested from Thane after three days of intense manhunt. tags : Saif ali khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 16:23 IST News movies Saif Ali Khan's Rs 25 Lakh Insurance Claim Approval In Few Hours Sparks Row: 'Not For Common Man' Read More

title: Aamir Khan Visits Statue Of Unity On Republic Day, Calls PM Modi’s Vision ‘Extraordinary’; Watch Here
summary: India celebrates its 76th Republic Day with patriotic fervor as citizens and celebrities join in the festivities. Bollywood stars, including Aamir Khan, marked the occasion, with the actor visiting the Statue of Unity in Gujarat.
full_content: Aamir Khan Visits Statue Of Unity On Republic Day, Calls PM Modi’s Vision ‘Extraordinary’; Watch Here Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 16:07 IST India celebrates its 76th Republic Day with patriotic fervor as citizens and celebrities join in the festivities. Bollywood stars, including Aamir Khan, marked the occasion, with the actor visiting the Statue of Unity in Gujarat. reset Follow us on Google News Celebrate India’s 76th Republic Day as Aamir Khan visits the Statue of Unity, honoring freedom fighters and praising PM Modi’s vision. India celebrates its 76th Republic Day today with citizens coming together in a spirit of patriotism and unity. Social media platforms are abuzz with greetings from fans and celebrities alike. Bollywood stars such as Alia Bhatt, Priyanka Chopra, Anushka Sharma, Akshay Kumar, and others have shared heartfelt messages to commemorate the occasion. Adding to the celebratory atmosphere, Aamir Khan visited the Statue of Unity in Ekta Nagar, Gujarat, where he lauded PM Narendra Modi’s vision in creating the world’s tallest statue. Speaking at a press conference, Aamir Khan shared his reflections: “I had the opportunity to sit down and reflect on the freedom fighters, including my great-uncle Maulana Azad, who stood alongside Gandhi during the struggle. It was a very special day for me, and I truly enjoyed myself. This is a remarkable place that PM Modi envisioned and built. It has become something extraordinary. I encourage all citizens to visit here." related stories VIDEO | Republic Day 2025: Actor Aamir Khan speaks at a press conference during his visit to the Statue of Unity in Ekta Nagar, Gujarat. Here's what he said:"I had the opportunity to sit down and reflect on the freedom fighters, including my great-uncle Maulana Azad, who was… pic.twitter.com/5VgFA3wETV — Press Trust of India (@PTI_News) January 26, 2025 The Statue of Unity, standing at an impressive height of 182 meters (597 feet), is located near Kevadia in Gujarat. It depicts Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel, a key figure in India’s independence movement and the country’s first Deputy Prime Minister and Home Minister. Known for his pivotal role in the political integration of India, Patel’s statue faces the Sardar Sarovar Dam on the Narmada River, approximately 100 kilometers southeast of Vadodara. Announced by Narendra Modi in 2010 during his tenure as Gujarat’s Chief Minister, the construction of the statue began in October 2013, led by Indian company Larsen & Toubro. Designed by Indian sculptor Ram V. Sutar, the project cost ₹27 billion (US$422 million) and was inaugurated on October 31, 2018, marking the 143rd anniversary of Sardar Patel’s birth. On the professional front, Aamir Khan is gearing up for an eventful 2025 with a diverse lineup of projects both as an actor and producer. His upcoming slate includes films like Lahore: 1947, Sitaare Zameen Par, Ek Din, and Pritam Pyaare. Sources close to PinkVilla reveal that Aamir is exploring release strategies, with the Rajkumar Santoshi-directed Lahore: 1947, also starring Sunny Deol, aiming for an August 2025 release. tags : aamir khan bollywood Narendra Modi pm modi pm narendra modi republic day 2025 statue of unity Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 16:07 IST News movies Aamir Khan Visits Statue Of Unity On Republic Day, Calls PM Modi’s Vision ‘Extraordinary’; Watch Here Read More

title: Dhanush Sends Wishes To 'Dear' Ajith Kumar On Padma Bhushan Win, Says 'Hearty Congratulations'

Also congratulating  @ashwinravi99 on being the first Tamil Nadu cricketer to having being conferred a Padma Shri. My congratulations to all other Padma awardees who have made the nation proud In their respective fields," Dhanush wrote. related stories Prior to Dhanush, SS Rajamouli also posted on X, “Ajith sir, congratulations on being conferred with the Padma Bhushan! title: Janhvi Kapoor Gives Sneak-Peek Into ‘Kerala Diaries’ Amid Param Sundari Shoot, Boney Kapoor Reacts | PICS
summary: Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra are shooting for their upcoming film Param Sundari in Kerala. The actress reunited with her Ulajh co-star Roshan Matthew while exploring Kerala.
full_content: Janhvi Kapoor Gives Sneak-Peek Into ‘Kerala Diaries’ Amid Param Sundari Shoot, Boney Kapoor Reacts | PICS Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 15:55 IST Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra are shooting for their upcoming film Param Sundari in Kerala. The actress reunited with her Ulajh co-star Roshan Matthew while exploring Kerala. reset Follow us on Google News Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra are shooting for Param Sundari in Kerala. Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra are currently in Kerala, shooting for their upcoming film ‘Param Sundari’. While the actress has been busy shooting for the film, looks like she took some time off to explore the beautiful state. Janhvi shared a number of pictures on her Instagram account, giving fans a sneak-peek into ‘Kerala diaries’. One of the pictures also features her Ulajh co-star Roshan Matthew. Janhvi Kapoor looked absolutely gorgeous in a white saree with dainty floral print. She explored local temples and churches in Kerala.  In one picture, she is seen taking a stroll through a beautiful street with her Ulajh co-star Roshan Matthew. She tied her hair back in a bun, and put on dark sunglasses. Meanwhile, Roshan Matthew rocked a white shirt and black pants. The next picture shows her feeding an elephant, while another one shows her basking in the winter sun. Janhvi is also seen gorging on delicious food at a café in Kochi in the last photo. Clearly, she had a great time exploring Kerala. “A day well spent #keraladiaries," she wrote in the caption. Check out the pictures below! related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Janhvi Kapoor (@janhvikapoor) Meanwhile, as soon as she shared the photos, Janhvi’s father Boney Kapoor reacted to it. He wrote, “I can see that you are really enjoying Kerala." The actress’ fans also showered her with compliments, gushing over how pretty she looks. Meanwhile, yesterday, a BTS video from Param Sundari shoot , featuring Sidharth and Janhvi went viral on social media. The clip, shared by a Reddit user, shows Sidharth Malhotra (playing Param) and Janhvi Kapoor (playing Sundari) at the picturesque Athirappilly Waterfalls in Kerala. About Param Sundari Param Sundari is a romantic-comedy drama film set in Kerala’s picturesque backwaters, and revolves around a North Indian and South Indian who find unexpected love. Their cultural differences spark a hilarious and chaotic romance, full of twists and turns. Sidharth Malhotra and Janhvi Kapoor headed to Kerala last week for the film shoot. The film is directed by Tushar Jalota and produced under the banner of Maddock Films. Speaking to Variety about the film, Dinesh Vijan stated, “Its like those films that Mani-sir [Mani Ratnam] used to do like Saathiya. The kind of music it has and Janhvi playing a South Indian is interesting, Sid’s playing a Northern Delhi boy and the conflict is very cool. It’s like maybe taking Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya forward – there’s a high tech idea in there. But we are going into the Kantara world of sorts – we are going a little more than that." tags : bollywood Janhvi Kapoor Sidharth Malhotra Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 15:55 IST News movies Janhvi Kapoor Gives Sneak-Peek Into ‘Kerala Diaries’ Amid Param Sundari Shoot, Boney Kapoor Reacts | PICS Read More

title: Mithun Chakraborty Stuns In 'The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter' Teaser, Recites Preamble With A Burnt Tongue
summary: Filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri has released the teaser for The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter, offering a powerful first look at Mithun Chakraborty in a gripping and emotional role.
full_content: Mithun Chakraborty Stuns In 'The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter' Teaser, Recites Preamble With A Burnt Tongue Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 15:18 IST Filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri has released the teaser for The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter, offering a powerful first look at Mithun Chakraborty in a gripping and emotional role. reset Follow us on Google News Explore the gripping teaser of The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter, featuring Mithun Chakraborty reciting the Constitution's Preamble in a haunting performance. Filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri has unveiled the teaser for his highly anticipated film, The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter. The teaser, shared on the YouTube channel of Abhishek Agarwal Arts on Sunday, offers a gripping first look at actor Mithun Chakraborty in a powerful and haunting avatar. In the teaser, Mithun is seen walking through a desolate corridor, sporting a rugged look with a white beard. His character recites the Preamble to the Constitution of India with a burnt tongue, reflecting a deep emotional and symbolic layer. Limping and visibly weary, Mithun’s character leans against a wall as the teaser concludes, leaving a lasting impression. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Vivek Ranjan Agnihotri (@vivekagnihotri) The film promises to uncover a significant yet lesser-known chapter of Indian history, focusing on the poignant Bengal tragedy. According to the synopsis, The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter is “a deeply emotional film that brings a significant chapter of Indian history to life on a grand scale. With impactful storytelling, breathtaking visuals, and stellar performances, the film aims to deliver a thought-provoking and unforgettable cinematic journey." Directed by Vivek Agnihotri, the film delves into India’s complex history, politics, and social dynamics. Jointly produced by Abhishek Agarwal and Pallavi Joshi, and presented by Tej Narayan Agarwal and I Am Buddha Productions, the film is set to release worldwide on August 15, 2025. Sharing the teaser on X (formerly Twitter), Vivek Agnihotri wrote, “PRESENTING: A tribute to the Constitution of India. From the makers of #TheDelhiFiles: The Bengal Chapter. Witness an epic untold story this Independence Day, 2025. Releasing worldwide. #RightToLife." The journey of The Delhi Files began in November last year, when Vivek Agnihotri announced the start of filming. Sharing the news on social media, he wrote, “SHUBHARAMBH! With your blessings, the shooting of #TheDelhiFiles began today. A puja was conducted by all the devis of the crew. O Mother! Please give us the courage to tell this difficult tale with utmost honesty and fearlessly." In October, Vivek revealed that the film would be released in two parts, further raising expectations for this thought-provoking historical drama. tags : bollywood Mithun Chakraborty Vivek Agnihotri Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 15:18 IST News movies Mithun Chakraborty Stuns In 'The Delhi Files: The Bengal Chapter' Teaser, Recites Preamble With A Burnt Tongue Read More
