title: Justin Baldoni's Mother Defends Son For The First Time Amid Blake Lively Allegations: ‘Truth Will Shine’
summary: In December 2024, Blake Lively filed a lawsuit against Justin Baldoni, the director and co-star of It Ends With Us, accusing him of sexual harassment.
full_content: Justin Baldoni's Mother Defends Son For The First Time Amid Blake Lively Allegations: ‘Truth Will Shine’ Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 14:52 IST In December 2024, Blake Lively filed a lawsuit against Justin Baldoni, the director and co-star of It Ends With Us, accusing him of sexual harassment. reset Follow us on Google News Justin Baldoni's mother Sharon Baldoni pens note of support for her son. (Photo: Instagram) Justin Baldoni’s mother Sharon Baldoni has come out in his support amid the sexual harassment allegations by his It Ends With Us co-star, Blake Lively. Recently, Sharon took to her Instagram handle and penned down a note for her “beautiful boy" on the occasion of his birthday. “Remembering a wonderful moment after the final ending of Jane The Virgin–a moment where joy and love permeated the set, where friendships and family were born, and kindness and integrity permeated the hearts of all the actors and crew," she wrote. related stories “Sadness only entered because it was the final scene of a wonderful journey~ and the beginning of the rest of our lives. A happy, loving, and generous memory with hearts exploding with possibilities," Justin’s mother continued. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sharon Baldoni (@sharonsbaldoni) “Life has its moments and also its surprises– as you keep your integrity through it all, Justice and truth will shine today and into eternity. I love you more than you will ever know! Happy Birthday my beautiful boy! May God continue to bless you in truth," she concluded. On December 21, 2024, Blake Lively filed a lawsuit against Justin Baldoni, the director and co-star of It Ends With Us, accusing him of sexual harassment. She also claimed Baldoni tried to orchestrate a smear campaign against her, causing significant emotional distress to her family. Lively’s complaint detailed instances of Baldoni allegedly creating a hostile work environment, including inappropriate discussions about his pornography addiction, sharing explicit material, and making comments about her weight. The situation reportedly escalated to the point of an all-hands-on-deck meeting, where Lively requested that Baldoni cease such behaviour. Later, Justin Baldoni’s publicist, Jennifer Abel, has dismissed Blake Lively’s allegations. In a post shared on a private PR & Marketing Facebook group, Abel addressed a series of leaked text messages that reportedly involve herself, Baldoni, and PR crisis manager Melissa Nathan. Lively claimed these exchanges were part of a calculated effort to tarnish her reputation. Abel, however, dismissed these allegations, stating that no coordinated campaign was ever executed. “What the cherry-picked messages don’t include, although not shockingly, as it doesn’t fit the narrative, is that it was no ‘smear’ implied, no negative press was ever facilitated, no social combat plan, although we were prepared for it, as it’s our job to be ready for any scenario, but we didn’t have to implement anything, because the internet was doing the work for us," Abel wrote. tags : Blake Lively hollywood Justin Baldoni Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 14:52 IST News movies Justin Baldoni's Mother Defends Son For The First Time Amid Blake Lively Allegations: ‘Truth Will Shine’ Read More

title: Rashmika Mandanna Shows X-Ray Of Injured Foot With 3 Fractures And A Muscle Tear: ‘Smiling Through It All…’
summary: Rashmika Mandanna, who is promoting Chhaava with Vicky Kaushal despite her leg injury, shared a picture of her medical report as well as an X-ray of her foot, revealing she has 3 fractures.
full_content: Rashmika Mandanna Shows X-Ray Of Injured Foot With 3 Fractures And A Muscle Tear: ‘Smiling Through It All…’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 14:37 IST Rashmika Mandanna, who is promoting Chhaava with Vicky Kaushal despite her leg injury, shared a picture of her medical report as well as an X-ray of her foot, revealing she has 3 fractures. reset Follow us on Google News Rashmika Mandanna shared a picture of her medical report as well as an X-ray of her injured foot. Rashmika Mandanna injured her leg while she was working out at the gym a few weeks ago. Despite her injury, the actress attended the trailer launch of her film Chhaava with Vicky Kaushal. She was brought into a wheelchair, and she limped her way to the stage. Now, the actress has shared a health update, revealing that her foot has 3 fractures and a muscle tear. She also shared a picture of her medical report and X-Ray to explain the severity of her injury. Rashmika Mandanna took to her Instagram to share a few videos and photos. The first video clip shows her getting ready fo Chhaava trailer launch in the wheelchair. The video then shows Vicky Kaushal helping her while she limped her way to the stage. Captioning this video clip, she wrote, “My life currently Promoting Chhaava -I felt so honoured, blessed and grateful to have played Maharani Yesubai. She wouldn’t show her pain to her people and neither will I. Smiling through it all as always." related stories The next video clip shows Rahsmika’s friend decorating the cast on her injured foot. The following slides show her medical report, and an X-Ray, revealing the three fractures. Explaining the same in her caption, Rashmika wrote, “My girls made it look so cute from the outside Swipe But the inside there are – 3 fractures and a muscle tear (Ps: not so cute )." View this post on Instagram A post shared by Rashmika Mandanna (@rashmika_mandanna) The last video clip showed Rashmika blowing kisses to her fans and sending hugs. “Haven’t put my foot down in 2 weeks – I really do miss just standing on my own two feet. Please do take good care of yourselves. And DO NOT TAKE IT LIGHTLY when people say that to you..!! I am sending you all love and strength and I am holding all your love and strength very dearly. Biggest hugs to all of you," she wrote. Rashmika Mandanna’s Thama co-star Ayushmann Khurrana commented on her post, wishing for her speedy recovery. “Get well soon Rash! Chaava to Thama soon pls," he wrote. Many fans expressed their concern, and sent ‘Get well soon’ messages to her. Rashmika Mandanna sustained a severe leg injury while she was working out at the gym on January 12, 2025. Despite that, she continues to fulfil her work commitments. Her upcoming films include ‘Chhaava’ with Vicky Kaushal, ‘Thama’ with Ayushmann Khurrana, ‘Sikandar’ starring Salman Khan, as well as Rahul Ravindran’s directorial venture, ‘The Girlfriend’. tags : bollywood Rashmika Mandanna regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 14:37 IST News movies Rashmika Mandanna Shows X-Ray Of Injured Foot With 3 Fractures And A Muscle Tear: ‘Smiling Through It All…’ Read More

title: Shahid Kapoor Reveals Life Lessons From Heartbreak: ‘I Am Needy, But Love Is About Giving’
summary: Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor, gearing up for the release of his action thriller Deva, recently opened up about dealing with heartbreak and its impact on personal growth
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Reveals Life Lessons From Heartbreak: ‘I Am Needy, But Love Is About Giving’ Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 14:14 IST Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor, gearing up for the release of his action thriller Deva, recently opened up about dealing with heartbreak and its impact on personal growth reset Follow us on Google News Shahid Kapoor reflects on heartbreak, emotional growth, and lessons learned from past relationships. Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor, set to grace the screen in his upcoming action thriller Deva, recently shared candid insights about dealing with heartbreak and the lessons it taught him. Reflecting on his past relationships, Shahid admitted to feelings of inadequacy and neediness, acknowledging these as selfish tendencies he has worked to understand and overcome. His honest take on emotional growth is resonating widely with fans. During a podcast with Raj Shamani, Shahid Kapoor opened up about the pain of heartbreak. He confessed, “Sometimes, when your heart breaks, you feel you are not good enough, obviously." related stories He elaborated that deep love, followed by rejection, often drives people to desperate attempts to salvage the relationship. However, this pursuit, Shahid pointed out, can sometimes come at the cost of self-respect and dignity—a realization that tends to dawn only after years of introspection. Sharing a key lesson from his experiences, Shahid highlighted the importance of self-awareness and understanding the impact of a relationship. While love itself is powerful, he noted, it’s crucial to determine if the relationship fosters growth or brings out negative traits. “Ultimately, you have to live with yourself," he emphasized. Drawing from his personal journey, Shahid reflected on the concept of giving in relationships. “I am needy, I need to be comforted, I need to be made to feel like I am so important—these are selfish things," he admitted. He stressed that true love lies in giving selflessly, without seeking validation or comfort to fulfill personal needs. Shahid further explained that when both partners focus on giving, the relationship thrives naturally, with no undue pressure or expectations. However, he warned that feelings of entitlement or the tendency to demand things could lead to tension and strain in the relationship. “If something doesn’t come naturally, it might be a sign that either the person isn’t right for you, or you’re not right for them," he added. He also touched upon a common misconception in relationships—assuming one fully understands their partner. According to Shahid, as relationships deepen, these assumptions often break down, leading people to believe their partner has changed. “In reality, you might simply be discovering a deeper, previously unexplored side of them," he explained. On the professional front, Shahid Kapoor is gearing up for the release of Deva, in which he plays a cop. The film also stars Pooja Hegde, Pavail Gulati, Pravessh Rana, and Kubbra Sait. Directed by Rosshan Andrrews and produced by Siddharth Roy Kapur and Umesh KR Bansal, Deva is slated to hit theaters on January 31, 2025, promising an action-packed cinematic experience. tags : bollywood Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 14:14 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Reveals Life Lessons From Heartbreak: ‘I Am Needy, But Love Is About Giving’ Read More

title: Varun Dhawan Teases 'Border 2' As He Watches Children March With Tricolour On Republic Day
summary: Varun Dhawan also added the popular song "Sandese Aate Hai" from the Sunny Deol-starrer war film Border.
full_content: Varun Dhawan Teases 'Border 2' As He Watches Children March With Tricolour On Republic Day Published By : Chirag Sehgal IANS Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 15:10 IST Varun Dhawan also added the popular song "Sandese Aate Hai" from the Sunny Deol-starrer war film Border. reset Follow us on Google News Directed by Anurag Singh, Border 2 stars Varun Dhawan, Sunny Deol and Diljit Dosanjh. On Republic Day, actor Varun Dhawan shared a special moment as he watched children march with pride in the annual Republic Day parade. The actor also took the opportunity to tease his fans with an exciting hint about his upcoming project, “Border 2." On Sunday, Varun took to his Instagram stories and posted a video showing kids, holding the National Flag, displaying their enthusiasm and patriotism during the parade. Dhawan also added the popular song “Sandese Aate Hai" from the Sunny Deol-starrer war film “Border." Alongside the clip, the ‘Student of the Year’ actor wrote, “Border 2." In the video, Varun is seen sitting in a car while recording the footage. related stories Directed by Anurag Singh, “Border 2" stars Sunny Deol, Diljit Dosanjh, Ahan Shetty, and Varun Dhawan. The film appears to be inspired by the 1999 Kargil War, during which Pakistani troops crossed the Line of Control (LoC) and took control of Indian territory, primarily in the Kargil district. The action thriller is produced by Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar, JP Dutta, and Nidhi Dutta. “Border 2" will be presented by Gulshan Kumar & T-Series in collaboration with JP Dutta’s J.P. Films. A few days ago, Varun kicked off the shooting of the film in Madhya Pradesh. A picture from the shoot location went viral, showing Dhawan alongside Bhushan Kumar and Nidhi Dutta, posing with the film’s clapboard. On January 15, the ‘Bhediya ‘actor paid tribute to the “real heroes" of India on Army Day. He took to Instagram to share two photos of himself with the jawans. One of the pictures even showed Varun striking a pose alongside the soldiers next to a tank. For the caption, he wrote, “Honoring the real heroes of India this #ArmyDay. Proud to be with them. #Border2 #prep." “Border 2" is slated to hit theatres on January 23, 2026. (This story has not been edited by News18 staff and is published from a syndicated news agency feed - IANS ) tags : bollywood Varun Dhawan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 14:07 IST News movies Varun Dhawan Teases 'Border 2' As He Watches Children March With Tricolour On Republic Day Read More

title: Dhanashree Verma Says 'Shape Your Own Destiny' Amid Divorce Rumors With Yuzvendra Chahal
summary: Dhanashree and Yuzvendra's divorce rumours made headlines after fans noticed that the two had unfollowed each other on Instagram.
full_content: Dhanashree Verma Says 'Shape Your Own Destiny' Amid Divorce Rumors With Yuzvendra Chahal Curated By : Chirag Sehgal News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 13:42 IST Dhanashree and Yuzvendra's divorce rumours made headlines after fans noticed that the two had unfollowed each other on Instagram. reset Follow us on Google News Dhanashree and Yuzvendra have also unfollowed each other on social media. (Photo: Instagram) Dhanashree Verma has been making headlines for a long time due to rumours about her divorce from her cricketer-husband, Yuzvendra Chahal. Amid all this, the choreographer took to her Instagram handle recently and shared a video in which she revealed what keeps her busy these days. In the clip, Dhanashree shared that she has been trying her hands at pottery and called it “therapeutic". “So today, I decided to try something interesting, something special, something different, something that my friends suggested is very therapeutic. So I’m here for my first pottery class," she said in the video. related stories In the caption of her post, Dhanashree wrote, “Shape your own destiny, one piece at a time 🤍🌈 My first pottery class and I’m so glad it turned out to be so so good… a must try :)" Check it out here: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Dhanashree Verma (@dhanashree9) Dhanashree and Yuzvendra’s divorce rumours made headlines after fans noticed that the two had unfollowed each other on Instagram. Yuzvendra has also deleted all photos featuring Dhanashree from his account, while Dhanashree still has a few pictures of him on hers. In 2022 also, Dhanashree removed the surname ‘Chahal’ from her Instagram handle, sparking speculation about trouble in their relationship. Around the same time, Chahal posted a cryptic photo on his Instagram story, leaving fans guessing. The image featured a quote that read, “New Life Loading." The timing of this post, which coincided with Dhanashree’s decision to drop her surname, had netizens in a frenzy. Meanwhile, previously, Yuzvendra addressed the “curiosity surrounding" his personal life and requested his followers to stop speculating over “matters that may or may not be true". “I am grateful to all my fans for their unwavering love and support without which, I wouldn’t have come this far. But this journey is far from OVER!!! As there are still many incredible OVERS left to deliver for my country, my team, and for my fans!!! While I am proud to be a sportsman, I am also a Son, a Brother, and a Friend. I understand the curiosity surrounding recent events, particularly about my personal life. However, I have noticed certain social media posts speculating on matters that may or may not be true," he wrote in his Instagram statement. tags : bollywood Dhanashree Verma yuzvendra chahal Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 13:42 IST News movies Dhanashree Verma Says 'Shape Your Own Destiny' Amid Divorce Rumors With Yuzvendra Chahal Read More

title: Kriti Kharbanda Diagnosed With Typhoid, Shares Health Update: ‘Send Pyaar And Gyaan…’

Kriti Kharbanda is quite active on social media, and often shares life updates with her fans. On Sunday morning, the actress took to her Instagram story to share that she has been diagnosed with typhoid. She revealed that she has been down with the infection since the last week and has not been feeling well. She asked her fans to send love, and also tips that could help her recover faster. The pictures also captured them dancing and enjoying the festivities. Another heartwarming shot featured them posing with their parents, making the occasion even more special. title: Ricky Kej Thanks PM Narendra Modi After Padma Shri Win: 'This Is A New India; We No Longer Sit...'
summary: Ricky Kej said that this is a new beginning for him and the best is yet to come.
full_content: Ricky Kej Thanks PM Narendra Modi After Padma Shri Win: 'This Is A New India; We No Longer Sit...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 12:59 IST Ricky Kej said that this is a new beginning for him and the best is yet to come. reset Follow us on Google News Ricky Kej thanked Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Ricky Kej has thanked Prime Minister Narendra Modi for honouring him with the Padma Shri Award. He said that the award is not an end goal for him but marks a new beginning in his career. He said that the Prime Minister has created an atmosphere where international artists are encouraged and their talent is acknowledged. Taking to X, Ricky Kej wrote, “Dear Prime Minister Sri @narendramodi ji, you have created an atmosphere in our nation where we all have the potential to excel. You encourage, enable and cheer on our artists in every possible way. We no longer sit on the sidelines in the international arena but take leadership." related stories Dear Prime Minister Sri @narendramodi ji, you have created an atmosphere in our nation where we all have the potential to excel. You encourage, enable and cheer on our artists in every possible way. We no longer sit on the sidelines in the international arena, but take… https://t.co/wxOA0g3HBl — Ricky Kej (@rickykej) January 26, 2025 “I have always attributed the success that I enjoy to your advice, inspiration and blessings, and the same with this Padma Shri honour I have received. This is a new India where artists do not need to ask, yet we receive. To me, this honour is not an end goal, but a new beginning. A platform for doing better and bigger for our nation under you. My best is yet to come. My deepest and most sincere gratitude sir," he added. For the unversed, on the eve of Republic Day, the central government unveiled the names of unsung heroes and achievers who will receive the prestigious Padma Awards, the country’s highest civilian honours. The Padma Awards are conferred in three categories – Padma Vibhushan, Padma Bhushan, and Padma Shri. A total of 139 names were announced- seven for Padma Vibhushan, 19 for Padma Bhushan, and 113 for Padma Shri. The awardees were recognised for their excellence in diverse fields like art, social work, science, medicine, and more, highlighting their contributions across various sectors. tags : bollywood hollywood Narendra Modi ricky kej Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 12:59 IST News movies Ricky Kej Thanks PM Narendra Modi After Padma Shri Win: 'This Is A New India; We No Longer Sit...' title: Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Step Out For The First Time Since Attack; Video With Tight Security Goes Viral
summary: Saif Ali Khan, who was discharged from Lilavati Hospital on January 21, stepped out with Kareena Kapoor Khan on Sunday. They were surrounded by the police, as a security measure following the attack.
full_content: Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Step Out For The First Time Since Attack; Video With Tight Security Goes Viral Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 12:31 IST Saif Ali Khan, who was discharged from Lilavati Hospital on January 21, stepped out with Kareena Kapoor Khan on Sunday. They were surrounded by the police, as a security measure following the attack. reset Follow us on Google News Saif Ali Khan, who was discharged from Lilavati Hospital on January 21, stepped out with Kareena Kapoor Khan on Sunday. Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan stepped out on Sunday morning, days after the former was discharged from Lilavati Hospital. Saif was repeatedly stabbed by an intruder at his house in Bandra, Mumbai, on January 16. He was discharged from the hospital on January 21, five days after the attack. Today, Saif and Kareena were spotted by the paparazzi as they headed out amid tight security. This marks their first appearance together since the attack on Saif Ali Khan. A video that has been shared by paparazzo Viral Bhayani shows Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khan stepping out of their Bandra residence. They are flanked by police, as a security measure following the knife attack on Saif. Bebo is seen walking ahead, while Saif follows behind along with the security personnel. Kareena donned a casual grey sweatshirt, black track pants and a black baseball cap. Meanwhile, Saif rocked a navy-blue t-shirt with a pair of denims. He had dark sunglasses on. The couple is seen swiftly making their way to the car. Check out the video below. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Viral Bhayani (@viralbhayani) Saif was stabbed by an intruder at his Mumbai residence in the wee hours of January 16. It was reported that at around 2 AM, the actor heard noises when one of his female employees was attacked in Jeh’s room. This prompted Saif to intervene, which led to an altercation between the two and the attacker injured both Saif and the female employee. The Bollywood star was stabbed six times by the robber following which he was rushed to the hospital. Saif Ali Khan had three injuries, two on the hand and one on the right side of the neck, and the major part was at the back, which was in the spine. Doctors removed the sharp object that was lodged in the spine and repaired the injury. Khan recovered well and was shifted from the intensive care unit (ICU) on January 17 to a special room. While Saif Ali Khan was discharged from the hospital five days after the attack, the doctors reportedly advised him to rest for the next few days. tags : bollywood kareena kapoor khan Saif ali khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 12:31 IST News movies Saif Ali Khan, Kareena Kapoor Step Out For The First Time Since Attack; Video With Tight Security Goes Viral Read More

title: Twist In Saif Stabbing Case? Accused's Fingerprints Do Not Match With Those At Actor's House: Report
summary: Mumbai Police arrested Shariful Islam after a 3-day manhunt. However, social media was abuzz with speculations that the man seen in CCTV footage was different from the arrested individual.
full_content: Twist In Saif Stabbing Case? Accused's Fingerprints Do Not Match With Those At Actor's House: Report Curated By : Ashesh Mallick News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 12:34 IST Mumbai Police arrested Shariful Islam after a 3-day manhunt. However, social media was abuzz with speculations that the man seen in CCTV footage was different from the arrested individual. reset Follow us on Google News Saif Ali Khan's alleged attacker Shariful Islam (PTI Image) In a massive development in the Saif Ali Khan’s attack case, the fingerprints found at the actor’s residence do not match the samples of Shariful Islam Shehzad, a Bangladeshi national who was arrested for allegedly attacking Saif at his residence on January 16, according to a report. The revelation was made by the State Criminal Investigation Department (CID) which submitted negative reports on the fingerprint samples of Shariful, giving a setback to the Mumbai Police amid buzz on social media that the wrong individual has been arrested, mid-day reported. related stories Shariful was nabbed from Thane after a massive 3-day manhunt by the Mumbai Police and Crime Branch whose around 40 teams were assigned the job. Arrested ‘Attacker’s’ Fingerprints Do Not Match With Those At Crime Scene According to the report, a total of 19 fingerprint samples were taken from the crime scene at the actor’s residence and none of them matched with those of Shariful. The development raised questions over the arrest of the man who is accused of attacking Saif who underwent a six-hour-long surgery at the Lilavati Hospital in Mumbai. The internet is already on fire with speculations that the man seen on the CCTV footage of Saif’s building and the man arrested are two different individuals. CID’s Report On Shariful’s Fingerprints Shariful’s fingerprints were sent to the CID’s fingerprint bureau for testing where it confirmed through a system-generated report that not one out of the 19 crime scene fingerprints matched Shariful’s. The report was sent to the CID Superintendent in Pune on Friday, mid-day reported citing sources. A team from the East Region of Mumbai Police, led by DCP Navnath Dhavale of Zone 6, had arrested Shariful, however, the team reportedly had “limited information" about the case as it was initially being dealt with by the Zone 9 team, the report indicated citing sources. Railway’s Facial Recognition Report Of Shariful Under Scrutiny The Zone 6 team was rushed to the location to arrest the suspect as they were closer to his location, as per his suspected cell number. Shariful was handed over to the Bandra Police which comes under Zone 9, the report said. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all The facial recognition report generated by the Western Railway is also under scrutiny, it claimed. The CCTV footage that the police initially released showing the suspect exiting Saif’s building through stairs was extremely blurred due to which the officials could not enhance the image quality using technology. Consequently, the facial recognition report from the Western Railway was used. However, doubts have been raised as it does not align with the appearance of the individual spotted inside the building, mid-day reported. tags : Actor Saif Ali Khan mumbai police Saif ali khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 11:59 IST News india Twist In Saif Stabbing Case? Accused's Fingerprints Do Not Match With Those At Actor's House: Report Read More

title: Vijay’s Thalapathy 69 Is Officially Titled Jana Nayagan, Makers Unveil Intriguing First Look
summary: Tamil superstar Thalapathy Vijay’s final film ‘Thalapathy 69’, now has an official title, and has been named ‘Jana Nayagan’. The makers made the announcement on Republic Day 2025.
full_content: Vijay’s Thalapathy 69 Is Officially Titled Jana Nayagan, Makers Unveil Intriguing First Look Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 09:28 IST Tamil superstar Thalapathy Vijay’s final film ‘Thalapathy 69’, now has an official title, and has been named ‘Jana Nayagan’. The makers made the announcement on Republic Day 2025. reset Follow us on Google News Vijay’s Thalapathy 69 Is Officially Titled Jana Nayagan There has been a lot of excitement for Tamil superstar Thalapathy Vijay’s final film, which was previously referred to as ‘Thalapathy 69’. The film, directed by H. Vinoth, now has an official title. On Republic Day 2025, the makers announced that the title of the film is ‘Jana Nayagan’. That’s not all. They further heightened fans’ excitement for the film by dropping the first look as well! KVN Productions, the studio behind the film, share the poster featuring Vijay, while also revealing that the film has been titled ‘Jana Nayagan.’ “We call him #JanaNayagan," read the caption. The first look poster shows Vijay clicking a selfie, while thousands of his followers in the background cheer for him. He exudes swag in the poster, and is dressed casually in a navy blue shirt, black pants, and dark sunglasses. Needless to say, fans were beyond thrilled to see the glimpse. While one fan commented, “This is the last First look poster  #JanaNayagan," another one wrote, “One last time." A third fan wrote, “Time to lead." Many others showered love on the superstar. Check out the post below! related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Vijay (@actorvijay) Jana Nayagan marks Thalapathy Vijay’s final cinematic venture before transitioning fully into politics. In February 2024, he founded the Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK) party and has since been actively involved in political activities. He announced his departure from films the same year to focus on his political aspirations. According to some reports, his party plans to contest in the 2026 Tamil Nadu Assembly elections. In this film, Vijay will share screen with Pooja Hegde, who plays the lead opposite him, while Bobby Deol plays the villain. The cast of the film also includes Mamita Baiju, Prakash Raj, Gautham Vasudev Menon, and others. The music for the film has been composed by Anirudh. It is directed by H. Vinoth. Kannada actor Shiva Rajkumar, who will be starring in Bhairathi Ranagal, said in an interview that he will feature in Vijay’s final film. He hinted that his role is very interesting. While the official release date of the film hasn’t been announced yet, speculations suggest that the film might release either in October this year or during the Pongal festival next year. Jana Nayagan is being produced by Mr. Venkat K. Narayana under the banner KVN Productions. 2025 is poised to be a landmark year for KVN Productions, as the company takes a giant leap forward in the entertainment industry. They have several films lined up including Yash’s Toxic and an untitled Hindi thriller directed by Priyadarshan, starring Saif Ali Khan and Bobby Deol. tags : regional cinema thalapathy vijay Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 11:48 IST News movies Vijay’s Thalapathy 69 Is Officially Titled Jana Nayagan, Makers Unveil Intriguing First Look Read More

title: Sky Force Box Office: Akshay Kumar's Film Earns Rs 33.75 Crore in 2 Days
summary: Sky Force Box Office Collection Day 2: The film has minted Rs 33.75 crore in two days.
full_content: Sky Force Box Office: Akshay Kumar's Film Earns Rs 33.75 Crore in 2 Days Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 11:36 IST Sky Force Box Office Collection Day 2: The film has minted Rs 33.75 crore in two days. reset Follow us on Google News Sky Force Box Office Collection Day 1: Veer Pahariya's debut film sees jump. Sky Force Box Office Collection: Akshay Kumar and Veer Pahariya’s much-anticipated film, Sky Force, was released in theatres on January 24. The film is receiving a positive response, especially in key regions like Mumbai, Hyderabad and Bengaluru, where the evening and night shows have the highest occupancy. After a positive Friday opening, the film has witnessed a jump in its collection. On Saturday, Day 2, the film earned Rs 21.50 crore (approx) net at the domestic box office. The film had minted Rs 11.25 crore (India net) on Friday. This brings the film’s total collection to Rs 33.75 crore. related stories Sky Force had an overall 35.76% Hindi Occupancy on Saturday with night shows witnessing the most footfall. However, cities like Bengaluru, Chennai and Mumbai had the most occupancy. The film delves into A B Devayya’s unyielding spirit and pivotal role in one of history’s most significant conflicts. Directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and Sandeep Kewlani and produced by Dinesh Vijan, Jyoti Deshpande, and Amar Kaushik, Sky Force is set to release in theatres on January 24, 2025. Produced by Jio Studios and Maddock Films, Sky Force releases in theatres this Republic Week on January 24, 2025. News18 Showsha gave it 4/5 stars. An excerpt from the review read, “At 2 hours and 5 minutes, Sky Force makes for a crisp and taut screenplay that rarely drops pace. Kudos to the director duo, who seamlessly blend in their individual instincts and style, never once making you wonder that there are two captains sailing the ship! The film is bereft of melodramatic dialogues about desh bhakti or contrived sequences aimed to evoke sappy sentimentality. The makers manage to strike a fine balance between realism and cinematic flamboyance and they deserve brownie points for the same." “One of the major highlights of Sky Force is its breathtaking aerial combat sequences packed with edge-of-the-seat thrill. They may remind you of Fighter but unlike the Hrithik Roshan starrer, this one isn’t amply slick, cool and stylish, but that works with the template and mood of the film. These scenes are punctuated with moments that accentuate the valour and sacrifices made by fighter pilots," the review also mentioned. tags : Akshay Kumar bollywood veer pahariya Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 11:36 IST News movies Sky Force Box Office: Akshay Kumar's Film Earns Rs 33.75 Crore in 2 Days Read More

title: Twinkle Khanna Slams ‘Ridiculous’ Rumours Involving Kareena Kapoor Khan After Saif Ali Khan Attack
summary: Twinkle Khanna penned a column on the unfair tendency to vilify the wife in every situation. She pointed out how baseless theories about Kareena Kapoor Khan surfaced after Saif Ali Khan was attacked.
full_content: Twinkle Khanna Slams ‘Ridiculous’ Rumours Involving Kareena Kapoor Khan After Saif Ali Khan Attack Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 11:13 IST Twinkle Khanna penned a column on the unfair tendency to vilify the wife in every situation. She pointed out how baseless theories about Kareena Kapoor Khan surfaced after Saif Ali Khan was attacked. reset Follow us on Google News Twinkle Khanna pointed out how baseless theories about Kareena Kapoor Khan surfaced after Saif Ali Khan was attacked. Twinkle Khanna recently wrote an article for a newspaper, in which she wrote about ‘missus blaming’. She cited several examples, and pointed out how the women (especially wives) are blamed in every situation or problem that men face. She highlighted how Anushka Sharma is blamed when Virat Koli gets out. She also shared a recent example wherein ‘ridiculous’ rumours surfaced about Kareena Kapoor Khan after her husband Saif Ali Khan was stabbed by an intruder in their residence. In her column for Times Of India, Twinkle Khanna wrote that she double-checks the window locks before going to bed, and that a sense of vulnerability has taken root in homes everywhere, in the wake of Saif Ali Khan’s stabbing. Further slamming the rumours involving Kareena Kapoor Khan, Twinkle wrote, “While Saif was in hospital, ridiculous rumours swirled that his wife hadn’t been at home or had been too intoxicated to help him during the assault. The absence of any sort of evidence did nothing to stop these dumb theories. People just enjoyed shifting the blame onto the wife — an all-too-familiar pattern." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Twinkle Khanna (@twinklerkhanna) Twinkle Khanna Points Out Anushka Sharma Gets Blamed Whenever Virat Kohli Gets Out She further shared instances wherein the blame is unfairly shifted on wives. She pointed out that when the Beatles spilt, people blamed John Lennon’s wife Yoko Ono. “When Virat Kohli gets out, then Anushka gets booed. When Beckham could not bend it on the football field, fingers were pointed at Victoria," she wrote. She said that the wife-blaming is not just restricted to couples in the public eye. In the same column, Twinkle Khanna wrote that during an interview, she was asked what it’s like being a ‘star wife’. “While my first instinct is to bite the reporter’s index finger, I reply, ‘I am not sure that an entity like ‘star wife’ exists, unless, in the way that Manglik women marry trees, because of some Rahu Ketu ka dosh, you end up marrying Sirius or worse, Halley’s Comet’," she wrote. She further added that she is also often asked about, and blamed for, the difference in political views between her and her husband Akshay Kumar. “It’s almost like people believe he isn’t my husband but a toddler who will listen to me when I say, ‘Beta ji, please walk on the left side of the road, and I will give you a Frooti,’" she wrote. About Saif Ali Khan Attack For the unversed, Saif Ali Khan was stabbed by an intruder who allegedly broke into his Mumbai residence on January 16. The actor suffered multiple injuries, including one near his spine and another on his neck. He was rushed to Lilavati Hospital, where he underwent surgeries, and was discharged from the hospital after five days. tags : bollywood kareena kapoor khan Saif ali khan Twinkle Khanna Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 10:53 IST News movies Twinkle Khanna Slams ‘Ridiculous’ Rumours Involving Kareena Kapoor Khan After Saif Ali Khan Attack Read More

title: Ajith Kumar Says He Is 'Humbled' By Padma Bhushan Win: 'Wish My Late Father Had Lived To See...'
summary: Ajith Kumar called it a 'privilege to be recognized at such a level'.
full_content: Ajith Kumar Says He Is 'Humbled' By Padma Bhushan Win: 'Wish My Late Father Had Lived To See...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 10:01 IST Ajith Kumar called it a 'privilege to be recognized at such a level'. reset Follow us on Google News Ajith Kumar penned a note to mark his win. Ajith Kumar has been announced as one of the recipients of the Padma Bhushan Awards this year. Humbled and overjoyed to receive this honour, the actor took to social media to pen a special note of thanks and said he is grateful that his contributions to the nation have been recognised. Ajith wrote on X, “I am deeply humbled and honoured to receive the esteemed Padma Award by the President of India. I extend my heartfelt gratitude to the Hon’ble President of India, Smt. Droupadi Murmu and the Honourable Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi for this prestigious honour. It is a privilege to be recognized at such a level and I am truly grateful for this generous acknowledgement of my contributions to our nation." related stories I am deeply humbled and honoured to receive the esteemed Padma Award by the President of India.I extend my heartfelt gratitude to the Hon’ble President of India, Smt. Droupadi Murmu and the Honourable Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi for this prestigious honour. It is a… — Suresh Chandra (@SureshChandraa) January 25, 2025 The actor mentioned, “At the same time, I am mindful that this recognition is not just a personal accolade but a testament to the collective efforts and support of many. I would like to express my sincere thanks to the members of the film industry, including my distinguished seniors, various peers, and untold others. Your inspiration, collaboration, and support have been instrumental in my journey, including the pursuit of my passion in other areas as well." “I am also grateful for the kind support, over the years, of the motor racing fraternity and the sports pistol and rifle shooting community. I thank the Madras Motor Sports Club (MMSC), the Federation of Motor Sports Clubs of India (FMSCI), the Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu (SDAT), the National Rifle Association of India, and the Chennai Rifle Club for their encouragement of sports and the community of sportspersons," he added. The actor had a special message for his family. He wrote, “To my family and friends: Your love and support have been both a refuge and a source of strength. Thank you! I wish my late father had lived to see this day. Yet, I like to think he would be proud that his spirit and legacy live on in all that I do. I want to thank my mother for her unconditional love and the sacrifices that enabled me to become all that I could be." “To Shalini, my wife and companion of nearly 25 wonderful years: Your partnership has been a joy and cornerstone of my success. And to my children, Anoushka and Aadvik: You are my pride and the light of my life, motivating me to set an example for how to do well and live right," he said. “Lastly, to all my fans, supporters, and well-wishers: Your unwavering love and support have fueled my passion and dedication. This award is as much yours as it is mine. Thank you all for this incredible honour and for being part of this journey. I am committed to continuing to serve with integrity and passion and wish you all just as well on your own journeys," he concluded. For the unversed, on the eve of Republic Day, the central government unveiled the names of unsung heroes and achievers who will receive the prestigious Padma Awards, the country’s highest civilian honours. The Padma Awards are conferred in three categories – Padma Vibhushan, Padma Bhushan, and Padma Shri. A total of 139 names were announced- seven for Padma Vibhushan, 19 for Padma Bhushan, and 113 for Padma Shri. The awardees were recognised for their excellence in diverse fields like art, social work, science, medicine, and more, highlighting their contributions across various sectors. tags : Ajith Kumar regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 10:01 IST News movies Ajith Kumar Says He Is 'Humbled' By Padma Bhushan Win: 'Wish My Late Father Had Lived To See...' title: Hina Khan Reveals BF Rocky Jaiswal Shaved His Head To Support Her Amid Cancer Battle: ‘He Left Everything…’
summary: Hina Khan penned a heartfelt appreciation note for her boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal, highlighting how he has been her constant pillar of strength amid her cancer battle.
full_content: Hina Khan Reveals BF Rocky Jaiswal Shaved His Head To Support Her Amid Cancer Battle: ‘He Left Everything…’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 10:01 IST Hina Khan penned a heartfelt appreciation note for her boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal, highlighting how he has been her constant pillar of strength amid her cancer battle. reset Follow us on Google News Hina Khan revealed her boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal has been her constant pillar of support for her amid cancer battle. Hina Khan has been bravely battling stage 3 breast cancer. While it is an extremely challenging phase for the actress, her boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal has been her constant pillar of support for her amid the cancer battle. Hina recently shared a heartfelt appreciation post for Rocky, lauding his unwavering support. She revealed that he shaved his head along with her, and stayed by her through during the toughest of times. She also posted pictures and videos of Rocky taking care of her and showering her with love during this challenging period. In her lengthy appreciation post for her beau Rocky Jaiswal, Hina Khan wrote, “For the Best Human I know ! He shaved his head when I shaved and he only let them grow when mine started growing back. To the man who looks after my soul, To the man who always says “I GOT YOU" To the man who is always by my side even if there are hundred reasons to give up.. To this selfless man who only knows how to hold on." She further added that they have been through so much together- right from the time when they faced health challenges during the pandemic, to the time when they both lost their fathers, and cried and consoled each other. “I remember he didn’t Have Covid in the peak of the Pandemic but chose to stay with me through out, he wore 3 masks all day but made sure he took care of me. That’s Him! Specially during this phase of my Diagnosis. He left everything and has been looking after me," she wrote. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by 𝑯𝒊𝒏𝒂 𝑲𝒉𝒂𝒏 (@realhinakhan) Hina Khan said that Rocky has been her ‘guiding light’ right from the day they found out about the cancer diagnosis. “From preparing a list of questionnaire before we met any of the doctors to doing his side of the research so that he can make sure I am going ahead in the right direction. From the day we started the chemo to this very day when i am going through my radiations he has been my guiding light. From cleaning me up to dressing me up, he’s done it all..He has created a field of impenetrable Protection Around me," she wrote. Hina expressed her love for Rocky, adding that he is the best thing that has happened to her. She called him ‘God’s blessing’ and thanked him for showing up and fixing everything even on difficult days. On the professional front, Hina Khan was recently seen in the web show ‘Griha Laxmi’. The crime drama began streaming on EPIC ON on January 16, 2025. Griha Laxmi also features Chunky Panday, Rahul Dev, and Dibyendu Bhattacharya and is directed by Rumaan Kidwai. tags : hina khan rocky jaiswal television Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 10:00 IST News movies Hina Khan Reveals BF Rocky Jaiswal Shaved His Head To Support Her Amid Cancer Battle: ‘He Left Everything…’ Read More

title: Malayalam Filmmaker Shafi Passes Away At 56
summary: Malayalam director Shafi, who was admitted to a hospital in Kochi after suffering a stroke, passed away in the early hours of Sunday.
full_content: Malayalam Filmmaker Shafi Passes Away At 56 Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 09:25 IST Malayalam director Shafi, who was admitted to a hospital in Kochi after suffering a stroke, passed away in the early hours of Sunday. reset Follow us on Google News Malayalam director Shafi, who was admitted to a hospital in Kochi after suffering a stroke, passed away in the early hours of Sunday. Malayalam director Shafi, known for delivering superhits like ‘Kalyanaraman’ and ‘Pulival Kalyanam’, passed away on Sunday. He was 56. He was admitted to a private hospital in Kochi after suffering a stroke on January 16, and was in critical condition for a few days. He breated his last at 12:25 am on Sunday, reports PTI. Actor Vishnu Unnikrishnan confirmed the news of Shafi’s demise by sharing a post on his Facebook page. “Shafi sir has departed, leaving behind laughter and unforgettable stories that will be cherished forever. Tributes!!," he wrote. related stories Born as M. H. Rasheed, he was popularly known as Shafi, and is the younger brother of noted screenwriter and director Rafi, one half of the writer duo Rafi-Mecartin. Shafi’s uncle was the late renowned filmmaker Siddique. According to PTI, Shafi’s body has been moved to his residence in Edappally, Kochi. It will be kept at the Cochin Service Co-Operative Bank Hall in Kaloor from 9 am to 12 pm on Sunday for the public to offer their final respects. The cremation will take place at 4 pm on Sunday at the Kaloor Muslim Juma Masjid. Shafi forayed into the Malayalam film industry in 1995 through ‘Aadyathe Kanmani’ for which he assisted screenwriter duo Rafi-Meccartin and director Rajasenan. He worked as an assistant director for 5 more Malayalam movies before making his directorial debut in 2001 through the film ‘One Man Show’ starring Jayaram, Lal, and Samyukta Varma. In his career span of over two decades, Shafi directed a handful of superhit comedy films. His collaborations with actor Dileep led to several blockbusters, such as ‘Kalyanaraman’ (2002), ‘Marykkundoru Kunjaadu’ (2010), and ‘Two Countries’ (2015). Mammootty-starrer Thommanum Makkalum (2005) is yet another notable film directed by Shafi. His other popular films include Pulival Kalyanam (2003), Mayavi (2007), Chattambinadu (2009), among others. Apart from collaborating with some of the top names of Malayalam cinema, Shafi also directed a Tamil film ‘Majaa’ (2005), starring Vikram, Pasupathy, and Asin. It was the official remake of his own film ‘Thommanum Makkalum.’ His last directorial venture was the 2022 film ‘Aanandam Paramanandam.’ Shafi is survived by his wife Shameela and their daughters Aleema and Salma. tags : Malayalam cinema Shafi Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 09:23 IST News movies Malayalam Filmmaker Shafi Passes Away At 56 Read More

title: Mamata Shankar REACTS To Padma Shri, Says She Misses Satyajit Ray And Mrinal Sen The Most | Exclusive
summary: Mamata Shankar, who has been honoured with the Padma Shri for her iconic contributions to Indian cinema, expressed heartfelt gratitude.
full_content: Mamata Shankar REACTS To Padma Shri, Says She Misses Satyajit Ray And Mrinal Sen The Most | Exclusive Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 08:26 IST Mamata Shankar, who has been honoured with the Padma Shri for her iconic contributions to Indian cinema, expressed heartfelt gratitude. reset Follow us on Google News Mamata Shankar has been honoured with the Padma Shri. Mamata Shankar, who has left an indelible mark on Indian cinema through her nuanced performances in critically acclaimed films, many of which are considered milestones in Bengali and Indian cinema, has been honoured with the Padma Shri. She made her debut in Satyajit Ray’s Ashani Sanket, where her poignant portrayal of a young bride during the Bengal famine garnered a lot of  critical acclaim. Her collaboration with Ray continued in Shakha Proshakha and she also worked with legendary filmmakers like Mrinal Sen in Oka Oorie Katha and Ek Din Pratidin, delivering memorable performances that explored complex social and emotional themes. In an exclusive conversation with News18 Showsha after the list was out, Mamata expressed heartfelt gratitude. She said, “I want to thank everyone, all the stalwart directors I’ve worked with—who have helped me reach where I am today," she said. Acknowledging her audience, she added, “To those who have seen and loved my work, I thank you from the bottom of my heart. And to those who haven’t liked my work, I thank you as well. I will work harder to make them like me. I will strive to better myself." related stories Remembering the legendary director Mrinal Sen, Mamata said, “I am missing him the most today because it is because of him that I made it where I have, and it is because of him that people know me today." Reflecting on her Padma Shri recognition, she shared, “I’ve been extremely lucky. The feeling hasn’t sunk in yet. When people told me that my name was on the list, I asked them, ‘Are you sure?’ I couldn’t believe it. I don’t know… it hasn’t steeped in." The Centre announced the list of recipients for Padma Awards on Saturday on the eve of the Republic Day. The President approved the conferment of 139 Padma Awards, comprising seven Padma Vibhushan, 19 Padma Bhushan and 113 Padma Shri Awards. tags : Padma awards padma shri Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 08:26 IST News movies Mamata Shankar REACTS To Padma Shri, Says She Misses Satyajit Ray And Mrinal Sen The Most | Exclusive Read More

Resident suburban collector Satish Bagal said on Saturday that in 2019, Shah rukh Khan and his wife Gauri Khan converted the lease of the heritage property in Bandra to `class 1 complete ownership’, and paid the government some premium for it. related stories After discovering a tabulation error on the basis of which the premium was calculated, the Khans filed an application before the revenue authority for refund which was sanctioned earlier this week, he said. The actor had reportedly paid upwards of Rs 25 crore in premium, but officials did not confirm the figure immediately. title: Shahid Kapoor Reveals He Initially Found Arrange Marriage Scenes In Vivah 'Strange': 'What's Jal, Man?'
summary: Although Shahid found the scenes funny, he later realized their significance after the film's release.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Reveals He Initially Found Arrange Marriage Scenes In Vivah 'Strange': 'What's Jal, Man?' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 08:16 IST Although Shahid found the scenes funny, he later realized their significance after the film's release. reset Follow us on Google News Shahid Kapoor will next be seen in Deva. Shahid Kapoor and Amrita Rao’s film, Vivah, is one of the most iconic works in their filmography. However, while shooting the film, Shahid Kapoor wasn’t aware of how arranged marriages are set up and found the scenes strange. He spoke to director Sooraj Barjatya and decided to trust his vision, only later realising the significance of the scenes. Shahid Kapoor told SCREEN, “Vivah was my practice session. The same happened with me in real life, I never thought this would happen. When I was shooting for this film, I used to say to my friends, ‘How can anyone have an arranged marriage? It’s so strange.’ So, I used to find the scenes also very funny – voh chai lekar aarahi hai and then bolti hai jal." related stories He added, “I was like, Sooraj ji, ‘What’s jal, man? He said, ‘You just do it, you don’t know how people function in the interiors in India… We just followed him. I had no idea what was happening or about the world of this film, I was very much a big-city kid. Only after it did what it did, I realised that this actually happens. I also realised it around ten years later." Shahid Kapoor married Mira Rajput in 2015. Shahid and Mira’s marriage was arranged by their families. When asked if he believes in arranged marriages now, the actor replied, “I endorse arranged marriages a lot. I think it worked really well for me and Mira. I never thought at a young age that I would ever do an arranged marriage." While Shahid liked Mira from their very first meeting, it took Mira about six months to agree to the marriage. Despite their 13-year age difference, the couple has built a beautiful life together. Shahid and Mira welcomed their first child, Misha, in 2016, and their son, Zain, followed in 2018. The couple often shares glimpses of their family life on social media, giving fans major relationship goals with their candid posts and public appearances. tags : bollywood Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 08:16 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Reveals He Initially Found Arrange Marriage Scenes In Vivah 'Strange': 'What's Jal, Man?' title: Bigg Boss 18: Grand Finale Of Salman Khan-Hosted Reality Show Achieves Record-Breaking 3.1 TRP
summary: Bigg Boss 18 Grand Finale took place on 19th January, 2025. While Karan Veer Mehra emerged as the winner of Salman Khan’s show, Vivian Dsena was the first runner-up.
full_content: Bigg Boss 18: Grand Finale Of Salman Khan-Hosted Reality Show Achieves Record-Breaking 3.1 TRP Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 08:12 IST Bigg Boss 18 Grand Finale took place on 19th January, 2025. Salman Khan-hosted reality show ‘Bigg Boss 18’ featured some interesting contestants who had a rollercoaster journey on the show. It concluded on 19 th January, and the Bigg Boss 18 grand finale was a blockbuster, achieving a record-breaking TRP of 3.1. The top three finalists- Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, and Rajat Dalal- delivered an intense and closely fought competition, keeping fans, and followers on the edge of their seats. The grand finale of Bigg Boss 18 was super-exciting, with some special moments that delighted fans. Adding to the excitement, Salman Khan and Aamir Khan delighted fans by recreating an iconic scene from their classic film, Andaz Apna Apna, riding a bike together on stage. During his interaction with Salman, Aamir told him they must plan Andaz Apna Apna 2 soon. “Karna chahiye hume Andaz Apna Apna 2," Aamir said. Later in the episode, Salman also talked about the idea and added, “ho sakta hai". The final showdown between the top 2- Vivian Dsena and Karan Veer Mehra- on stage was a nail-biting moment with Karan Veer being finally crowned the winner. This perfect mix of intense competition and Bollywood nostalgia made the finale an unforgettable spectacle. related stories The finale was also attended by Sky Force actor Veer Pahariya. Former Bigg Boss finalists, Ankita Lokhande and Vicky Jain also attended the finale to talk about their upcoming show Laughter Chefs 2. Other contestants who were a part of the finale were- Rajat Dalal, Avinash Mishra, Eisha Singh and Chum Darang. title: Rakesh Roshan Says A Drunk Man Abused Him, Jeetendra 'Right In Front Of Us': 'I Was Furious, Jeetu Said...'
summary: Rakesh Roshan and Jeetendra highlighted how celebrities are soft targets for scrutiny.
full_content: Rakesh Roshan Says A Drunk Man Abused Him, Jeetendra 'Right In Front Of Us': 'I Was Furious, Jeetu Said...' Curated By : Kashvi Raj Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 26, 2025, 07:44 IST Rakesh Roshan and Jeetendra highlighted how celebrities are soft targets for scrutiny. reset Follow us on Google News Jeetendra and Rakesh Roshan. Rakesh Roshan is among the iconic directors in Bollywood who have contributed to Hindi cinema with their exceptional craft. However, his path to success hasn’t always been easy, making him an easy target for scrutiny. Speaking to Fever FM, Rakesh recalled an incident when a drunk man abused him and Jeetendra at a restaurant. Rakesh Roshan said, “Once Jeetendra and I were sitting at a restaurant. A drunk man was sitting right in front of us. For some reason, he began to abuse us, taking our names. I was furious looking at this." related stories While Rakesh Roshan got angry and wanted to speak to the man, veteran actor Jeetendra kept calm and thought it best to avoid the situation. The director recalled, “I said to Jeetendra, ‘Jeetu, I think we should speak to him.’ Jeetu said, ‘Let’s go. Let’s keep quiet. We don’t know him, he knows us. So we are soft targets. So, we walked away from there. That was the lesson I learnt from him." This was not the only time that the director came under attack. Although this was a verbal attack, Rakesh Roshan has also been subjected to physical attacks in his career. The veteran director was once shot at soon after launching son Hrithik Roshan’s Bollywood career with Kaho Na Pyaar Hai. The release of Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai was a happy time for the Roshan family as Rakesh Roshan had successfully launched his son, Hrithik Roshan, in Bollywood. The film was a massive success and paved the way for Hrithik’s superstardom. However, soon after the film’s release, Rakesh Roshan was shot in a shocking accident, leaving the family traumatised. For the unversed, in the year 2000, Rakesh Roshan was shot by assailants in broad daylight in Mumbai a week after the release of Kaho Naa Pyaar Hai, Hrithik Roshan’s debut film. After being injured with two bullets, Rakesh Roshan drove himself to the hospital. The attack was believed to be linked to the underworld. It was a shocking time for the Roshan family as on one hand, Hrithik Roshan had been launched into superstardom and on the other hand, Rakesh Roshan had been shot at. tags : bollywood Jeetendra Rakesh Roshan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 26, 2025, 07:44 IST News movies Rakesh Roshan Says A Drunk Man Abused Him, Jeetendra 'Right In Front Of Us': 'I Was Furious, Jeetu Said...' title: Jaspinder Narula Dedicates Padma Shri To Father Kesar Singh Narula: ‘Enrolling For The Award...' | Exclusive
summary: The prestigious Padma Shri award has honored remarkable talents this year, including celebrated playback singer Jaspinder Narula, Arijit Singh, and Ricky Kej.
full_content: Jaspinder Narula Dedicates Padma Shri To Father Kesar Singh Narula: ‘Enrolling For The Award...' | Exclusive Reported By : Titas Chowdhury News18.com Edited By: Yatamanyu Narain Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 22:09 IST The prestigious Padma Shri award has honored remarkable talents this year, including celebrated playback singer Jaspinder Narula, Arijit Singh, and Ricky Kej. reset Follow us on Google News In an exclusive chat with News18 Showsha, Jaspinder Narula, known for her hits like Ankhiyon Se Goli Maare and Bumbroo, expressed her elation at receiving Padma Shri. The winners of the coveted Padma Shri were announced a while back. Musicians who have been bestowed this honour include Arijit Singh, Jaspinder Narula and Ricky Kej, along with veteran actor Ashok Saraf and veteran theatre director Barry John. Speaking exclusively to News18 Showsha, Narula, who began her career with Judaai Judaai and Meri Zindagi Ek Pyaas from Sridevi, Anil Kapoor and Urmila Matondkar starrer Judaai (1997), says that she’s elated to have won this award. “Mehnat aur tapasya safal ho jaati hai jab mil jaata hai award," she tells us. Prior to films, she remained involved with singing bhajans and Sufiana compositions and earned acclaim for folk and devotional music. And now with the Padma Shri added to her list of awards and accolades, she feels that she has experienced the divine. “I’ve worked hard for 50 years and now I feel like god has come before me. Everybody wants to get an honour like this. Awards are meant to recognise your work and talent and they make you happy. This really means a lot and to get it from the Government of India is a very big deal," she remarks. related stories But does she believe that she should’ve received the Padma Shri years ago? “Samay ki baat hoti hai. Sabko apni samay pe milta hai. People used to tell me that I should’ve received an honour like this long ago but I never thought of it that way. I used to always tell them that when the right time comes, I too shall receive an award of the stature of Padma Shri," says the Taare Hain Baraati and Pyar To Hona Hi Tha singer. Narula, who has garnered immense appreciation for her distinctly raspy and textured voice, confesses applying for the awards as she adds, “There are so many artists who couldn’t receive it. So many deserving artists passed away before they could get a Padma Shri. I think time and destiny dictate everything. I had enrolled for it because yeh sab aaj kal toh karna hi padhta hai, uske bagair baat nahi hoti. But I was still surprised with the news." For the unversed, before training under Ustad Ghulam Sadiq Khan, she learnt music under the tutelage of her father, Kesar Singh Narula, a music director of the 1950s. Dedicating the award to him, she emotionally says, “If my father was alive, I would’ve dedicated it to him because he was everything to me. I’m really missing my dad and mom today. My dad was behind all this. He would help me with my riyaaz. He taught me what it means to work hard. I would tell him to not leave me because I’ve a lot left to achieve and he needs to see all of it. But unfortunately, four years ago, he left us." Narula’s career as a singer in films began after late music director Kalyanji of Kalyanji-Anandji fame heard her at a private gathering in Delhi and asked his son and music director, Viju Shah, to give her a break. Her discography includes popular songs like Ankhiyon Se Goli Maare (Dulhe Raja), Sabki Baaraten Aayeen (Jaanam Samjha Karo), Bumbroo (Mission Kashmir), Dulhe Ka Sehra (Dhadkan) and Bunty Aur Babli (Bunty Aur Babli), among others. tags : bollywood regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 22:09 IST News movies Jaspinder Narula Dedicates Padma Shri To Father Kesar Singh Narula: ‘Enrolling For The Award...' | Exclusive Read More

title: Chhaava: Vicky Kaushal’s Film Faces Scrutiny As Shivaji Maharaj’s Descendant Raises Concerns Over Historical Inaccuracies
summary: The upcoming historical drama Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, has generated excitement with its trailer release but also sparked conversations about historical accuracy.
full_content: Chhaava: Vicky Kaushal’s Film Faces Scrutiny As Shivaji Maharaj’s Descendant Raises Concerns Over Historical Inaccuracies Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 21:25 IST The upcoming historical drama Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, has generated excitement with its trailer release but also sparked conversations about historical accuracy. reset Follow us on Google News Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, is under scrutiny as Shivaji Maharaj’s descendant urges filmmakers to consult historians for accuracy. The highly anticipated historical drama Chhaava, based on the life of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, is drawing closer to its release. With Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna in lead roles, the film’s trailer was recently unveiled, garnering significant buzz. However, the movie has sparked a discussion about historical accuracy, as Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj’s descendant has urged the filmmakers to consult historians to address potential inaccuracies. In an interaction with PTI, Sambhajiraje Chhatrapati, a descendant of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj and former Rajya Sabha MP, praised the film for spotlighting the legacy of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj. He revealed that director Laxman Utekar had shared the trailer with him, and while he appreciated the effort, he expressed his desire to watch the full film before its release. “I also offered to connect them with historians to address inaccuracies to ensure this significant story is presented authentically to audiences worldwide," he stated. related stories Sambhajiraje Chhatrapati also highlighted specific concerns about historical liberties, citing the lezim dance sequence shown in the trailer. While recognizing the cultural significance of lezim, he questioned its portrayal in the context of Sambhaji Maharaj’s dignity and legacy. He emphasized the need for experts to weigh in on the appropriateness of such creative choices. Prior to the trailer’s release, the makers had unveiled individual character posters, building anticipation among audiences. Vicky Kaushal steps into the role of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, Rashmika Mandanna portrays Maharani Yesubai, and Akshaye Khanna takes on the role of Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb. The film also features an ensemble cast including Ashutosh Rana, Divya Dutta, Vineet Kumar Singh, Diana Penty, and Santosh Juvekar. Directed by Laxman Utekar and produced by Dinesh Vijan under Maddock Films, Chhaava boasts a musical score by AR Rahman. With its Valentine’s Day release set for February 14, 2025, the movie has already created significant excitement among audiences eager to witness this grand historical drama on the silver screen. tags : bollywood Vicky Kaushal Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 21:25 IST News movies Chhaava: Vicky Kaushal’s Film Faces Scrutiny As Shivaji Maharaj’s Descendant Raises Concerns Over Historical Inaccuracies Read More

title: Farah Khan On Choreographing Loveyapa Actors Junaid Khan, Khushi Kapoor: ‘I Started My Career With Aamir…’
summary: Farah Khan, who choreographed Pehla Nasha from Aamir Khan’s film Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar, opened up about choreographing Bollywood’s next gen Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor in Loveyapa.
full_content: Farah Khan On Choreographing Loveyapa Actors Junaid Khan, Khushi Kapoor: ‘I Started My Career With Aamir…’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 21:13 IST Farah Khan, who choreographed Pehla Nasha from Aamir Khan’s film Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar, opened up about choreographing Bollywood’s next gen Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor in Loveyapa. reset Follow us on Google News Farah Khan opened up about choreographing Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor in Loveyapa. Aamir Khan’s son Junaid Khan, and Sridevi-Boney Kapoor’s younger daughter Khushi Kapoor, are all set to make their theatrical debut with their upcoming film ‘Loveyapa’. Choreographer-turned-director Farah Khan recently reflected on her remarkable journey in Bollywood, from choreographing Aamir Khan and Sridevi to now, doing the same for the next generation of actors Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor. Farah, who has been in the industry for decades, revealed the emotional connection she shares with the children of some of the biggest stars she once worked with. Speaking about choreographing Junaid Khan, the son of Aamir Khan, and Khushi Kapoor, daughter of the late Sridevi, Farah said, “It was a surreal experience because literally, I think I was working with Aamir in Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar and after that Junaid was born. We all had gone to his house with Mansoor and everybody to congratulate him. Same with Sridevi also, I was quite close to her, Boney, and the whole Kapoor family. For me, it was very wonderful." related stories Farah then added that it feels weird that she has been in this industry for so long. “I don’t feel it. It’s just that when I shoot with these guys, I realize that, oh my god, I started my career with Aamir and now I’m choreographing his son," she said. About Loveyapa ‘Loveyapa’ is a fresh take on Gen-Z relationships, blending romance with comedy. The plot revolves around a humorous challenge set by the lead characters’ parents, where Gaurav and Baani must exchange their phones for a day to prove their trust before deciding to marry. Apart from Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film also features a stellar cast including Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Kiku Sharda, and Kunj Anand. Directed by Advait Chandan and backed by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, Loveyapa is set for a worldwide release by Zee Studios on February 7, 2025. tags : aamir khan bollywood Farah Khan Junaid Khan khushi kapoor Sridevi Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 21:13 IST News movies Farah Khan On Choreographing Loveyapa Actors Junaid Khan, Khushi Kapoor: ‘I Started My Career With Aamir…’ Read More

title: Ram Gopal Varma Shuts Down Rumors About Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil In Syndicate
summary: Ram Gopal Varma recently addressed swirling rumors about the casting of his upcoming film Syndicate, which speculated names like Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil, and Manoj Bajpayee.
full_content: Ram Gopal Varma Shuts Down Rumors About Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil In Syndicate Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 20:49 IST Ram Gopal Varma recently addressed swirling rumors about the casting of his upcoming film Syndicate, which speculated names like Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil, and Manoj Bajpayee. reset Follow us on Google News Ram Gopal Varma quashes rumors about Amitabh Bachchan and Fahadh Faasil starring in his upcoming film Syndicate. Speculations had been running wild ever since director Ram Gopal Varma announced his upcoming project Syndicate, with reports linking Bollywood megastar Amitabh Bachchan and acclaimed actors Fahadh Faasil and Manoj Bajpayee to key roles. However, RGV has now stepped forward to dismiss these rumors, putting to rest the swirling buzz around the film’s cast. A report from Telugu 360 previously suggested that Syndicate would feature an ensemble cast bridging Bollywood and the South Indian film industry. It claimed that Amitabh Bachchan was slated for an extended cameo, while Tollywood actor Venkatesh Daggubati was in talks for a lead role with a 35-day shoot schedule. Additionally, Fahadh Faasil, Manoj Bajpayee, and Anurag Kashyap were reportedly being approached for pivotal roles. The report also speculated that the film would commence production in mid-February. related stories On Saturday, Ram Gopal Varma took to X (formerly Twitter) to quash these rumors. “There are all kinds of speculations going around the casting of Syndicate, which are all completely FALSE. Will share the details when ready," the filmmaker wrote, clearing the air. There are all kinds of speculations going around the casting of SYNDICATE film which are all completely FALSE ..Will share the details when ready— Ram Gopal Varma (@RGVzoomin) January 25, 2025 The announcement didn’t dampen fans’ excitement, as several took to the comments to express their eagerness and share their dream casting ideas. “Please cast Manoj Bajpayee and Anurag Kashyap," one user wrote, while another simply said, “Waiting, boss!" Ram Gopal Varma has revealed that Syndicate will delve into the rise of a chilling criminal organization that threatens India’s very fabric. Sharing insights about the film’s concept on X, he emphasized that while street gangs were once seen as a significant threat, the real danger today stems from the emergence of powerful syndicates. These groups, he explained, comprise a sinister nexus of political factions, law enforcement, ultra-wealthy business magnates, and even military operatives. The director also highlighted how today’s intense polarization in the country creates fertile ground for such an ominous syndicate to rise. Unlike a supernatural horror film, RGV described Syndicate as a terrifying exploration of human nature’s darkest truths and the cyclical nature of crime and terror. “Crime and terror never die; they keep coming back in deadlier forms," he remarked, shedding light on the chilling themes of the film. In a bold statement, RGV vowed to redeem his cinematic legacy with Syndicate. “I took a VOW to WASH AWAY all my CINEMA SINS that I committed over the PAST FEW YEARS with this JUST one SINGLE film called SYNDICATE," he wrote. Promising an intense and realistic narrative, he assured audiences that Syndicate would be a film that horrifies not with the supernatural, but with its unflinching portrayal of humanity’s potential for darkness. tags : amitabh bachchan bollywood fahadh faasil Ram Gopal Varma regional cinema Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 20:49 IST News movies Ram Gopal Varma Shuts Down Rumors About Amitabh Bachchan, Fahadh Faasil In Syndicate Read More

title: Ranbir Kapoor Flaunts His Athletic Moves During Paddle Tennis Game In Mumbai; Watch Here
summary: Ranbir Kapoor, amidst his jam-packed schedule of shooting Love and War in Mumbai with Sanjay Leela Bhansali and prepping for Dhoom 4, was recently spotted enjoying a game of paddle tennis.
full_content: Ranbir Kapoor Flaunts His Athletic Moves During Paddle Tennis Game In Mumbai; Watch Here Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 19:20 IST Ranbir Kapoor, amidst his jam-packed schedule of shooting Love and War in Mumbai with Sanjay Leela Bhansali and prepping for Dhoom 4, was recently spotted enjoying a game of paddle tennis. reset Follow us on Google News Ranbir Kapoor takes a break from filming Love and War to play paddle tennis in style. Actor Ranbir Kapoor is currently juggling a busy filming schedule as he works on Love and War in Mumbai, directed by the visionary Sanjay Leela Bhansali. Despite his packed calendar, the Brahmastra star is reportedly set to begin shooting for Dhoom 4 next April. Amidst this hectic routine, Ranbir managed to squeeze in a game of paddle tennis, showcasing his passion for sports alongside his dedication to work. In a video shared by popular paparazzo handle Sneh Zala, Ranbir Kapoor is seen donning an athletic yet stylish ensemble that perfectly suits his sporty side. The actor wore a backward white cap, lending a casual and cool vibe, paired with a sleeveless black top for comfort and flexibility. Adding a vibrant touch to his look were bright red full-arm sleeves, which might serve both as sun protection and a bold fashion statement. He completed the outfit with blue athletic tights for easy movement and black sports shoes, ensuring optimal grip and performance on the court. Ranbir’s ease with the racket and his sporty charisma were evident as he tackled the tennis ball effortlessly. related stories Take a look: View this post on Instagram A post shared by Snehkumar Zala (@snehzala) As for Dhoom 4, sources recently shared with India Today that Ranbir Kapoor will sport a distinct new look for the high-octane action film. “Kapoor will need to have a different look for Dhoom 4, and before starting that, he will wrap up his two existing projects. The film is expected to go on floors next April. The production team is currently finalizing two female leads and an antagonist. Several key contenders from the South are being considered for the antagonist role," revealed the source. Besides Dhoom 4, Ranbir Kapoor has an impressive slate of projects lined up. A sequel to Animal, titled Animal Park, is part of a three-film franchise helmed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga. However, the sequel will only begin after Vanga wraps up Spirit, his next project starring Prabhas. Ranbir is also set to star in the highly anticipated Ramayan, where he will portray Lord Ram alongside Sai Pallavi as Sita and Yash as Ravana. Directed by Nitish Tiwari, this ambitious epic boasts a massive budget of ₹835 crore and is slated for a Diwali 2026 release. Adding to this stellar lineup, Love and War, a romantic drama set against the backdrop of war, is scheduled for release on March 20, 2026. With such an exciting array of films, Ranbir Kapoor continues to solidify his position as one of the most versatile and bankable stars in Indian cinema. tags : bollywood Ranbir Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 19:20 IST News movies Ranbir Kapoor Flaunts His Athletic Moves During Paddle Tennis Game In Mumbai; Watch Here Read More
