title: Teen Sentenced To 52 Years For Killing 3 Young Taylor Swift Fans At UK Dance Class
summary: Months after the devastating incident, the attacker, 18-year-old Axel Rudakubana, has been sentenced to 52 years in prison.
full_content: Teen Sentenced To 52 Years For Killing 3 Young Taylor Swift Fans At UK Dance Class Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 16:43 IST Months after the devastating incident, the attacker, 18-year-old Axel Rudakubana, has been sentenced to 52 years in prison. reset Follow us on Google News This latest mystery added fuel to the ongoing saga of Taylor Swift’s efforts. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Taylor Swift was heartbroken last year upon learning about the tragic deaths of three young fans attending a Swift-themed dance class in the UK. Months after the devastating incident, the attacker, 18-year-old Axel Rudakubana, has been sentenced to 52 years in prison. The victims—7-year-old Elsie Dot Stancombe, 6-year-old Bebe King, and 9-year-old Alice da Silva Aguiar—lost their lives, while eight other children and two adults were injured. During the trial, Judge Julian Goose explained that, as Rudakubana was a minor at the time of the crime, he could not receive a life sentence without parole. Instead, he was handed a lengthy sentence to reflect the severity of his actions. According to the Associated Press (AP), Goose stated that Rudakubana “wanted to try and carry out mass murder of innocent, happy young girls." During the trial at Liverpool Crown Court, when prosecutors began showing evidence, the attacker interrupted them by claiming he was feeling ill and asked for a doctor. Due to constant disturbance, he was removed from the courtroom. The trial continued without Rudakubana, where he was charged with three murders, ten attempted murders and other offences, including having a knife, ricin poison and an al-Qaida manual. related stories Prosecutor Deanna Heer explained that during the summer vacation, 26 young girls were sitting together, making bracelets and singing Taylor Swift songs. The suspect arrived at the Hart Space venue in a taxi. Holding a knife, he entered the building and started attacking the girls and their teacher brutally. Heer claimed two dead children “suffered particularly horrific injuries which are difficult to explain as anything other than sadistic in nature." Reportedly, one girl managed to reach the exit, but the attacker pulled her back inside. While she was shockingly stabbed 32 times but survived. One of the girls who couldn’t survive, had 122 injuries, while another had 85 wounds. The prosecutor further shed light on Axel Rudakubana’s long history of violence and killing. According to Deanna Heer, “His only purpose was to kill. And he targeted the youngest and most vulnerable in society." While in the police station, the 18-year-old was heard saying “It’s a good thing those children are dead, I’m so glad, I’m so happy." This was heard in front of the victims’ families present in the courtroom. tags : entertainment hollywood Taylor Swift Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 16:43 IST News movies Teen Sentenced To 52 Years For Killing 3 Young Taylor Swift Fans At UK Dance Class Read More

title: No Charges Filed Against Marilyn Manson Following Rape And Domestic Violence Claims, Here's Why
summary: Marilyn Manson, now 56, has been at the centre of multiple allegations in recent years.
full_content: No Charges Filed Against Marilyn Manson Following Rape And Domestic Violence Claims, Here's Why Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 16:25 IST Marilyn Manson, now 56, has been at the centre of multiple allegations in recent years. reset Follow us on Google News Marilyn Manson will not face criminal charges for allegations of rape and domestic violence.  (Photo Credits: Instagram) After years of intense scrutiny and a lengthy investigation, shock rocker Marilyn Manson will reportedly not face criminal charges for allegations of rape and domestic violence. The Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office announced the decision on Friday, bringing an official close to the four-year investigation into accusations levelled against Manson, whose real name is Brian Warner. In a detailed statement, District Attorney Nathan J Hochman explained the decision, citing two primary factors: the expiration of the statute of limitations on the domestic violence claims and insufficient evidence to prove sexual assault charges beyond a reasonable doubt. The investigation was a collaborative effort between the DA’s Sex Crimes Division and the Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department, reports Entertainment Weekly. related stories “We recognise and applaud the courage and resilience of the women who came forward to make reports and share their experiences and we thank them for their cooperation and patience with the investigation," the statement read. The DA’s office further emphasised the importance of the survivors’ advocacy, noting how their voices have shone a light on the obstacles faced by those who endure domestic abuse and sexual violence. While no charges will be filed, Hochman reportedly reaffirmed the office’s dedication to pursuing justice for survivors. “We encourage anyone experiencing abuse to seek support and make a report to law enforcement as quickly as possible," the statement concluded. Manson’s attorney, Howard King, expressed relief at the outcome, stating, “We are very pleased that, after a thorough and incredibly lengthy review of all of the actual evidence, the District Attorney has concluded what we knew and expressed from the start: Brian Warner is innocent." Manson, now 56, has been at the centre of multiple allegations in recent years. High-profile accusations reportedly came from actress and former fiancee Evan Rachel Wood and Game of Thrones star Esme Bianco. Wood accused Manson of grooming her as a teenager and subjecting her to horrific abuse during their relationship, which she detailed in the 2022 HBO documentary Phoenix Rising. She also alleged that Manson “essentially raped" her during the filming of his Heart-Shaped Glasses music video. In response, Manson filed a defamation lawsuit against Wood in 2022 but later dropped the case, agreeing to pay her legal fees. Bianco filed her own civil lawsuit in 2021, accusing Manson of sexual assault and human trafficking. That case was settled in 2023, informs Entertainment Weekly. Reacting to the DA’s decision not to press charges, Bianco shared her disappointment but acknowledged it didn’t come as a surprise. “Once again, our justice system has failed survivors," she wrote in a social media post on Friday. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Esmé Bianco (@esmebianco) “My healing and peace could not be reliant upon the outcome of a desperately broken system." She ended her message with a pointed note directed at Manson. “By you dragging me through hell, I discovered the unstoppable force of my own power," her statement read. tags : entertainment hollywood marilyn manson Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 16:25 IST News movies No Charges Filed Against Marilyn Manson Following Rape And Domestic Violence Claims, Here's Why Read More

title: Atlanta Rapper DJ Unk Dies At 43, Tributes Pour In
summary: DJ Unk's family issued a statement to confirm his passing at the age of 43. The cause behind his death is unknown.
full_content: Atlanta Rapper DJ Unk Dies At 43, Tributes Pour In Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 16:23 IST DJ Unk's family issued a statement to confirm his passing at the age of 43. The cause behind his death is unknown. reset Follow us on Google News DJ Unk is best known for his hit song Walk It Out. (Photo Credits: Instagram) In a shocking piece of news for the music fraternity, Atlanta rapper and DJ Unk has passed away at the age of 43. Best known for his 2006 snap smash Walk It Out, the rapper’s family confirmed the news on Friday, January 24. His wife Sherkita Long-Platt on Facebook shared a heart-wrenching note revealing the news. “Please respect me and my family. I just lost my husband and my kids just lost their father. Our life will never be the same. I LOVE YOU ANTHONY FOREVER," the post read. related stories A representative from his former label Big Oomp Records has paid tribute to the singer. “It is with a heavy heart and profound sadness that we announce the passing of a true ATL legend, Anthony Platt better known as ‘DJ Unk.’ DJ Unk was not just a legendary DJ, rapper, and producer, but a true cornerstone of our label, and the imprint that he left globally will be cherished forever," the label said. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Big Oomp Records (@bigoomprecords) DJ Unk’s Career It is noteworthy that Unk suffered certain health issues in 2009 which significantly affected his music career. Speaking to the XXL Magazine in 2010, Unk revealed he suffered from heart attack. “Basically man, I work hard every day. Everything I do every day I try to make something happen in my household. I constantly am on the go, I constantly am on airplanes, in different weather and you know it just took a toll on me. It was stress," he said. DJ Unk began his musical career at the very young age of 17, linking up with DJ Jelly and DJ Montay. He later signed with Big Oomp Records and released his debut album Beat’n Down Yo Block in 2006. Unk’s 2006 debut single Walk It Out also came around the same time, becoming a major hit. It climbed to No.10 on the Billboard Hot 100 and No. 2 on Hot Rap Songs and Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs. However, it was his 2009 illness that slowed down Unk’s career in the following years with a few one-off singles and a full-length titled Fresh Off Dem Papers. The rapper most recently appeared on the stage at the BET Awards last year to perform Walk It Out as a part of a medley. title: Urvashi Rautela REACTS To Her Comments On Saif Ali Khan Attack: ‘Show Off Hota Toh Mini Watch Nahi Dikhaati’
summary: Urvashi Rautela, who was trolled for flaunting her Rolex while condemning the attack on Saif Ali Khan, has now explained that she was caught off guard and was unaware of the full details.
full_content: Urvashi Rautela REACTS To Her Comments On Saif Ali Khan Attack: ‘Show Off Hota Toh Mini Watch Nahi Dikhaati’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 16:05 IST Urvashi Rautela, who was trolled for flaunting her Rolex while condemning the attack on Saif Ali Khan, has now explained that she was caught off guard and was unaware of the full details. reset Follow us on Google News Urvashi Rautela explained that she was caught off guard and was unaware of full details of the attack on Saif Ali Khan. Urvashi Rautela hit the headlines last week after she faced flak for her comments about Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan’s attack. While condemning the attack, the actress shifted the conversation to discuss expensive gifts that her parents had given her after the success of her film ‘Daaku Maharaaj’. She flaunted her diamond-studded Rolex and other jewellery, which many found tone-deaf and insensitive. She then apologized on Instagram, but later deleted the post. Now, in a recent interview, Urvashi explained that she was caught off guard and was unaware of the full details of the attack on Saif Ali Khan. While speaking with Filmfare, Urvashi Rautela said that the question about Saif Ali Khan caught her off guard because the attack happened at 4 am, and she had an interview the next morning while she was still processing the news. “I think I should have been way more careful with the way I answered. I have to admit that I should have answered it more carefully. Also, the incident happened at 4 am (Saif’s attack), and very next day my interviews happened at 8 am. So, I was completely kind of clueless. All I remember is that when I was waking up someone told me, he got hurt. I don’t know the intensity of how he got hurt. I wasn’t aware of the intensity of what all has happened with him," she said. related stories She said that she kept bringing up her film Daaku Maharaaj as the interviews were lined up to celebrate the success of her film. She also admitted that the excitement about her parents’ gifts caused her to go off-topic, and that it was a moment of misplaced enthusiasm rather than an attempt to ‘show-off’.  “I came back to my film Daaku Maharaaj because the interviews were to celebrate its success. Unlike what some people think, I was also not referring to that daaku (intruder) as a maharaaj. I love my parents; I feel they are my god. I got a bit too excited with the kind of gifts I got. Hum Hindi mai bolte hai na, josh mai hosh kho dena. Wahi hua mere saath. But show off toh nahi tha. Kyunki agar show off hota toh main chhoti si mini watch nahi dikhaati. (Like we say in Hindi, I lost it in the passion, that’s what happened. It was definitely not show off. Because if it was, I wouldn’t have shown a small mini watch)," said Urvashi. What Did Urvashi Rautela Say About Attack On Saif Ali Khan? In an interview with ANI, Urvashi was asked to comment on Saif’s situation. While expressing concern, her remarks veered towards showcasing her luxury items. Referring to the attack at Saif’s Mumbai residence, Urvashi said, “It is very unfortunate. Now Daaku Maharaaj has crossed ₹105 crore at the box office, and my mother gifted me this diamond-studded Rolex, while my father gifted me this mini watch on my finger, but we don’t feel confident wearing it outside openly. There is this insecurity that anybody can attack us. Whatever happened was very unfortunate." For the unversed, Saif Ali Khan was stabbed by an intruder who allegedly broke into his Mumbai residence on January 16. The actor suffered multiple injuries, including one near his spine and another on his neck. He was rushed to Lilavati Hospital, where he underwent surgeries. tags : bollywood Saif ali khan Urvashi Rautela Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 16:05 IST News movies Urvashi Rautela REACTS To Her Comments On Saif Ali Khan Attack: ‘Show Off Hota Toh Mini Watch Nahi Dikhaati’ Read More

title: Kapil Sharma Kicks Off Shooting Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon Sequel In Mumbai Amid Death Threats
summary: The sequel to "Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon" has begun filming in Mumbai. Kapil Sharma, Remo D’Souza, Sugandha Mishra, and Rajpal Yadav received death threats, now under investigation.
full_content: Kapil Sharma Kicks Off Shooting Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon Sequel In Mumbai Amid Death Threats Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 15:36 IST The sequel to "Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon" has begun filming in Mumbai. Kapil Sharma, Remo D’Souza, Sugandha Mishra, and Rajpal Yadav received death threats, now under investigation. reset Follow us on Google News Kapil Sharma is shooting for the sequel of the comedy film. The much-awaited sequel to the hit comedy Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon has officially gone on floors in Mumbai. Starring Kapil Sharma in the lead role, the film promises to deliver another dose of laughter and chaos. Directed by Anukalp Goswami, the project is being produced by Ratan Jain, Ganesh Jain, and Abbas-Mustan under Venus Worldwide Entertainment in association with Abbas Mustan Film Production. Fans are eagerly anticipating the return of Kapil Sharma’s trademark humour in this comedy caper. The film marks Kapil’s reunion with the legendary duo Abbas-Mustan, who helmed the first installment. Their collaboration had delivered a laughter riot, and fans are thrilled to see the magic unfold again. Joining the cast this time is Manjot Singh, known for his impeccable comic timing. With this combination of seasoned humour and fresh energy, the sequel promises to be an even bigger entertainer. related stories Meanwhile, Kapil Sharma, choreographer Remo D’Souza, singer Sugandha Mishra and actor Rajpal Yadav recently received death threats through email. The police have now given their first exclusive statement to News18 regarding the alarming news. The authorities confirmed that they are actively investigating the matter, treating the threats with utmost seriousness, and taking necessary steps to ensure the safety of the celebrities involved. They have also pointed the origin of the email to Pakistan and hinted that the case may be transferred to the CBI (Central Bureau of Investigation). On the work front, Kapil Sharma released his new music video, titled ‘Guilt’. On Wednesday, the actor-comedian took to his Instagram handle and announced that the song is finally out. While it is sung by Kapil himself, the lyrics have been written by Raj Ranjodh. Simran Gill and Hrprt Brar have directed the music video, which also stars Yesha Sagar opposite Kapil Sharma. In the music video, Kapil Sharma is seen as a business tycoon, who betrays his lover. When caught cheating red-handedly, he leaves his lover, who then passes away in a tragic incident. title: Shahid Kapoor Was Made To Feel Less Of A Star Before Kabir Singh: 'Mujhe Aise Situation Mein Dala Gaya...'
summary: Shahid Kapoor had once said he felt like an outsider during the filming of Padmaavat, starring Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone.
full_content: Shahid Kapoor Was Made To Feel Less Of A Star Before Kabir Singh: 'Mujhe Aise Situation Mein Dala Gaya...' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 15:05 IST Shahid Kapoor had once said he felt like an outsider during the filming of Padmaavat, starring Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone. reset Follow us on Google News Shahid Kapoor starred in Padmaavat before Kabir Singh. Back in 2018, during the making of Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s Padmaavat, starring Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone in lead roles, reports of cold vibes between Ranveer and Shahid Kapoor made headlines. It was said that the two actors couldn’t see eye to eye, creating a tense atmosphere on set and causing challenges for seamless shoots. Shahid later admitted to feeling like an ‘outsider’ during the filming of the film. He also expressed disappointment with his portrayal in the film, admitting in hindsight that he didn’t bring out the full spectrum of his character’s personality. Recently, during a conversation with Raj Shamani on his YouTube podcast, Shahid spoke about a time before Kabir Singh (2019) when he was made to feel “small." Without naming the film or anyone involved, he shared that he felt undermined and less of a star. Fans were quick to speculate that his comments were a subtle nod to his experience working on Padmaavat. related stories When asked if he ever felt victimised, Shahid said, “Ye Kabir Singh ke pehle mere saath hua tha. Mere andar jo kuch tha, mujhe laga ke I am lesser. Mujhe aisa mehsoos karaya gaya. Kisi ne zabardasti nahi ki. As an artist, as a star, as an individual. Mujhe aisa situation mein dala gaya ke mujhe aisa feel ho ke main kam hoon. Aur yeh main kabhi accept nahi karunga. It’s like your clothes are better than mine. It’s a comparative. Sometimes life puts you in a situation where it plays out in a way where somebody is… you’re in enclosed proximity and you’re made to feel lesser. It’s nobody’s fault, I’m not getting into that. But that is what I went through for some time. And I was made to feel like that. And I fought it." Shahid had once said that he felt like an outsider on the sets of Padmaavat. He had told DNA, “I’m used to being the favourite of all my filmmakers. This was the first time that I was like an outsider. When you work with a team that has worked together, you are kind of an outsider and it takes time for you to break through that barrier." tags : bollywood Shahid Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 15:04 IST News movies Shahid Kapoor Was Made To Feel Less Of A Star Before Kabir Singh: 'Mujhe Aise Situation Mein Dala Gaya...' summary: A picture from Asha Bhosle’s granddaughter Zanai Bhosle's 23rd birthday celebration, featuring her alongside cricketer Mohammed Siraj, has gone viral on social media.
full_content: Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter Zanai Bhosle Dating Cricketer Mohammed Siraj? Viral Photo Sparks Romance Rumours Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 15:02 IST A picture from Asha Bhosle’s granddaughter Zanai Bhosle's 23rd birthday celebration, featuring her alongside cricketer Mohammed Siraj, has gone viral on social media. reset Follow us on Google News Zanai Bhosle and Mohammed Siraj's picture from former's birthday bash. Legendary singer Asha Bhosle’s granddaughter Zanai Bhosle recently turned 23 years old, and she shared some lovely pictures on social media, giving fans a sneak-peek into the star-studded birthday party. The pictures from the bash featured several celebrities, including Jackie Shroff, Ayesha Khan, Abhay Verma, and cricketers Shreyas Iyer and Siddhesh Lad. However, one particular photo from the bash, showing Zanai with Mohammed Siraj, has gone viral on social media, sparking dating rumours. Zanai Bhosle took to her Instagram account to share a series of pictures from her 23 rd birthday party in Bandra, Mumbai. The first picture shows her cutting the birthday cake, while Asha Bhosle and Jackie Shroff stood next to her. The second picture features her enjoying a candid moment with cricketer Mohammed Siraj. Zanai and Siraj are all smiles in the photo, and are seen gazing adorably at each other. Zanai looks gorgeous in a black sequinned dress, while the cricketer donned a black tee with a matching jacket. The picture has gone viral on social media, and netizens soon started speculating whether they are dating each other. related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Zanai Bhosle💜 (@zanaibhosle) Netizens React To Zanai Bhosle And Mohammed Siraj’s Picture Soon after Zanai Bhosle shared the pictures, Instagram users flooded the comments section with mentions of Siraj. Many fans wondered whether they are dating, and some fans of Siraj even went to the extent of calling Zanai ‘bhabhi’. “Are you going to marry siraj bhaijaan?" asked one Instagram user, while another one commented, “DSP sahab is like — yaha mae pigal gaya." “Ab to confirm he bhabhi DSP Siraj bhabhi phle se shak tha," read another comment. One Instagram user also pointed out that Zanai is following Gujarat Titans’ official Instagram account. “Bhabi ne sirf Gujrat Titans ko follow kiya kyu k dsp hai iss bar Gujarat me," wrote a fan. The picture has also gone viral on Reddit, with the title, “Mohammd Siraj is dating Shraddha Kapoor’s cousin sister Zanai Bhosle." Reacting to this post, one netizen commented, “I know her personally, she isn’t dating Siraj." Meanwhile, when another Reddit user pointed out that there were also other cricketers at the bash, a netizen replied, “Yes there were other people but she shared this picture from her post separately on her story. She always comments on his posts." Zanai Bhosle’s 23 rd Birthday Bash Not just Mohammed Siraj, Zanai Bhosle’s birthday bash was attended by several other cricketers including Shreyas Iyer, Siddhesh Lad, Suyash Prabhudessai. One picture also shows Zanai posing with actress and former Bigg Boss contestant Ayesha Khan, while another one features ‘Munjya’ actor Abhay Verma. On the work front, Zanai Bhosle will soon foray into Bollywood with the film ‘The Pride Of Bharat- Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.’ She will be seen essaying the role of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj’s wife Rani Sai Bhonsale in Sandeep Ssingh’s film. Zanai is also a singer and a dancer, and is gearing up for the release of her first single ‘Kehndi Hai’ which will release on 27 th January 2025. tags : asha bhosle bollywood Mohammed Siraj Zanai BHosle Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 15:02 IST News movies Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter Zanai Bhosle Dating Cricketer Mohammed Siraj? title: 'To The Woman Who Has My Heart': Bobby Deol’s Sweet Birthday Wish For Wife Tania
summary: "Happiest birthday to the woman who has my heart, forever and always," Bobby Deol wrote.
full_content: 'To The Woman Who Has My Heart': Bobby Deol’s Sweet Birthday Wish For Wife Tania Published By : Lubna Khan Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 15:42 IST "Happiest birthday to the woman who has my heart, forever and always," Bobby Deol wrote. reset Follow us on Google News Bobby Deol and Tania got married on May 30, 1996.  (Photo Credits: Instagram) Bobby Deol’s wife Tania Deol celebrated her 49th birthday yesterday (January 24). Needless to mention, a flurry of wishes flooded her social media timeline. The sweetest wish, however, came from her husband Bobby Deol . The actor posted a romantic picture with his ladylove on Instagram to make her day extra special. In the snap, the couple were seen holding each other in a warm embrace and flashed beaming smiles. The post screamed love from a mile away, hinting at their inseparable bond. Bobby Deol looked dapper in a crochet white T-shirt and black trousers. Tania complemented her husband in a black dress. Bobby’s lovely side note read, “Happiest birthday to the woman who has my heart, forever and always." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Bobby Deol (@iambobbydeol) Reacting to the post, Ananya Pandey’s aunt Deanne Pandey commented, “Awwwwwwww love you so much my Tanu." Actress Huma Qureshi joined the bandwagon, wishing the birthday girl. Fans extended birthday greetings to Tania Deol as well. “Warmest of wishes to Tania, who always has your back," wrote a person. “Aww good bless you both," gushed another. “Fabulous couple," commented a user. Bobby Deol and Tania got married on May 30, 1996. The couple are proud parents to sons Aryaman and Dharam Deol. Last year in December Bobby Deol had an interaction with SCREEN where he talked fondly about his wife. The actor revealed that falling in love with Tania was “the best thing" that happened to him. “I met her, I chased her… she was from South Bombay, she didn’t give me any attention, but I still chased her," he shared. Eventually, Tania had a change of heart. After dating for a few months, they decided to get married. Workwise, Bobby Deol made his Telugu debut with the film Daaku Maharaaj. Directed by Bobby Kolli, the action-adventure hit the big screens on January 12. Bobby essayed the role of an antagonist in the movie led by South star Nandamuri Balakrishna. Up next, Bobby Deol is gearing up for director Shiv Rawail’s Alpha. The female-centric film which is a part of YRF’s spy universe stars Alia Bhatt and Sharvari Wagh in lead roles. Alpha is expected to premiere on December 25. tags : Bobby Deol bollywood entertainment Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 15:00 IST News movies 'To The Woman Who Has My Heart': Bobby Deol’s Sweet Birthday Wish For Wife Tania Read More

title: This Is What Sonam Kapoor Hates The Most About Makeup
summary: “I hate wearing false lashes," Sonam Kapoor revealed in her new Instagram video.
full_content: This Is What Sonam Kapoor Hates The Most About Makeup Published By : Akriti Anand Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 14:51 IST “I hate wearing false lashes," Sonam Kapoor revealed in her new Instagram video. reset Follow us on Google News Sonam was last seen in Blind. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Celebrities often use makeup to elevate their looks on red carpets, photoshoots and public appearances. However, fashion icon Sonam Kapoor has recently revealed her biggest makeup pet peeve – fake eyelashes. Taking to Instagram, the actress dropped a video on her stories wherein she is seen getting her hair and makeup done for an event. As it moves forward, her make-up artist is seen applying mascara to her lashes and Sonam Kapoor can heard saying, “I don’t think anybody hates wearing eyelashes as much as I do." She captioned the post, “I hate wearing false lashes. The girls who wear coloured lenses and lashes together I want to give you a (trophy emoticon)." related stories Sonam is known for her impeccable sense of styling and often creates waves on social media. On Friday, the actress marked her presence at the BoF (Business of Fashion) Gala in Mumbai. For the event, she opted for a yolk yellow-coloured chiffon gown that resembled a saree and gave her an old-school look. This time Sonam was styled by her sister Rhea Kapoor. View this post on Instagram A post shared by The Business of Fashion (@bof) Several pictures and videos of the actress from the gala event went viral on social media. Apart from her, other celebs who attended the event include Ishaan Khatter, Vedang Raina, Khushi Kapoor, Ananya Panday and Jacqueline Fernandez among others. Meanwhile, on the work front, Sonam made her acting comeback with the thriller film Blind. Helmed by Shome Makhija, the film premiered on the OTT platform JioCinema in 2023 and also featured Purab Kohli and Vinay Pathak in key roles. She will be next seen in the film titled Battle of Bittora which is an official adaptation of Anuja Chauhan’s novel. The actress announced her plans to return to the big screens with this project. Earlier, speaking about her role in Battle of Bittora, Sonam said, “It’s a beloved character, but I feel a lot of girls might have read the book. I feel a lot of girls, maybe from our generation, know about it, but I don’t think the younger generation knows the character as much. So, we have the advantage of that." However, an official announcement of the film is yet to be made. tags : bollywood entertainment Sonam Kapoor Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 14:51 IST News movies This Is What Sonam Kapoor Hates The Most About Makeup Read More

title: Justin Baldoni Hits Back At Blake Lively And Ryan Reynolds' Gag Order Request
summary: The tension between Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively reportedly escalated after her sexual harassment claims.
full_content: Justin Baldoni Hits Back At Blake Lively And Ryan Reynolds' Gag Order Request Published By : Yatamanyu Narain Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 14:26 IST The tension between Justin Baldoni and Blake Lively reportedly escalated after her sexual harassment claims. reset Follow us on Google News Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds have requested a protective order. (Photo Credits: Instagram) The simmering feud between Justin Baldoni and Hollywood power couple Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds has taken a sharp turn, with Baldoni’s camp calling out what they see as a shocking double standard. They’re pushing back against the couple’s attempt to silence Baldoni’s attorney, Bryan Freedman, through a gag order, describing the move as nothing short of grossly unfair. The tension reportedly escalated after Lively’s sexual harassment claims, initially published by The New York Times, sparked widespread attention. Now, Baldoni’s camp is calling out what they see as an attempt to silence Freedman, who has been vocal in defending his client. “It’s grossly unfair," insiders close to the It Ends With Us director reportedly said, adding that the couple’s motion to prevent Freedman from speaking to the media is “unbelievable." According to sources, Freedman has merely been pushing back against what they describe as Lively’s alleged “takedown campaign." related stories Meanwhile, representatives for Lively, 37, and Reynolds, 48, have yet to address the brewing controversy publicly, reports Page Six. The power couple has officially requested a protective order to stop Freedman from sharing any discovery materials with the press. In a letter to Judge Lewis J Liman on Tuesday, Lively’s legal team argued that Freedman’s public commentary could jeopardise the integrity of a potential trial. “As Ms Lively’s counsel have attempted, repeatedly, to caution Mr Freedman, federal litigation must be conducted in court and according to the relevant rules of professional conduct," the letter states, according to various reports. The letter reportedly accuses Freedman of engaging in a relentless media blitz. It claims he has given interviews, appeared on podcasts, issued “inflammatory" statements and leaked documents, some as seemingly minor as preservation demands, to the entertainment press and tabloids “almost daily" since Lively filed her complaint on December 20. Furthermore, the couple’s legal team alleges that Freedman’s actions are “deliberately aimed at undermining the ‘character, credibility and reputation’ of numerous relevant parties," informs Page Six. This legal clash follows Baldoni’s release of raw footage from It Ends With Us, which he claims discredits Lively’s allegations. Baldoni, 40, has vehemently denied the harassment claims and is reportedly preparing to launch a website aimed at dismantling what his team sees as baseless accusations against him. With both sides locked in an increasingly bitter battle, the case is shaping up to be as dramatic as any screenplay. Whether the judge will grant Lively and Reynolds’ gag order remains to be seen, but it’s clear that neither party is backing down anytime soon. tags : Blake Lively entertainment Ryan Reynolds Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 14:26 IST News movies Justin Baldoni Hits Back At Blake Lively And Ryan Reynolds' Gag Order Request Read More

title: R Madhavan Reacts To Aamir Khan's Habit Of Travelling Without His Wallet: 'I Am Never That Extreme’
summary: R Madhavan, who is busy promoting his latest film Hisaab Barabar, said that Aamir Khan’s stardom allows him to walk around without a wallet, and that he has people to pay for whatever he requires.
full_content: R Madhavan Reacts To Aamir Khan's Habit Of Travelling Without His Wallet: 'I Am Never That Extreme’ Curated By : Lubna Khan News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 14:17 IST R Madhavan, who is busy promoting his latest film Hisaab Barabar, said that Aamir Khan’s stardom allows him to walk around without a wallet, and that he has people to pay for whatever he requires. reset Follow us on Google News R Madhavan and Aamir Khan have shared screen space in films such as 3 Idiots and Rang De Basanti. R Madhavan was recently seen in the financial thriller ‘Hisaab Barabar’ alongside Neil Nitin Mukesh and Kirti Kulhari. The actor has been busy promoting his film, and in a recent interview, he talked about his finances. He revealed that his wife Sarita thinks he is a ‘fool’ when it comes to financial matters. He was also asked about his ‘3 Idiots’ co-star Aamir Khan’s habit of walking around without a wallet. In response, he said that Aamir’s stardom allows him such freedom. Madhavan, however, does not like an entourage, and prefers walking alone. He said that he wants to be able to interact with people and maintain his independence. In an interaction with Just Too Filmy, R Madhavan was asked whether he carries a wallet along with him unlike Aamir Khan, who walks around without a wallet. Madhavan replied, “I am never that extreme. Aamir’s stardom allows him to be like that. Whatever he requires, he has people to pay for it. Of course, he would pay them… and it isn’t like he doesn’t pay for it. I think my personality doesn’t allow me to walk around with an entourage. I prefer walking alone. I want that freedom, and the ability to interact with people." related stories Meanwhile, during the same interview, Madhavan also shared how his wife Sarita thinks he is ‘generous’ to a fault, and that he doesn’t know how to handle his money. She thinks the ‘Shaitaan’ actor keeps giving away his money. “I think I’m very particular about it, but she says not even from a remote corner are you particular about it. I spend what I have," he said. The actor said that while he is not very careful about spending his money, he always lives within his means. If he wishes to have a bigger car, he wouldn’t buy it if it didn’t fit his budget. “I don’t have worldly possessions, that is the reflection of my stardom. But I do have the liberty that this stardom offers me and I enjoy it," he said. tags : aamir khan bollywood R Madhavan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 14:17 IST News movies R Madhavan Reacts To Aamir Khan's Habit Of Travelling Without His Wallet: 'I Am Never That Extreme’ Read More

title: Junaid Khan Chooses Boney Kapoor's Company Over Aamir Khan: 'Ghar Ki Murgi Dal Barabar'
summary: Junaid Khan, son of Aamir Khan, shares his candid views on cinema, family dynamics, and his first theatrical release, Loveyapa.
full_content: Junaid Khan Chooses Boney Kapoor's Company Over Aamir Khan: 'Ghar Ki Murgi Dal Barabar' Curated By : Yatamanyu Narain News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 14:14 IST Junaid Khan, son of Aamir Khan, shares his candid views on cinema, family dynamics, and his first theatrical release, Loveyapa. reset Follow us on Google News Junaid Khan, son of Aamir Khan, opens up about his cinematic journey, Loveyapa, and his unique bond with Boney Kapoor. Junaid Khan, the son of acclaimed actor Aamir Khan, has embarked on a unique journey in the world of cinema. Making his acting debut at the age of 30 with a Netflix film, Junaid is now gearing up for his first theatrical release, Loveyapa, co-starring Khushi Kapoor. Actively promoting the film, Junaid recently revealed in an interview that while he enjoys discussing cinema, he prefers not to do so with his father, Aamir Khan. Junaid shared his fondness for conversations with producer Boney Kapoor, Khushi Kapoor’s father, describing him as a treasure trove of cinematic stories. “I love hanging out with him. I can talk to him for hours. He has the most incredible stories and nearly 50 years of experience in the industry," Junaid said. When asked if he felt the same about his father, who also has a wealth of knowledge and experience in cinema, Junaid’s candid response surprised many. related stories “I’d rather sit with Boney uncle," he admitted, explaining his perspective with a touch of humor. “Of course, my father is like an encyclopedia. He knows a lot about a wide range of subjects. But as they say, ghar ki murgi dal barabar (we often undervalue what is familiar to us)." Despite this, Aamir Khan has been a significant supporter during the promotions of Loveyapa. Directed by Advait Chandan, known for films like Secret Superstar and Laal Singh Chaddha, Aamir was present at the film’s trailer launch and even joined Junaid and Khushi Kapoor on Bigg Boss as part of the promotional campaign. Moreover, Aamir is producing Junaid’s upcoming project, which also stars Sai Pallavi, further demonstrating his unwavering support for his son’s budding career in the industry. Speaking about Loveyapa, the film is a fresh take on Gen-Z relationships, blending romance with comedy. The plot revolves around a humorous challenge set by the lead characters’ parents, where Gaurav and Baani must exchange their phones for a day to prove their trust before deciding to marry. In addition to Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor, the film features a stellar cast including Grusha Kapoor, Ashutosh Rana, Tanvika Parlikar, Kiku Sharda, and Kunj Anand. Directed by Advait Chandan and backed by Phantom Studios and AGS Entertainment, Loveyapa is set for a worldwide release by Zee Studios on February 7, 2025. tags : bollywood boney Kapoor Junaid Khan Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 14:14 IST News movies Junaid Khan Chooses Boney Kapoor's Company Over Aamir Khan: 'Ghar Ki Murgi Dal Barabar' Read More

The carousel of images in the post included photos from their holidays, get-togethers, events and photoshoots. Some photos also showcased their son Ranveer Behl. Sonali first met Goldie, son of director Ramesh Behl, on the sets of her film Naaraaz. She got married to him in November 2002 in Mumbai. title: NCT Dream Member Renjun Becomes Fresh Target Of Hate Comments

full_content: NCT Dream Member Renjun Becomes Fresh Target Of Hate Comments Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 14:12 IST Renjun was spotted at the Incheon airport with his NCT Dream members. reset Follow us on Google News Renjun chose a light-coloured outfit for the airport look.  (Photo Credits: X) NCT Dream’s Renjun has often been a hot topic, remaining a constant target of hate for multiple reasons. The most recent controversy that landed the K-pop artist in hot water was when he revealed a phone number on social media, claiming that it belonged to a sasaeng (fan). While the owner of the phone number clarified that he had dialled the star’s number after mistaking it for a friend, Renjun’s sudden revelation left fans divided as many bombarding him with hate comments. While Renjun received a lot of backlash online, fans believed his brief hiatus might cool down the matter. However, this has not been the case as the K-pop idol has once again become a target of hate comments since his recent airport appearances. related stories OK BUT THE MATCHING COLOR SCHEME OF TODAY'S RENJUN FIT ?? pic.twitter.com/nfZ4dIQ2GJ — ゼン xhen (@renjuniejunjun) January 24, 2025 On January 24, the entire team of NCT Dream along with the Renjun was spotted departing from the Incheon airport heading to Thailand for a fan event. title: Sonam Kapoor Tells Jacqueline Fernandez Why She Hasn't Been In Touch With Her: 'I'm Married...'
summary: Sonam Kapoor discussed her life changes after marriage and motherhood, reuniting with Jacqueline Fernandez at an event. She will return to acting in "Battle of Bittora," produced by Rhea Kapoor.
full_content: Sonam Kapoor Tells Jacqueline Fernandez Why She Hasn't Been In Touch With Her: 'I'm Married...' Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar IANS Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 13:52 IST Sonam Kapoor discussed her life changes after marriage and motherhood, reuniting with Jacqueline Fernandez at an event. She will return to acting in "Battle of Bittora," produced by Rhea Kapoor. reset Follow us on Google News Sonam Kapoor and Jacqueline Fernandez were once really close friends. Bollywood actress Sonam Kapoor recently opened up about the significant changes in her life, revealing how her personal journey has been completely transformed, especially after embracing motherhood and marriage. On Friday, the ‘Neerja’ actress attended an event where she reunited with Jacqueline Fernandez and shared the reason behind their recent lack of contact. In a video that surfaced online, Jacqueline could be seen asking why she and Sonam hadn’t been in touch lately. With a smile, the Masakali girl replied, “I’m married, I have a child. My whole life has changed." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Instant Bollywood (@instantbollywood) For those unaware, Sonam and Anand Ahuja tied the knot in May 2018 and welcomed their first child, son Vayu, on August 20, 2022. For the event, Sonam stepped out in style, opting for a yellow chiffon gown that resembled a saree. She completed her look with diamond bracelets, statement gold ear cuffs, gold rings, and a choker necklace. The Blind actress was seen happily posing for the cameras and even interacted with the media. On the professional front, Sonam Kapoor was last seen in the 2023 film “Blind", which she filmed prior to her pregnancy. After the birth of her son, Vayu, the ‘Sanju’ actress took a break from acting to focus on motherhood. She will next be seen in the upcoming film “Battle of Bittora," an adaptation of Anuja Chauhan’s novel. In 2023, she announced her plans to return to the screen with this project. Rhea Kapoor has acquired the rights to the book, which was originally published in 2010. The film will be produced under the banner of Anil Kapoor Film and Communication Network. Earlier, speaking on the sidelines of the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival, Sonam stated, “I’m going to do Battle of Bittora next year, finally. It’s a beloved character, but I feel a lot of girls might have read the book. I feel a lot of girls, maybe from our generation, know about it, but I don’t think the younger generation knows the character as much. So, we have the advantage of that." title: Single Since Birth? Netflix’s Latest Dating Show Is All About First Love
summary: At the heart of the show are 'Some Makers,' a passionate team of celebrity hosts and experts. These matchmaking maestros have one goal - to guide the contestants in rediscovering their best selves.
full_content: Single Since Birth? Netflix’s Latest Dating Show Is All About First Love Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 13:36 IST At the heart of the show are 'Some Makers,' a passionate team of celebrity hosts and experts. These matchmaking maestros have one goal - to guide the contestants in rediscovering their best selves. reset Follow us on Google News Motae solo is a Korean term that literally translates to single since birth. (Photo Credits: X) Get ready to witness an entirely fresh take on romance as Netflix gears up to launch a unique dating reality show, tentatively titled Motae Solo But Wants To Date. Motae solo is a Korean term that literally translates to single since birth. It refers to people who have never experienced a romantic relationship and this show is about to change that in a heartwarming way. But this isn’t just another dating show. This series takes a transformative journey for its contestants, reportedly starting with a makeover and leading them to a nine-day romantic retreat. Imagine stepping into the world of first love, complete with all the awkward, sweet and genuinely touching moments of people discovering romance for the very first time. related stories According to Koreaboo, at the heart of the show are ‘Some Makers,’ a passionate team of celebrity hosts and experts. These matchmaking maestros have one goal – to guide the contestants in rediscovering their best selves. Whether it’s revamping fashion, perfecting hairstyles, boosting confidence, or improving communication skills, the Some Makers bring their expertise to the table in a way that’s both nurturing and hilariously entertaining. Each contestant will be paired with their own team of Some Makers, forming a bond that feels as supportive as a family but with plenty of playful banter. Expect heartfelt cheers, honest critiques and a whole lot of laughter as the contestants stumble through their first attempts at flirting, charming and, perhaps, falling in love. After their makeovers, the newly transformed singles will reportedly head to a nine-day retreat, where they’ll finally test the waters of dating. And because these are first-time lovers, prepare for hilariously endearing moments filled with missteps, nervous giggles and maybe even a little heartbreak. The show is created by Kakao Entertainment, with CP Cho Wook-hyung and PD Kim No-eun leading the charge. These seasoned creators have a knack for delivering emotional and innovative entertainment, having worked on hit programmes like Queendom, Knowing Bros and Sugar Man, informs IMBC. “This show brings a raw and refreshing perspective on love," the production team shared, emphasising that the sincerity of these first-timers and the dedication of the Some Makers will resonate deeply with viewers. If the show’s concept wasn’t intriguing enough, its pre-registration phase set the stage for a buzzworthy launch. A staggering 4,000 motae solos (singles) have reportedly applied for the chance to participate, hinting at the widespread appeal and eagerness surrounding this series. With such fierce competition, the final cast is sure to feature truly compelling stories. Netflix’s Motae Solo But Wants To Date will premiere globally in the first half of 2025. tags : entertainment K-Pop Netflix Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 13:36 IST News movies Single Since Birth? Netflix’s Latest Dating Show Is All About First Love Read More

title: Subhash Ghai Wanted To Make Deva With Amitabh Bachchan But Gave It Up For Shahid Kapoor: Siddharth Roy Kapur
summary: Siddharth Roy Kapur mentioned that he took Amitabh Bachchan's permission and praised him for being kind enough
full_content: Subhash Ghai Wanted To Make Deva With Amitabh Bachchan But Gave It Up For Shahid Kapoor: Siddharth Roy Kapur Curated By : Akriti Anand News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 13:35 IST Siddharth Roy Kapur mentioned that he took Amitabh Bachchan's permission and praised him for being kind enough reset Follow us on Google News Deva was originally supposed to be made with Amitabh Bachchan Shahid Kapoor is gearing up for an action drama Deva which is releasing on January 31, 2025. Rosshan Andrrews’s directorial will also star Pooja Hedge in the lead role. But did you know that filmmaker Subhash Ghai wanted to make this film with Amitabh Bachchan? He had also registered the title in 1980. Yes, you are reading right. Siddharth Roy Kapur recently revealed the details and shared how he got the title. Mid-day mentioned that in 2023, Roy Kapur and director Rosshan Andrrews began work on their cop caper and felt Deva would be the perfect title for the film. So, Siddharth Roy Kapur called Subhash Ghai, who was happy to give up the title he had registered in 1987. The veteran filmmaker only had one condition—that they get Bachchan’s nod as well related stories “Over just one call, Subhash-ji agreed to relinquish the title with the blessings of Mr Bachchan, who was also kind enough to give us the go-ahead. Deva is a title that carries immense legacy and weight, having been envisioned by Subhash-ji for a grand project with Mr Bachchan in the 1980s. His passing this torch to us speaks volumes about his generosity," shares Roy Kapur. Deva, which also stars Pooja Hegde, marks the Hindi debut of Malayalam director Andrrews. The makers have already released the trailer. The video opens with an empty function scene. In the background, we can hear Shahid speaking about a deadly mission. The next scene shows him in an angry cop avatar in which he is beating goons. He is making sure that no one is left and also called himself mafia. The action drama is surely going to be interesting and Shahid has impressed everyone with his look. The video perfectly blends a whirlwind of emotions, high-octane action sequences, and thrilling chases, making for a perfect theatrical spectacle. Directed by acclaimed Malayalam filmmaker Rosshan Andrrews, ‘Deva’ promises to showcase Pooja Hegde and Pavail Gulati in never-seen-before avatars. In Deva, Shahid will be playing a rebellious cop, while Pooja will portray a journalist. Helmed by Rosshan Andrrews and backed by Roy Kapur Films, it also features Kubbra Sait and Pavail Gulati in significant roles. title: MADEIN Announces Comeback Amid Sexual Assault Allegations Against CEO; Fans React
summary: Former MADEIN member Gaeun quit the K-pop group in November last year, months after accusing the company CEO of sexual harassment.
full_content: MADEIN Announces Comeback Amid Sexual Assault Allegations Against CEO; Fans React Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 13:35 IST Former MADEIN member Gaeun quit the K-pop group in November last year, months after accusing the company CEO of sexual harassment. reset Follow us on Google News MADEIN's upcoming album will be released in February 2025. (Photo Credits: X) 143 Entertainment involving popular K-pop girl group MADEIN made headlines last year after a member’s sexual harassment allegations against the company’s CEO surfaced on the internet. Following the scandal, 19-year-old Gaeun of the girl group ended up quitting, months after the seven-member band’s September debut. As per reports, Gaeun was a victim of inappropriate advances by the CEO, including alleged coercion, unwanted physical contact, and continued harassment despite her repeated refusals. While the reports sparked strong reactions from fans with many criticising the company as well as MADEIN over claims, which prompted Gaeun’s removal from the group, they are back on the radar ahead of their February comeback. Earlier this month, the girl group announced their musical comeback with tan upcoming album MADEIN FOREVER, slated to release on February 14, 2025. Along with a poster teasing the upcoming music, the group also confirmed the release of the physical and digital release on the same date. related stories ‘MADEIN FOREVER’ ALBUM⠀?PRE-ORDER? https://t.co/VYHBd5DbGY ⠀?Digital Release 2025.02.14 (KST)?Physical Album 2025.02.14 (KST)⠀ #메이딘 #メイディン #MADEIN #MABY #MADEIN_FOREVER pic.twitter.com/Zo1HyciKnF — MΛDEIN (@MADEIN_U) January 24, 2025 As soon as the post came out, a large section of fans was seen slamming MADEIN and 143 Entertainment, calling out the injustice towards former member Gaeun. One wrote, “MADEIN isn’t MADEIN without Gaeun. how shameless you are as a company, covering up the abuse of a young woman. have shame!" while another added, “W don’t an OT6 comeback. We want an OT7 comeback! You can’t block us or hide our answers, we always be with Gaeun! Free them of you! MADEIN IS NOT MADEIN WITHOUT GAEUN MADEIN IS SEVEN." “Is this a joke? Release an album called Madein Forever after unfairly removing Gaeun. MADEIN IS SEVEN," another comment read. Amid the fans’ demand to boycott the company and the group’s come back with the hashtags #JUSTICEFORGAEUN, #FREEMADEIN, and #BOYCOTT143ENT going trending on social media, fans have also alleged that the company has been hiding posts regarding the petitions and the backlash. The group’s agency is yet to comment on the recent developments. On November 29, 143 Entertainment officially confirmed the exit of the teen singer, stating that the rookie act will continue as a six-member band with Mashiro, MiU, Suhye, Yeseo, Serina, and Nagomi. It also denied the sexual harassment allegations against its CEO. tags : K-Pop korean Korean Entertainment Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 13:32 IST News movies MADEIN Announces Comeback Amid Sexual Assault Allegations Against CEO; Fans React Read More

summary: Fans were left impressed with BTS member Jungkook's magic trick. The clip was reportedly shared by a member of Jungkook’s military team.
full_content: BTS' Jungkook Performs Magic Trick With Cigarette In Viral Video Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 13:33 IST Fans were left impressed with BTS member Jungkook's magic trick. The clip was reportedly shared by a member of Jungkook’s military team. reset Follow us on Google News Jungkook is now completing his mandatory military service in South Korea. (Photo Credits: Instagram) BTS’ Jungkook is undoubtedly one of the biggest names in the K-pop music industry. Known as the golden maknae (youngest member) of the septet, the singer has also made a name for himself with his solo career. Jungkook, who is currently enlisted in the South Korean military, recently went viral for performing a magic trick with a cigarette. While his face was not visible in the video, fans recognised the singer with his voice, laugh and hand tattoos. The clip was reportedly shared by a member of Jungkook’s military team. It featured the K-pop idol expertly making a cigarette disappear in a lighthearted trick that concluded with laughs. related stories So he was smoking sksksksksk pic.twitter.com/3TBrV3LrT2 — simo ? Speaking of Jungkook, the 27-year-old K-pop idol is currently completing his mandatory military service. title: Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh's Padmaavat To Re-Release On THIS Date
summary: Set in medieval Rajasthan, the epic historical drama is based on the poem Padmavat by Malik Muhammad Jayasi.
full_content: Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh's Padmaavat To Re-Release On THIS Date Published By : Shreyanka Mazumdar Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 12:58 IST Set in medieval Rajasthan, the epic historical drama is based on the poem Padmavat by Malik Muhammad Jayasi. reset Follow us on Google News Padmaavat is all set for a grand re-release on February 6. (Photo Credits: Instagram) Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s magnum opus, Padmaavat , is all set to grace the silver screen once again. This cinematic masterpiece, known for its opulent sets, breathtaking visuals and powerful performances, is gearing up for a grand re-release on February 6. The film is back in theatres after 7 years, and movie buffs can’t wait to witness the grandeur of the period drama and experience the nostalgia of the cinematic gem. The re-release offers a chance for fans to revisit the iconic characters of Rani Padmavati, Alauddin Khilji and Maharawal Ratan Singh, brought to life by Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh and Shahid Kapoor, respectively. On January 25, the actor dropped a post on his official Instagram handle expressing his excitement about the re-release of the magnum opus. Sharing the poster of the film featuring his iconic character, Alauddin Khilji, he wrote, “Experience the tyranny of Alauddin Khilji on the big screen! ‘Padmaavat’ is returning to theatres! Don’t miss the re-release… in cinemas on the 6th of February! #PadmaavatOn6thFeb." related stories View this post on Instagram A post shared by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) Set in medieval Rajasthan, the epic historical drama is based on the poem Padmavat by Malik Muhammad Jayasi. It tells the saga of Rani Padmavati’s legendary beauty, her unyielding courage, and her defiance against the ruthless Sultan Alauddin Khilji. Deepika Padukone portrayed Rani Padmavati, Ranveer Singh turned as the villainous Khilji, and Shahid Kapoor played the role of Raja Ratan Singh in the film. The film was released in theatres on January 25, 2018, amid much brouhaha as the Shri Rajput Karni Sena protested over the alleged distortion of facts in the film. Upon its release, the period drama garnered immense praise from both audiences and critics for its grandeur, craftsmanship and powerful storytelling. It is worth noting that the film remains not only one of the most visually stunning films but also a commercially successful one in the history of Indian cinema. Talking about Ranveer Singh’s professional commitments, the Bollywood heartthrob has multiple films lined up in his kitty. He will be seen in Don 3: The Final Chapter, directed by Farhan Akhtar. The actor will also star in Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s upcoming film Baiju Bawra. Co-starring Alia Bhatt and Kiara Advani, the drama film revolves around two singers. Next, he is roped in for Basil Joseph’s action drama film Shaktimaan. The film also stars Wamiqa Gabbi and Pankaj Tripathi in lead roles. tags : bollywood entertainment Padmaavat Ranveer Singh Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 12:58 IST News movies Deepika Padukone, Ranveer Singh's Padmaavat To Re-Release On THIS Date Read More

title: Akshay Kumar Says Bollywood Works In Isolation, Aims For Mutual Support: 'If We Celebrate Each Other’s...'
summary: Akshay Kumar discussed Bollywood's lack of unity in an IMDb interview while promoting Sky Force, which releases on January 24, 2025. He emphasized industry solidarity.
full_content: Akshay Kumar Says Bollywood Works In Isolation, Aims For Mutual Support: 'If We Celebrate Each Other’s...' Curated By : Shreyanka Mazumdar News18.com Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 12:53 IST Akshay Kumar discussed Bollywood's lack of unity in an IMDb interview while promoting Sky Force, which releases on January 24, 2025. He emphasized industry solidarity. reset Follow us on Google News Akshay Kumar's Sky Force is running in theatres. Akshay Kumar, who began his film career in the 1990s, has experienced the many shifts in Bollywood over the years. In a recent conversation with IMDb for the promotion of Sky Force, he shared his thoughts on the lack of unity within the industry. Accompanied by his co-star Veer Pahariya, who was curious about his career, Veer asked Akshay if there was anything he would change about Bollywood. Akshay said, “If I get a chance to change anything about our industry, then I would like to bring more unity to our industry." He continued, “We are like a family but, sometimes I feel that we work in isolation. We just become separate. If we come together, support each other, celebrate each other’s successes, and tackle challenges together to find solutions… If we come together as a collective force that will create a lot of good impact on others also and the industry." related stories Ajay Devgn, in an interview with Hindustan Times, had also said something similar. He had praised the South film industries for their unity and said, “I really appreciate how the people in the south industries come together and stand for each other as an industry, which, honestly speaking, we lack in the Mumbai film industry. I always want that to happen." Sky Force delves into A B Devayya’s unyielding spirit and pivotal role in one of history’s most significant conflicts. Directed by Abhishek Anil Kapur and Sandeep Kewlani and produced by Dinesh Vijan, Jyoti Deshpande, and Amar Kaushik, Sky Force is set to release in theatres on January 24, 2025. Produced by Jio Studios and Maddock Films, Sky Force releases in theatres this Republic Week on January 24, 2025 News18 Showsha gave it 4 stars. An excerpt from the review read, “The aerial saga is a true Republic Day treat and it deserves a watch for its execution and treatment. It packs a punch without trying too hard and sets a precedent for a modern-day patriotic film where friendship and loyalty take a precedence over politics and ultra-nationalism." tags : Akshay Kumar bollywood Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 12:53 IST News movies Akshay Kumar Says Bollywood Works In Isolation, Aims For Mutual Support: 'If We Celebrate Each Other’s...' title: Kim Moo Joon And Woo Davi Team Up With Jang Ki Yong For New Rom-Com Series
summary: The casting announcement revealed that actors Kim Moo Joon and Woo Davi will reportedly star alongside Jang Ki Yong and Ahn Eun Jin in Shouldn’t Have Kissed.
full_content: Kim Moo Joon And Woo Davi Team Up With Jang Ki Yong For New Rom-Com Series Published By : Shrishti Negi Trending Desk Last Updated: January 25, 2025, 13:33 IST The casting announcement revealed that actors Kim Moo Joon and Woo Davi will reportedly star alongside Jang Ki Yong and Ahn Eun Jin in Shouldn’t Have Kissed. reset Follow us on Google News This drama marks an exciting reunion for Kim Moo Joon and Ahn Eun Jin. (Photo Credits: Instagram) There’s an exciting piece of news for all K-drama fans. Kim Moo Joon and Woo Davi are officially joining the cast of SBS’s highly anticipated romantic comedy Shouldn’t Have Kissed. The casting announcement on January 24 revealed that these two talented actors would reportedly star alongside Jang Ki Yong and Ahn Eun Jin in this upcoming drama. Shouldn’t Have Kissed tells the unique and whimsical story of Go Da Rim, played by Ahn Eun Jin, a single woman who pretends to be a married mother in a bid to secure a job. Meanwhile, Gong Ji Hyuk, played by Jang Ki Yong, is a charismatic team leader who finds himself falling for Da Rim. Adding to the excitement, the drama boasts the creative team of director Kim Jae Hyun (One Dollar Lawyer) and writers Ha Yoon Ah and Tae Kyung Min, the duo behind the hit series Mystic Pop-up Bar, reports Soompi. related stories Kim Moo Joon will take on the role of Kim Sun Woo, Go Da Rim’s best friend of two decades and the CEO of Baby Studio. A single dad raising his son solo after divorcing his wife due to her infidelity six years ago, Sun Woo steps up to play the part of Da Rim’s pretend husband, injecting humour and heart into the storyline. For fans of My Dearest, this drama marks an exciting reunion for Kim Moo Joon and Ahn Eun Jin, whose previous on-screen chemistry earned high praise. Notably, Kim Moo Joon’s performance in My Dearest garnered him the Best New Actor award at the 2023 MBC Drama Awards, a well-deserved accolade that has viewers eagerly anticipating his next role. According to Soompi, Woo Davi will portray Yoo Ha Young, the youngest daughter of a wealthy family. Ha Young is graceful and charming, having grown up in the lap of luxury with a life free from challenges or ambition until love unexpectedly turns her world upside down. Woo Davi, who recently impressed audiences with her role in TVN’s Jeongnyeon: The Star is Born, is sure to bring depth and vibrancy to this character. With its star-studded cast and a unique plot brimming with comedy, romance and emotional twists, Shouldn’t Have Kissed is shaping up to be a must-watch drama of the year. The show is slated to premiere later this year. tags : entertainment K-Pop Kdrama Location : Mumbai, India First Published: January 25, 2025, 12:45 IST News movies Kim Moo Joon And Woo Davi Team Up With Jang Ki Yong For New Rom-Com Series Read More

title: 'Symbol Of Corruption': In Final Leg For Delhi Polls, BJP Brings Back Focus On Kejriwal's 'Sheesh Mahal'
summary: The BJP used a video of Arvind Kejriwal’s controversial home to remind voters of the alleged opulence inside, including automatic doors for Rs 70 lakh, ovens costing Rs 9 lakh, and massage chairs worth Rs 4 lakh
full_content: 'Symbol Of Corruption': In Final Leg For Delhi Polls, BJP Brings Back Focus On Kejriwal's 'Sheesh Mahal' Reported By : Anindya Banerjee News18.com Edited By: Oindrila Mukherjee Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 18:15 IST The BJP used a video of Arvind Kejriwal’s controversial home to remind voters of the alleged opulence inside, including automatic doors for Rs 70 lakh, ovens costing Rs 9 lakh, and massage chairs worth Rs 4 lakh reset Follow us on Google News The BJP shared a video of the interiors of AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal's controversial residence, nicknamed 'Sheesh Mahal' by the media. (Image: @Shehzad_Ind/X) In the final leg of its campaign for the Delhi assembly elections, the BJP once again trained the spotlight on the controversial ‘Sheesh Mahal’, without attacking sops offered by the AAP government – this is a significant shift from its strategy applied during the 2020 polls. In fact, the BJP’s insistence that it will continue the Delhi government’s ‘freebies’ has forced the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) to announce more such promises this time. related stories Late on Sunday, the BJP reminded voters of former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal’s house, which has automatic doors allegedly for Rs 70 lakh, ovens allegedly costing Rs 9 lakh, and massage chairs allegedly worth Rs 4 lakh. A nearly three-minute detailed footage of the house, which has captured the voter’s imagination, answered the most frequently asked question – how does the ‘Sheesh Mahal’ look from the inside? Sheesh Mahal The symbol of @ArvindKejriwal ’s megalomania , corruption and obscene shamelessness & Political conversion from •No big house to making a Mahal • Swaraj to Sharab Watch – Share This is how he looted us pic.twitter.com/7uXmZCBirP — Shehzad Jai Hind (Modi Ka Parivar) (@Shehzad_Ind) January 26, 2025 The video captures sitting rooms, gyms, bathrooms, bedrooms giving a sense of the opulence of the AAP chief’s residence, whose claim to fame was his appeal to the “commoner". This has left the AAP voter base, consisting of those from the lower strata, much distracted ahead of the election. Shehzad Poonawala, BJP national spokesperson, posted the video on X calling the “display of wealth" a “symbol of Arvind Kejriwal’s megalomania, corruption and obscene shamelessness and political conversion from no big house to making a mahal, swaraj to sharab". The BJP started the new year with Prime Minister Narendra Modi launching a scathing attack on Kejriwal, making his residence an election issue. On the same day, the central government gave away homes to the poor in Delhi. भाजपा की गारंटी पर सबको पूरा भरोसा है 👇 pic.twitter.com/nt5OZOGobs — BJP Delhi (@BJP4Delhi) January 27, 2025 top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “…poora desh janta hai ki Modi ne kabhi apne liye ghar nahin banaya…pichle 10 saalon mein 4 crore logon ko ghar diye…main bhi Sheesh Mahal bana sakta tha…par mere liye deshwasiyon ko ghar dena sapna tha (The country knows that Modi never built a home for himself. But, in the last 10 years, 4 crore citizens have been given houses. I could have also built a ‘Sheesh Mahal’. But, my dream was to give my citizens a house)," he said. With polling only a few days away on February 5 and the issue reignited, the AAP may find itself on the backfoot at a crucial time in its campaign to win a fourth consecutive term in the national capital. Location : New Delhi, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 18:09 IST News elections 'Symbol Of Corruption': In Final Leg For Delhi Polls, BJP Brings Back Focus On Kejriwal's 'Sheesh Mahal' Read More

title: New Delhi, Jangpura, Kalkaji Among 16 Red Alert Constituencies In 2025 Elections: ADR
summary: The Association for Democratic Reforms (ADR) and Delhi Election Watch have analysed the self-sworn affidavits of all 699 candidates, who are contesting in the Delhi 2025 assembly elections
full_content: New Delhi, Jangpura, Kalkaji Among 16 Red Alert Constituencies In 2025 Elections: ADR Reported By : Nivedita Singh News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 17:20 IST The Association for Democratic Reforms (ADR) and Delhi Election Watch have analysed the self-sworn affidavits of all 699 candidates, who are contesting in the Delhi 2025 assembly elections reset Follow us on Google News A senior citizen casts her vote for Delhi Assembly elections through the home voting facility made available for the elderly and people with disabilities, at her residence, in New Delhi. (ECISVEEP via PTI) Of the 70 assembly seats set for elections on February 5, a total of 16 are ‘red alert’ constituencies – where three or more candidates have declared criminal cases. The list included high-profile seats of New Delhi, Kalkaji and Jangpura, as per a new report released on Monday. The Association for Democratic Reforms (ADR) and Delhi Election Watch have analysed the self-sworn affidavits of all 699 candidates, who are contesting in the Delhi 2025 assembly elections. related stories In the New Delhi seat, Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) supremo and outgoing MLA Arvind Kejriwal is contesting against former Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) MP Parvesh Verma. Both these leaders have declared criminal cases against themselves. In Jangpura, former deputy CM Manish Sisodia is contesting against BJP’s Tarwinder Singh Marwah and Congress’s Farhad Suri. All three have declared criminal cases against themselves. In Kalkaji, outgoing chief minister Atishi is in a fight against Congress leader Alka Lamba. Both these women have declared criminal cases against them. In 2020, 25 (36%) of the 70 constituencies were ‘red alert’ constituencies. 13 HAVE DECLARED CASES RELATED TO CRIME AGAINST WOMEN In 2025, 13 candidates have declared cases related to crime against women, down from 32 in 2020, the report shows. Of the 699 contesting candidates, 278 are from national parties, 29 are from state parties, 254 are from registered unrecognised parties and 138 candidates are contesting independently. At 93, the national parties in Delhi have named the highest number of candidates with criminal cases. “Of the 699 candidates analysed, 132 (19%) candidates have declared criminal cases against themselves," the report said. In the 2020 elections, there were 672 candidates in the fray and 133 (20%) had declared criminal cases against themselves. Down from 104 in 2020, this time 81 (12%) have declared serious criminal cases. “Among the major parties, 44 (63%) of the 70 candidates analysed from the AAP, 29 (41%) of the 70 candidates analysed from the Congress and 20 (29%) of the 68 candidates analysed from the BJP have declared criminal cases against themselves in their affidavits," it added. At least 29 from AAP, 13 from the Congress and nine from the BJP have declared serious criminal cases against themselves. “The directions of the Supreme Court have had no effect on the political parties in selection of candidates in the Delhi Assembly Elections 2025 as they have again followed their old practice of giving tickets to around 19% candidates with criminal cases. All major parties contesting in Delhi Assembly Elections 2025 have given tickets from 12% to 63% candidates who have declared criminal cases against themselves," the report said. FIVE BILLIONAIRES IN FRAY, INCLUDING THREE FROM BJP Karnail Singh (Shakur Basti), Manjinder Singh Sirsa (Rajouri Garden) and Parvesh Sahib Singh (New Delhi) from BJP are among the five billionaires contesting the Delhi elections. A. Dhanwati Chandela from AAP and Gurcharan Singh (Raju) from the Congress are also on the list. Among major parties, the average assets per candidate for 68 BJP candidates are Rs 22.90 crore, 70 Congress candidates analysed is Rs 14.41 crore, and for 70 AAP candidates is Rs 11.70 crore. The 68 Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) candidates have average assets worth Rs 1.23 crore. 96 WOMEN IN FRAY Up from 79 in 2020, the total number of women candidates contesting in the Delhi assembly elections 2025 is 96. At nine each, the Congress and AAP have fielded the highest number of women. From the BJP, eight women are contesting. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all A total of 324 (46%) candidates have declared their educational qualifications to be between 5th and 12th standard, while 322 (46%) candidates have declared having an educational qualification of graduate or above. At least 18 candidates are diploma holders and six candidates have declared themselves to be just literate. Further, 29 candidates are illiterates. In terms of age, 196 (28%) candidates have declared their age to be between 25 and 40 years, while 394 (56%) candidates have declared their age to be between 41 and 60 years. “There are 106 (15%) candidates who have declared their age to be between 61 to 80 years and three candidates who have declared age to be above 80 years," the report added. tags : delhi election delhi elections Location : Ne...

title: Free Study Abroad, Clean Yamuna & European-Standard Roads In Delhi: Kejriwal Unveils AAP's 15-Point Manifesto
summary: Arvind Kejriwal released the AAP's manifesto for Delhi polls and made slew of promises. He guaranteed free bus rides for male students, "European standard roads" in the city.
full_content: Free Study Abroad, Clean Yamuna & European-Standard Roads In Delhi: Kejriwal Unveils AAP's 15-Point Manifesto Curated By : Ashesh Mallick News18.com Last Updated: January 27, 2025, 14:00 IST Arvind Kejriwal released the AAP's manifesto for Delhi polls and made slew of promises. He guaranteed free bus rides for male students, "European standard roads" in the city. reset Follow us on Google News Arvind Kejriwal releases AAP's manifesto for Delhi Polls (PTI Image) Delhi Polls: Aam Aadmi Party chief Arvind Kejriwal on Monday unveiled the party’s manifesto for the Delhi Assembly polls, and vowed to provide free bus rides to male students, free study abroad for SC-ST students, and monthly aid to women among other “guarantees". In the manifesto titled “Kejriwal Ki Guarantee", the AAP supremo listed out 15-point promises that he said he would fulfill if his party manages to retain power in Delhi which is all set for a heated election. related stories Accusing the BJP of copying AAP’s promise-based governance, the former Delhi CM said that it was AAP that first coined the term ‘guarantee’. “After us, the BJP stole it, but the difference is, we fulfill our guarantees, and they do not," he said. Kejriwal’s 15-Point Guarantees Fix the problem of unemployment Mahila Samman Yojana (rs 2,100 to every woman every month) ⁠Sanjeevani Yojana (free medical services to all citizens above 60 years at both government and private hospitals) Waive off wrong inflated water bills 24×7 clean drinking water in all households in Delhi Clean Yamuna Roads to be made and maintained as per “European standards" Dr Ambedkar Scholarsip Yojana (Delhi government to fund higher education at foreign universities for all Dalit students) ⁠Free bus travel for all students. 50% concession on metro fares ⁠Pujari and Granthi Yojana: Rs 18,000 per month to all Pujaris and granthis Free electricity and free water scheme to extend to tenants All blocked and old sewage lines to be replaced Ration Card: The Delhi government will open the window to get new ration cards ⁠Financial aid of Rs 1 lakh for daughters’ wedding. Free coaching to their children. Rs 10 lakh life insurance and Rs 5 lakh accident insurance for all Autowallas and E-rickshaw pullers RWAs to be given special funds to appoint and maintain independent security guards Kejriwal said that the AAP’s existing free welfare schemes would continue if the party retains power. top videos View all Swipe Left For Next Video View all “The BJP has already made it clear that they will stop all these schemes if they come to power. I want to ask the people of Delhi — will you be able to bear the cost if the BJP stops these benefits?" he asked. Delhi will go to Assembly polls on February 5 and the counting of votes will take place on February 8. tags : aap arvind kejriwal BJP delhi elections Delhi polls Location : New Delhi, India First Published: January 27, 2025, 13:57 IST News elections Free Study Abroad, Clean Yamuna & European-Standard Roads In Delhi: Kejriwal Unveils AAP's 15-Point Manifesto Read More
